text: The hotel staff  & the location was great. Our room was clean, but the tv needed to be replaced, the mattress sunk in on one side & the hot water was not hot in the shower & for those reasons I only gave 3 stars. However, we would stay again.

title: more rooms options
text:
can have 4 and more guess in one room because i have 2 kids but just lucky that they didn't come with us.
the room is little bit small for 2 guess, me and my husband didn't have that much room to move around specially we had 3 big luggages and 2 hand carry.

title: Very mediocre hotel
text: Very average hotel. Stay here if you won’t be in your room at all. You cannot get much sleep as there is noise from the streets all night. No amenities at all. No toiletries, nothing.  No one cares to help you, the staff sounds like they are tired of working there.

title: Great location for accessing most city attractions
text:
Just a short, 2-day visit to New York but pod was the perfect location for access to most visitor attractions and for getting around the city. The accommodation has a bit of a hostel vibe, in that both staff and guests are some of the friendliest people I've ever met whilst staying in a hotel. Loads of different nationalities and everybody keen to converse. It had a really great vibe.

The staff are on the ball - we requested an extra bed cover for the second evening and house keeping were at our door within minutes. The rooms are compact but offer every basic you really need for a trip where you're not spending much time in your room - bed, shower, TV. - sorted.

The views are amazing, too, with most rooms offering exceptional views of the city skyline. It was lovely to leave the blinds open at night and take in the city and lights. The sound proofing is also very good - I've stayed in a few hotels in NY before and the incessant car horn beeping and emergency services sirens wailing throughout the night really do grind on you after a while, but we hardly heard any of them when we were in our room.

Recommended.

title: Posizione centrale .
text: Le stanze sono ben organizzate e pulite , unica pecca è che sono veramente piccole e minimal , in una stanza in due bisogna essere super ordinati o non si ha nemmeno lo spazio vitale per muoversi. A disposizione ci sono solo i prodotti per la doccia e nulla più . Ottima location per pochi giorni nel cuore di NY non lo raccomanderei per una settimana intera . Il personale gentile e disponibile .

title: BYOMT - Bring your own mattress topper
text: First, I do not walk. But, I easily walked from the Port Authority to this hotel with my luggage. So great location near transportation, fast and slow food, stores, Times Square, and Broadway. From the street it did not have a typical hotel front. You enter and go up to the main lobby. It is what it says it is . A minimalist experience. My room was upgraded from Full to Queen. I had to use my key for the elevator. So it was secure. It has the look of something you might see in a James Bond scene. Cool. The room was a decent size. Larger than I’d imagined. I had two small complaints. The room was musty. I Ieft the window open while I took a walk. Also, bring an extension cord. Unless I missed them elsewhere, the outlets were next to the TV.. I wanted to plug in my streaming stick and it would not reach the plug. I was able to stream without issue from my laptop. My big complaint, the one I had ignored in the reviews from others, was the bed. I barely slept and hurt all over the next morning. The bed was so hard and uncomfortable. I am on the older and larger side but, I have never had this much of an issue sleeping. Imagine a hard floor. That’s what it felt like. I booked direct and got the best deal so I was able to cut my trip short and spend the next 5 nights of my trip somewhere else. That being said. I can see how it had such high marks even with the bed complaints.

title: Ideal location with nice rooms
text: This was the second time we stayed at this location in NY. The location is ideal for discovering all corners of NY with the subway stations less than 5 min away while midtown Manhattan is within walking distance. The rooms are small but acceptable for NY. We did not need more room, we were away all day exploring the city so we were only there to sleep. I would definitely come back if we would visit NY again and highly recommend this place to other travelers.

title: Cleaning and service
text: The room isn’t clearing, I think not necessary  ask/reservation the clean. In my room fineshed shampoo and soap, when Iwent to ask told me was necessary schedule for next day . The time of breakfast is very lost, the service is slow and Machine of de credit card is terrible.

title: Good hotel but avoid expensive times
text:
We visited New York during the ceremony at the Rockefeller so start of Christmas.
It was good a hotel for the normal price but the price at this time was to high even for New York.
On the other hand, it was still cheaper than the most other.. but you also get way less

title: Céntrico, funcional, estupendo!
text: Todo genial! El hotel está céntrico, habitaciones algo pequeñas pero muy funcionales por lo que no tienes sensación de falta de espacio, limpias,  personal maravilloso, siempre disponibles. Si vuelvo a New York no dudaré en repetir allí!

title: A perfect stay fit sightseeing
text: I stayed with my mom for sightseeing and shopping. The location is busy but perfect for sightseeing. You get really quick to the subway, the times square isn't far away and you got everything around you what you might need (target, restaurant, etc). The room is tiny but clean and the staff is super friendly and helpful :)

title: The Pod
text: Great place great value will definitely book again!!! Right in the heart of Times Square. Walking distance to everything. Good food tons of shopping  hotel staff were great very friendly restaurant in hotel was delicious!!!

title: Just right
text: This hotel was centrally located and was great.  A friend and I were there for a short getaway and used the tiny bunk room!! It was just enough for us. We had great restaurants and train stations within blocks not to mention our Broadway theater for the show we booked!

title: Excellent location and value
text:
Excellent location, close to public transport
Confortable, quiet and clean rooms (queen pod), small, but was no problem for us as tourists out of the room all day long.
Improvement recommandation: 
Staff at reception could be more friendly.  They made no efforts to speak slowly for us as foreigners and to welcome us. If improved, this hotel would deserve a top class  rating.

title: Reseña
text:
Muy buena ubicación y atención . 
Las habitaciones contienen todo lo necesario para ducharse y dormir después de una larga caminata x  Manhattan. Destaco la atención de Vito Coppola que nos ayudó en todo momento . Muchas gracias a Vito y a los que nos asistieron.

title: Location great but that’s about it…
text:
If all you care about is location, stay at the Pod.  It’s spotless and efficient with adorably appointed rooms.

Otherwise, it is a total rip off and waaaayyyy overpriced for what you get.  For a room the size of a closet and ZERO amenities, the price should reflect that. I’ve learned it’s much more cost effective to spend fifty bucks more for a place with a reasonably sized room, a coffee bar in the lobby, a fridge in the room, and maybe even a gym or pool.

They also have the nerve to charge an insane “resort fee” that a lot of hotels are now charging to further rip off the consumer.

title: Small but very modern rooms with nice bathrooms
text:
Small but very modern rooms with nice bathrooms. The hotel is quite close to Times Square (5 minutes walk), which is nice for people who want to go there often. Because of this, it was very busy nearby. 
The subway is also very close (3 minutes walk). 
The rooms are small but well equipped and have a really nice shower/bathroom. For breakfast there are a couple of bagel shops nearby.

title: Surprisingly Excellent
text: Great location, great price. Staff was excellent. Simple, clean, Practical, good value room. No frills. Just a clean room to rest my head. This is not a luxury room. It serves its purpose. Would stay here again.

title: NYC es lo mejor
text:
Muy buen hotel. Excelente ubicación y muy amable personal, en especial Sahar.
Muy cercano a Time Square, Subway, restaurantes y otros servicios como lavandería, minimarket, comida rápida, además de ser un sector muy seguro para transitar a toda hora del día. 
Volvería sin pensarlo.

title: Great location, poor cleanliness.
text: Great location directly near time square with Starbucks, subway and many restaurants and bars nearby. The hotel was cool designed, small but cool rooms. Comfortable check in and out and friendly service (hotel and bar). But very poor cleanliness.

title: Great staff, perfect for a couple !
text: Had a great day, staff was very kind/friendly. Checking out and in with also very easy, maintenance Made sure our room was always clean when we arrived back into the room. Our room was perfect for a couple on vacation and the bar was also very nice downstairs! Would recommend this hotel for a couple or a single

title: Ubicación
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado. Es complicado hacer el check in si llegas en carro pues debes estacionar en el medio de la calle y la ubicación del Lobby a través de un  ascensor lleva más tiempo para hacer el check in

title: Vacation
text: Birthday Thanksgiving Then Business on Friday all together Vacation mixed with good food lots of sigth seeing. Did a lot of walking some riding around. Took a tour on the bus and a ferry to see the statue of liberty!

title: Super séjour idéalement placé à manhattan
text:
+: la localisation idéale à 2 pas de time square.
Très bon rapport qualité prix.
Superbe vue sur a
La ville via les étages supérieurs.

- : la salle de bain de la chambre offrant peu d'intimité aux occupants. Peut être problématique en fonction d'avec qui vous voyagez...

title: Posizione ottima ma l'hotel ha alcune mancanze
text:
Camera minuscola ma pulita, la zona soggiorno che compariva nella prenotazione non c'era. Non ci sono armadio e cassettiera ma solo appendino a vista. 
Grande la doccia. 
Colazione non compresa, a pagamento e comunque con poca scelta e non molto gentili, inoltre apre 8,30
Il ristorante descritto non c'è più.
Le pulizie vanno richieste ogni giorno e un giorno si sono dimenticati anche se richieste. 
Al piano lobby non c' è toilette se non all'interno del bar quando è aperto. 

Scenografica la palestra al 28mo piano
Posizione ottima

title: CHOSE OTHER HOTEL !!!!  NEVER AGAIN
text:
TERRIBLE Experience,  my worst hotel in NYC ever.  Having thousands of options  around Manhattan area,  I made a  terrible mistake by having chosen this hotel.
1) EXTREMELY Ridiculously SMALL space
2) NO space to store luggage or cloth
3) Only 1 TV Channel  (OMG) 
4) No Ice Machine
5) ANNOYING house keeping screaming early morning all over the corridors
6) House keeping enters into the room without knocking the door
7) Key Card MUST have access to the Gym at 28th floor (you need to go to the reception and get a key card that opens gym)  this is a total WASTE of TIME
8) VERY EXPENSIVE for the extremely poor benefit

title: NYC stay
text:
Check in and out was very easy. Everyone was very nice. I felt very safe there. I love you can’t get to the floors past the lobby with out using a hotel key. 
The location for everything was very convenient.

title: Only good for location
text:
Not satisfy that much with what given in the room compared to the price but the location is good.
The staffs were helpful and friendly.
The hot water was not really hot while I stayed in November and the temperature control were not really as set.

title: Minimalista
text: Hotel stile industriale moderno e funzionale. Troverete solo una piccola saponetta 2 asciugamani. Nella doccia dispenser bagno schiuma, shampoo e balsamo. Direi minimalista ed essenziale, le camere stile capsula , con poco spazio, si cammina a turno nel piccolo corridoio . Posizione eccellente.Letto a castello, ogni metto ha prese per ricarica. Ti consegnano un voucher per un Wellcome drink , che attenzione va usato dalle 15 alle 22.

title: Explore
text: Clean, comfortable and right in the heart of everything. We were on the 27th floor and was able to embrace the view of the tall towers, sunrise setting and people just going on about their day. Definitely worth booking!

title: Wouldn’t stay again
text:
I have stayed at Pod 39 extensively so when they didn’t have availability, I decided to give this one a try. The bedding was smelly and odorous, the hallways were dark and not that clean, and the first room I checked in had heat only. The front desk person mistakenly told me AC was shut off; when I went to the front desk to check out, they then told me AC was working in the rooms and moved me to a room with working AC.
Not the best experience and I wouldn’t return

title: Poot service
text: The 22nd of Nov. nobody cleaned my room. Why ? I was very unhappy coming back in the evening. Very poor service and the room 2232 is very small. Very poor experience in general. I was desappointed staying in this hotel

title: Perfect location
text:
Perfect location, 
speedy check in and check out, 
nice bar near the lobby
Beds are ok and the bathroom is modern and functional 
I experienced some minor issues with the room (light couldn't be switched off)
and billing (taxes on top of the all taxes included price announced)

title: Everything you need in a convenient location.
text: Friendly staff. Within walking distance of Times Square, POBT, Bryant Park + easy access to underground. My room had a desk, hangers, under bed storage, shower (good temperature and pressure!). Quiet at night, noise was not a problem. Great views of the skyline !

title: Great value for money
text: It is a simple hotel so no expectations to get 5 stars level, but it was a good value for money. On 42nd and 9, close to everything. The room is very small, you need to store the suitcase under the bed. The door in the toilet is made of glass and has no lock, and cannot be closed, it was sliding and opening all the time.

title: Design for a good price
text:
Great location, nice design and good value for money
The hotel entrance hall was arty, attractively designed. The room had all necessities and was equipped efficiently so the 2p bedroom space with view on the city still felt more spacious than the actual size. 
One suggestion to help the environment further is to use a thicker deck on the bed, so we can reduce on heating (-:
Value for money is really good in this Pod hotel!

title: Ok stay
text: Room was a little smaller than expected, A couple of the plugs didn’t work. We were out and about most of the time, so it didn’t bother much, but we had to plan our movements in the room! Loved the free drinks at the bar when we arrived!

title: Good hotel at a decent price.
text: The hotel was close to the things I wanted to do while visiting NYC.  Good selection of restaurants are close by.  Easy to get to the subway, just a block away.  Broadway shows and the TKS booth are all located in walking distance.

title: Great location and spacious room
text: The location was perfect, closed to underground and port authority bus station. The room was spacious enough with also desk&chair and space for suitcases. The shower was big with shower gel/shampoo & conditioner dispenser, hairdryer. The elevators were quick.

title: Great stay at the Pod
text:
We had an amazing stay at the pod - super staff friendly and helpful, clean rooms, great location.
Everything was perfect! I can not recommend this place enough. 

Yes the room might be smal but it was very well put in place so it did not feel small.
It was very minimalistic and yes the location is perfect as well!

title: Amazing location for a stay!
text: Near Times Square, you can walk to Grand Central, find nice breakfast in the area, Target shop nearby. With nice weather you can sit outside on the terrace of the hotel! Service is excellent and staff is very kind! Wishing you all a merry Christmas 🎄

title: Good value in the heart of Manhattan
text: I was visiting NY for three days on business.  The Pod is well situated close to all the main subway lines - which are generally the best way to get around the city.  There are plenty of restaurants nearby for breakfast and dinner - and the Pod is right in the middle of the theatre district.

title: Small rooms but spotlessly clean
text: The rooms are NYC tiny, good enough for 2 to sleep in, but not much room to move around without bumping into each other.  Comfortable bed with lots of pillows. The ensuite bathroom and shower was roomy enough and had a little extra shelving for toiletries.  The bar of soap at the sink is tiny but they bring a new bar every day. they hae shampoo and conditioner and body wash dispensers in the shower.  Some days the fresh towels were thick and fluffy, other days the towels were thin and scratchy. Everything was spotlessly clean, and they did housekeeping every day even though the front desk said we needed to ask for it each day, it happened anyway.  There are only 3 electric outlets in the room, 1 outlet very high up on the wall, 1 under the desk, and 1 in the bath, so bring longer phone and tablet charging cords with you.  There is no closet, only 3 hangers on a small wall rack with a few shirt hooks and 3 more foldup coat hooks on the wall. you have to manage your clothes and suitcase carefully, hehehe. Smaller suitcases will fit under the bed, the rest might be a problem.  The Lounge was ok, some guests got free drinks at checkin, I did not.  noticed that sometimes they had coffee in the Lounge in the morning, but many mornings they did not, just walked to the Starbucks on the next block or the Big Apple Market around the corner for coffee, all very close

title: Value for money
text: Value for money.  was cleaned every day. Free complimentary drink in the bar. Perfect location. Hotel offers free guided walking tours. I don't understand people's reviews where they complain about the size of the rooms it is all very clear on the hotel website. Also our room was very quiet.we couldn't hear any street noises.

title: Great location and great for your budget
text: The location is fantastic! The rooms are very clean and lovely! We were meeting family and all staying here and it worked out really well. The lounge area off of the lobby was a great meeting spot for us all. The staff here is great and very friendly.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Loved my stay at the Pod Times Square, everything you require in one place and great location. I was travelling solo and they made sure I was well looked after and informed. Would recommend to anyone.

title: In New York for Marathon
text: I found out about this hotel through the Booking.com website. Convenient location, small but basic and very clean room. We were kind to the guy who, after checking out, found us a taxi to the airport and accompanied us outside the hotel, waiting with us for the car to arrive. When I return to New York it will definitely be the first hotel I contact.

title: Great location and clean !
text: The rooms are clean , the hotel is safe and right on 42nd street. A quick walk to Times Square . The rooms are small , however it’s nyc. You get everything you need here . The staff is friendly , there is a bar in the lobby

title: good
text: I checked in late, and I had to stay at the other room, which is the bunker room, for first night.  I asked at the front desk, but the staff told me that I have to leave the comment through Booking.com.

title: Boa Acomodação
text: Bom hotel, com ótima localização, e ideal para passar o dia na rua e voltar só para dormir. Ao lado do Port Authority Terminal, e a duas quadras da estação de metrô da Times Square. Vários restaurantes e opções de alimentação na volta. O quarto é MUITO pequeno. Estava sozinha no quarto com cama de casal, e achei tudo bem apertado. O banheiro é espaçoso, e o box também. O chuveiro é bom, com uma ducha fixa e uma ducha móvel, a regulagem da temperatura funciona bem, mas poderia ter mais pressão de água. Não conta com ducha higiênica, mas a ducha móvel do chuveiro pode ser usada para esse fim. O hotel oferece shampoo, condicionador e sabonete líquido de ótima qualidade. Eles ficam acoplados na parede, dentro do box. O secador de cabelo é antigo, mas muito bom. A cama é muito confortável, e a TV é a cabo. A mesinha com cadeira é muito útil para fazer algumas refeições. Como muitos hotéis de NY, não existe frigobar no quarto. Não existe cortina na janela, somente uma veneziana que permite a entrada de luz durante a noite e quando amanhece. Se tu tem problema com a claridade a noite, sugiro levar um tapa olho. Um ponto curioso foi o serviço de limpeza do quarto. Cheguei em uma sexta-feira, e o serviço só aconteceu na terça-feira da semana seguinte. Não sei se é o costume do hotel, mas como estava sozinha, saía cedo da manhã e chegava tarde da noite, não foi um problema para mim. O ar condicionado é central, e existe um controle no quarto para regulagem da temperatura, que eu nunca consegui ajustar. A conexão Wi-fi é boa, mas as vezes oscilava. Cheguei ás 10hrs, fiz o check in e meu quarto estava pronto. Pude subir, deixar as malas e me organizar para sair. No check in ganhei duas cortesias de drinks para beber no Josephine, bar localizado no lobby do hotel. Foram dois pontos muito legais. O hotel conta com o serviço de guardar as malas, tanto no check in, quanto no check out. Não existe um valor específico para o serviço, ele funciona pelo sistema de gorjetas (tips), então tu pode ficar a vontade para pagar o valor que ficar melhor. Com relação ao staff, precisei do suporte da recepção duas vezes e fui bem atendida. As demais pessoas que tive contato foram solícitas e educadas. Única exceção foi a moça que me atendeu no check in que foi antipática. O hotel conta com passeios guiados gratuitos por algumas regiões turísticas. Os dias e horários ficam escritos em um quadro na recepção, como na foto que eu anexei. Pelos comentários que li, talvez tenha ido com a expectativa muito alta e esperasse mais, mas num geral foi uma boa experiência, e recomendo a acomodação.

title: Tiny but very nice staff
text:
The rooms are very clean and the staff is incredibly nice and caters to your every wish.
Especially Sahar, who made it possible for us to have a nice view for my birthday. Thank you again!

We booked a queen room and it was tiny, but it was big enough for two people.

title: A place to comfortably belong
text:
Summer get away to explore New York and enjoy different foods.
 I really like the museums. The walks were convenient. The commutes were short and safe. Plenty of excitement. I will definitely go again to celebrate life.

title: Bom custo-benefício
text:
Hotel muito bem localizado, bom custo-benefício, limpo, boa cama e bom chuveiro.

Pontos negativos: quarto muito pequeno, não tem café da manhã incluso, internet não é tão rápida e banheiro do quarto sem privacidade feito de vidro e sem tranca na porta.

title: POD Hotel - Times Square, NYC
text: Spent two nights at the POD Hotel Times Square in NYC, and it was a perfect experience - wouldn’t change the thing. The staff was courteous and very accommodating. I look forward to booking many reservations in the future.

title: Great value in Times Square
text: Rooms are basic but comfortable, just what you need, great value, great location.  My experience was a very quiet, clean room.  Front desk was very helpful.  The only thing you don't have is a hair dryer and mini-fridge, but for 4 days as a single traveler I didn't care.  A really great option if you want a clean, safe, reasonably priced place to stay in NYC.

title: Cumple expectativas
text: Excellent location. If You neeed some Nice, clean place to sleep after a long day, it's perfect. Take a hot shower, watch some TV and rest. Also You can get.something to eat and drinks in the bar at the lobby.

title: Clean Cozy and Close
text: We were very pleased with our room at the Pod.  It was very clean and quiet which made me happy.  The bunk beds were surprisingly comfortable.  It was very small but I found it cozy and it had everything we needed.  It is very close to Times Square which was awesome.

title: No frills
text: An extremely no-frills experience. Small rooms with no charm. structure is dominated by elevators and long dark corridors. Might be worth it if the price was <200$ (it was $400) Will not go to a pods hotel again.

title: 6-night Stay
text: Great Location, decent room. I would recommend the room for couples or friends as it is close to Times Sq. and other tourist attractions. The noise isolation is good enough. If you get lucky, you have some nice views from the room.

title: Top Hotel for a City trip
text: Clean and modern Hotel. Small rooms but perfect for a city trip to nyc. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean, restaurant is cozy and offers delicious food. Nice view over manhattan. Short ways to subway and public transit.

title: Buona esperienza
text:
Metto 4 stelle solo perché se devo trovare un difetto a questa struttura è il fatto che non c’era personale che parlasse italiano quindi abbiamo comunicato con il traduttore.
Per il resto non ho nulla di cui lamentare :camera pulita tutti i giorni
Posizione rispetto alla metro e al centro ottima 
Personale gentile 
Letto comodissimo 
Solo la camera matrimoniale un po’ piccola ma per le ore che ci siamo stati noi è andata benissimo .
Si sono resi disponibili anche nel chiamarci un taxi per l’aeroporto al rientro ,addirittura resosi conto che non parlavamo bene inglese ci hanno accompagnato fino alla macchina e hanno comunicato al tassista la destinazione .
Consigliato !!

title: Short stay break
text: Very clean.. staff very helpful  bar area very comfortable Will definitely recommend to friends  visiting New York. Location was spot on for what we needed.  We will definitely stay there again when we come back to New York

title: Great place greet location
text: Perfect hotel for sight seeing,  loose and easy to walk all over the main areas of the city. Also close to subway stations. Spotlessly clean, comfy big beds. Lovely helpful staff. Convenience stores and coffee shops all close by.

title: Central location.
text: Hotel very central and could walk almost everywhere. Rooms clean, check in and check out easy. Noisy in early mornings. The actual area around the hotel seems to be a bit dodgy compared to other areas we went to in New York.

title: Small but very centrally located
text: great little hotel located close to Times Square and all the major attractions. Staff are friendly and helpful - room is really a pod (tiny) but well worth it for the location. A bit more attention to maintenance and cleaning would be appreciated

title: Small guest room
text: There was no wardrobe in the room. The room was too small for  two persons. It was like a cage. The roof top bar was on the third floor. The service was friendly and helpful. The breakfast offer was aweful.

title: ADA experience
text: I’m a wheelchair patron and booked an ADA room with a roll in shower.  Problem is the shower seat is at the opposite end of the water control and unreachable.  TV only had once channel.  Friendly staf

title: Great location/deal
text: Excellent location and price.  Rooms are very small, but who stays in the room when NYC is outside your door.  This is the best deal and location I've had in decades of NYC visits.  I've stayed multiple times.

title: Une semaine à  NYC
text: Hôtel idéalement situé à proximité de Time Square. Pratique, confortable, bien équipé. Le bar/restaurant pourrait être un peu plus accueillant. Le service de consigne est appréciable en fin de séjour pour profiter de sa dernière journée.

title: Great value stay
text:
I booked to stay at Pod Times Square after arriving at a hostel on the Upper West Side and finding it to be unsafe and unsanitary. 

Although the rooms in Pod are on the small side, they are spotless and have helpful touches. These include an eye-level USB/wall socket with a little shelf that you can leave your phone on to charge, under-bed storage, a safe that's wide enough to fit a laptop in, and a wall socket by the desk into which you can plug your laptop and watch it on the room's TV. The air-con/heating system is really good, also. 

The bathroom has a rainfall shower head and body wash, shampoo and conditioner. The bathroom walls are made of frosted glass, which may not be to everyone's taste, but I didn't mind (I was travelling solo so it didn't matter). 

It's surprisingly quiet given how close the hotel is to Times Square, and if you walk north along 9th Ave you'll find lots of small independent restaurants and cafes.

Everyone at this hotel has been very friendly and helpful. Overall this has been a great value stay so far and I'd happily stay here or in another Pod hotel again.

title: Excellent, well priced hotel in a convenient location
text:
My double bedded room was perfect for one person but could work for two
though closet hangers were limited.
Even a room on floor 8 offered a respite from the noise of Manhattan streets below. The lobby lounge on floor 6 offered a perfect afternoon rest stop between a day of sightseeing and nighttime events. The staff was first class and all offered a friendly assistance regardless of time of day (7am, 12pm at check out or 3pm at check in) They have bag storage but arrive early as it can fill up. I never had to wait long for an elevator even though the hotel had many floors and lots of rooms and apartments thanks to the 6 elevators (to the lobby on floor 6). The location is a block past Port Authority bus station
but with constant security and police patrols, I never worried about walking back after dark. The location was great with subway stop a block away and Time Square, 2 blocks away - close but far enough to avoid the crowds.

title: great location, stylish hotel, friendly staff, good value for money
text:
great location, stylish hotel, friendly staff, good value for money
especially the location is top. 
The rooms are not very big, but we had a great view and there is everything in the room that you need for a city trip (clean bathroom, comfortable bed, charging facilities for electrical appliances ...).

title: Will definetly be back!
text: We loved the hotel, it was exactly what we expected. The location is great and the rooms are clean and comfortable if you are tidy. The staff is amazing and helped us with everything! Only one person had a really bad attitude every time someone interacted with. But overall it was an amazing experience!

title: A great value hotel option
text: It was much better than I was expecting. It was actually a wonderful stay. I expected a small individual room hostel vibe but it was actually just a compact hotel with a beautiful lobby in a huge high rise. The bathroom was huge, the bed comfortable, they hold your bags for you, it had a tv, AC, a great view, 1 block away from the subway. I would highly recommend. Oh it was super clean also

title: Todo muy bien!
text:
Excelente ubicación, me encanto que está cerca de todos lados y puedes ir y venir caminando a donde quieras, muy cerca de las estaciones de metro y restaurantes!!! 
El hotel limpio, las personas muy amables! 
Tiene cuartos muy pequeños pero son Perfecto para la estancia, ya que no estás ahí durante mucho tiempo! 
Lo recomiendo bastante!!!!

title: Cute room
text: Small and cute love the concept for a overnight stay its perfect. The prior reviews were accurate. They offer a complimentary drink. Breaksfast could have better options and was expensive. But in NYC you have plenty of options right near the hotel.

title: Great place, great location
text: I love this place, everything you need is there, it is very clean and modern. Location is perfect, walking distance to all Manhaten. Staff is nice and helfull. I was there second time and if I ever visit NYC again, I will most definately stay at Pod Times Sguare hotel again. Rooms are tiny, but has all you need and great view at Times sq as a bonus.

title: Good place for a week of sightseeing
text: The price and the location were the two things why we chose to stay here. And we had a good time. Rooms are clean and the staff friendly. If you plan to stay longer you could run into space issues, because the rooms aren't very big and even with two suitcases that fit into hand luggage we had some difficulties. But we would book here again :)

title: Excellent
text: It was a beautiful hotel well placed in Times Square next subway, bus... Very well isolated we haven't been disturbed by the noise of outside. Rooms were vere very clean. And aboce alle employees were so kind helpful...

title: Buena ubicacion Habitacion claustrofobica
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado, pleno Times Square. Personal amable. Limpieza excelente. Lastima que la habitacion tan diminuta haga que sea mejor pagar un poco mas en otro hotel. Por esto es que no volveria.

title: Pod Hotel Stay
text: A great location that was accessible to so many things. Great for a short trip as we were out all day but close to the theatre district and so many attractions. Ideal for Times Square shopping and access to the subway. There were some great eating places close by for breakfast etc. A thoroughly enjoyable trip.

title: Compact room with all you need including great location
text: Compact room with all you need including great location. Friendly efficient staff. Value for money when the other hotels where a crazy price. Would definitely be staying again. Room was small but did not need any more, the bed was good and the show hot and clean.

title: Amazing, Simply Amazing!
text:
Wow! Staying at The Pod was the best decision. Extremely helpful staff, clean, responsive, and a great location.

We arrived hours before check in and were able to go directly to our room. The room was small, smartly done, clean and felt like an IKEA display. A rare find in NYC, the room was quiet for sleeping, amazing considering the location. The bed was comfortable and the shower felt like a rain shower. We did have a problem with the television and the staff fixed it immediately. 

We received drink tickets for the lounge and discounts for a nearby coffee shop. The lounge had a wonderful happy hour and the friendly bartender was a good pour. The lounge and balcony were lovely locations for having a drink. 

We asked for a late check out which was granted. We utilized the bag hold which was speedy and friendly. 

The hotel was pricey but all in all the perks, location, staff, and cleanliness helped make it worth it. I have NEVER encountered a friendlier staff. 

This experience simply wowed us. 

The concierge was helpful and arranged for car service to the airport. 

The hotel has a walking tour available most days. We did the Central Park tour and learned so much. The tour was led by StreetWise and the guide was great!

title: Excelente!!!
text: Excelente hotel, la ubicación muy buena y segura, las habitaciones cuentan con lo necesario y están en excelentes condiciones. El personal fue muy amable en todo momento y nos permitieron dejar nuestras maletas luego del check out por unas horas. Además es muy conveniente tener tantas atracciones, lugares de comer y estaciones de tren cerca. Recomendaría este hotel sin pensarlo y me quedaría una vez más.

title: Top hotel
text:
Super locatie. Heel Vriendelijk personeel. Bushalte voor de deur. Starbucks om de hoek. Supermarkt om de hoek. Heel veel eetgelegenheden op loopafstand. Je bent met 10 minuten lopen op broadway.
Wij gaan er zeker weer heen. Echt een aanrader.

title: Great experience
text: My daughter and I spent a week in New York and had a great time.  The rooms are small, but very functional!  We really didn’t spend much time in the room anyway.  Clean and very convenient location.  Loved the security features, your access card would only allow you on you own floor and had to scan in late at night.  Felt very safe in the hotel and area.  Would definitely stay here again!

title: Ok!
text: Quarto pequeno. Não havia máquina de gelo. Limpeza boa. Atendimento bom, mas não muito cortez. Localização é boa em termos de proximidade do metrô, trem e da estação de ônibus central, mas o entorno não é muito bonito.

title: Tiny room
text: Tight fit for 2 people, but ok. Good value for the location. Short walk to the theaters, Times Square, restaurants. I liked the security of access to your floor. Linens were worn but comfortable. Concierge helpful.

title: Cute, but lacking where it matters.
text: There is NO prepayment. You have to pay after your stay. Check the bottles before you shower as I got stuck in one without any body soap and conditioner. Give the staff ample time to replace/help you as they usually take a bit to get to your room. Just expect New York attitude, its a high traffic space so the staff gets easily overwhelmed/blunt.

title: Great location and amazing helpful staff
text: Sahar went out of her way to make sure we got into our room as soon as possible. The entire staff was friendly and so helpful. If you plan to see a lot of Broadway shows - this is the ideal location.

title: Excellent place to stay while visiting New York!
text: Excellent friendly service in a great location, small but functional and clean room. Located at Times Square and 30 minutes walk to the places that we wanted to see. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Thank you.

title: Wish I Could've Stayed Longer
text:
Great stay at this hotel. You enter downstairs and then take an elevator to the hotel lobby. I checked in around 11 in the morning. They said they had a room ready for me and everything! I originally had a bunk bed but since I was a solo traveler, she switched me to a single bed on the 21st floor. I greatly appreciated that.

It's the perfect size for a single traveler. There's the bed, the TV, and the bathroom. They had a place to hang sweaters or coats. The room could've used a fridge. There was room for one and I often had leftovers so it would've been good if it was in there.

For the tech people, there are no plugs near the bed, but there are two UBS ports affixed to the wall. A plug, two outlet prongs, are found opposite that on the wall where the hangers are. So there was no plugging in my charger for my phone. But there is a charger attached to the alarm clock. The cord is really short but it works.

The location is really close to the theater district. It's about a block away. The only thing I'm dinging this place for is there was some kind of mold along the bottom of the shower. They need to rectify that. The room really suited my needs. Great stay!

title: Ideal hotel when visiting New York City
text:
I can really recommend this hotel. All is reduced to the max. It is clean, the staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are very practical, not small but tiny. A tipp: prepare your tomorrow's outfit the night before and store it in a tote bag. There is no wardrobe, so your suitcase goes under the bed. It is a super location, just round the corner you can take the bus to Newark Airport, the subway station is also round the corner. Last but not least Times Square, restaurants, musicals are a vey  short walk away.
There is a bar and basic breakfast items are also available. 
Good value for money.

title: 2/2 VISITS
text: I have used this hotel 2 yrs in a row for NYCC - they are efficient and friendly. I will say that I am still not sure how to more often enjoy Serafina, the in-house restaurant and bar. I would recommend more information available to guests upon check-in.

title: FIrst timer in NYC
text: Great stay overall. 10/10 will recommend. Aesthetically Pod Time Square was what it was, a pod. It had everything my boyfriend and I needed for our week getaway. We partook in the free walking tour to explore the city and the concierge was helpful in booking us transportation to our flight home. Thank you!

title: Great value for location.
text:
This hotel offers a great value for its Time Square location. It's right next to Times Square and easy to walk to many of the NYC attractions I was looking for. It was also close to a subway stop for the other visits. 

The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.

title: Nice Stay and good location
text: Good located near times square and Circle Line Boots, , small rooms, but very clean, very friendly staff, nice beds to sleep in, refrigerator would be nice, subway near hotel, many restaurants and some rooftop bars in few distance

title: LOVE the POD
text: I always stay at POD properties, not just in NYC, but Washington DC. as well.    Love the product.  Always clean and well located.  Staff always happy and helpful. Just an all around good vibe.  Only the price of this room, this time took me aback.  I can deal with a tiny room, bunk beds, minuscule sink, etc.  But, at almost $400/night, when you have paid as little as $69/night for the exact same room in the past…it makes you rethink your options.

title: Excelente localización
text:
Estancia de 5 días. El hotel se encuentra muy bien localizado para visitar las distintas zonas de la ciudad y bien comunicado con los aeropuertos.
Las habitaciones son básicas y funcionales y están muy limpias.

title: Good Value
text: Good value if you are not planning on being at the hotel except to sleep. Has all the essentials except for a fridge. The shower takes a while to heat up but overall everything is in decent condition.

title: Faute de mieux
text:
L’emplacement est parfait , proche de Times square
La chambre est propre et bien équipée , l’hôtel est très propre également 👍🏻

2 points vraiment négatifs pour nous :
- le personnel a l’accueil , pas de bonjour à l’arrivée , check in et check out vite fait « bien » fait. Le manager du bar Serafina extrêmement désagréable
- un soir l’alarme à retenti, nous avons dû évacuer à la hâte 15 étages à pieds en pyjama, nous ne savons aujourd’hui toujours pas pourquoi. Nous n’avons eu ni explications ni excuses et encore moins de dédommagement

title: If IKEA did hotels . . .
text: If you like IKEA (and I do), you’ll like this. This Pod had all the amenities I wanted and none that I didn’t. Plenty of outlets and lighting. Lots of places to sit in the lobby and relax. I didn’t try out Serafina but it looked inviting. Just enough towels. Clean, comfortable, tidy room with a tall ceiling and plenty of natural light. Small but efficient shower and bathroom (water could have been a little warmer, but it was warm enough). Secure and safe for a solo traveler. QUIET and peaceful close to Times Square.

title: Excellent stay!
text: Friendly staff and we could store our luggage safely. Good rooms, pretty small, still cozy, and the view was amazing. Clean rooms and beds. Price was pretty high so wished the breakfast was included..

title: New York 2023
text:
location is great, service was good, room was small, but very clean. Close to the city centre and to the subway station. Restaurants are around, also a lot of take away.
I will definitely go there again.
Recommended!

title: Theater trip
text: Nice hotel that filled our needs perfectly. A nice difference between the Pod and the small roomed hotel we used before was an actual table. Made functioning in the small room much easier. I’d use them again

title: Fair price for the kind of hotel
text: It's a fair price for the kind of hotel. The location is excellent! It's easy to come in and out, the bedrooms are very small but fair, clean and nice. Many elevators and a nice restaurant are there. It is two blocks away Times Square.

title: Great Location - good Transport Links
text: Ideal for short NYC break in interesting part of Manhattan, good transport links and great for access to/from JFK - great location and access to neighbourhood stores and food outlets, Will definitely return

title: Perfect for Your New York adventure
text:
Perfect location, clean room and comfy bed. Nice view from the room.
Room was small but absolutely perfect for our New York trip.
You can sit on a terase and enjoy your breafast with a view.
I will absolutely stay here again.

title: Wow, clean, quiet, perfect stay for theater district!
text: Super clean, brightly lit room with dimmers, excellent room controlled a.c. Next to our favorite restaurant, Chez Josephine French food. Short walk to Theater District. You will have to find your own parking but at these room rates, very worth it! Also, great bed, firm!

title: Life saver
text:
It’s the best place. I had a horrible experience in Quality inn wayne fair field area I had to ran away. Pod Times Square has room available, professional staff, clean, comfortable and beautiful rooms.
Really made me feel comfortable and save thanks all.
By the way never but NEVER book in Quality inn wayne fairfield

title: Great Hotel in New York!!!
text: It was a super cool experience with the hotel that is directly in Times Square!!! The room is small but it’s pratical and the location is perfect to Explore the city center. The staff is always present and they are very friendly

title: Unimpressed
text: Grubby room, not enough sockets,poor hair drier, not great value. Very busy location although the view out of the windows was good. Not the nicest area, alit if cannabis shops and young people hanging about on the streets

title: Great for an overnight stay
text: I loved the hotel and my only issue is the bed was very very hard and firm and I had difficulty falling asleep. Staff was very friendly and upgraded me to a queen bed for free. Rooms are tiny as expected but big enough for a 1-2 night stay and you can't beat the price

title: Minimalist in a great locale
text: Pod Times Square served our needs excellently. The room is small but well packaged. The staff were super friendly. The location was perfect. The only downfall for me was that the bed was a little short for my height. Otherwise the room was super fun and met our needs. It's not a place you'll want to just stay in your room, but this is New York so go do stuff!

title: Good in case no cheaper option
text:
What I liked is the practicality of the room design, so that each space is well utilised.
The facilities are in a very good condition.

What I didn’t like is that, the room is small and overpriced. My experience with the staff ( a lady at the reception) that she was not friendly in terms of gratings, communication and facial expressions.

title: Hotel bem localizado e espaço suficiente
text: O local está super perto da Times Square. Da para ir a pé . O hotel é estiloso , o quarto é pequeno mas dá perfeitamente para um casal, cama confortável , chuveiro bom, quarto limpo e atendentes simpáticos . Tem lugar para guardar a bagagem caso precise e não cobram nada . Gostamos demais .

title: Nice experience
text: I arrived early not feeling 100%…I was given the room 3 hrs early which gave me time to rest, also the bunk was upgraded to a large single bed, I was very grateful for both. The room was very chic and location great, overall would definitely book again

title: POD Times Square for the win
text: Returning, making it my favorite easy spot so I can enjoy my NYC experiences to the finest. Time spent on the Hudson, 5th Avenue, Broadway, Times Square, was there for The Proper Party at the Manhattan Center and the FinTech leaders of the world!  Go XRP Army and Ripple Labs!

title: Good location, good sleep and friendly staff
text:
Yes, the room could be a bit bigger, but the price is unbeaten.
It is well located, clean and the staff is always friendly. 
Plus you do not get a lot of noise from the street (at least we did not floor >20).
Common rooms / open use floors are barely availiable, a bit more space with desks and couches would have been great to compensate the tiny room and spend some time there.

title: Excelent location, small but complete
text:
The location is excellent, the room is small but complete, it has a bed which is big enough for one person, a safebox in the room, a small table, and a small bathroom with a shower.
Staff is very friendly and helpful.
The cleaning is the area to improve, whereas I would not consider it "dirty", I believe there are areas that deserve more cleaning and that the pillows might benefit for being cleaned more often.

title: Our Favorite NY Hotel
text: We always stay here when we come to New York. It is always clean. Staff is always helpful. It is in the perfect location for anyone who wants to go see Broadway shows. And the neighborhood is full of excellent restaurants in all price ranges.

title: Localisation convenable.
text: Accueil correct. Chambres vraiment étroites. Linge de bon aloi. Garde bagages gratuit. Lorsque le bar ferme, il ft aller chercher les toilettes à 2 niveaux plus bas   muni de "Gps". Mise à la disposition des clients d'impermeables jetables en temps pluvieux. Tarifs sans concession mais cadrant avec Manhattan. Valable faute de mieux.

title: Sharp edged furniture in a tiny, clean, functional, overpriced room; eerily dim lit hallways
text:
Sharp edged furniture to bang into in a tiny, clean and functional room. Eerie, dim lit hallways. Convenient to theaters; E.g., we saw Hamilton a short walk away. No longer at discount rates; cost same as traditional hotels with regular size rooms in NYC.advertised room rate so called “Total” wasn’t even close to the total. Listed as
 Total USD $379; Excludes 14.75% TAX, USD $3.50 City Tax per room per day, USD $22.95 Resort Fee per room per day. True total came to $511.36.

title: Trip to NYC
text: Hotel should improve kindlyness from staff ,Locate was so good , it allowed to us go throug in 3 different districs like Manhanttan , Brokling and Queens. Airport was caotic during on boarding but it was effective.

title: Good value
text: I was a bit worried of the pod denomination when I arrived the Pod Times Square hotel, and the hotel corridors are a bit gloomy, but in the end I enjoyed the experience. The rooms were clean and modern, small but with still space for a small suitcase and a table to work from, and the location was very convenient. It's a good alternative to NY crazy expensive hotels.

title: For my needs, the perfect stay. Will be a returning guest!
text: Staff was friendly and efficient, even allowing me to check in early. Location was incredible, especially for the price point. I adored the chic but funky and modern vibe. The room was simple and clean. A little small, yes, but not cramped feeling at all! And did not feel like a hotel, but more like a studio apartment or even a really nice dorm room. Food and staff were good at the restaurant. Can't speak on the drinks but they looked good too.

title: POD Hotel NYC
text:
Generally fine. Clean and very central to everything. It was noisy for sleeping but I think that a. I am used to be in a very quiet place and b. it was a very noisy traffic time (both Fashion and UN week! What a week to choose!) I didn’t try the offered walks (idiotically, I didn’t see them until too late). Lots of great restaurants, theatres, etc locally, to say nothing of being right at the centre hub for public transport! I was able to walk everywhere, except for Yankee Stadium!

I’m told that it was more expensive due to the time that I was there. Well, I never expected NYC to be cheap! But overall, I had a great time and would come back.

title: Great hotel for short stay in NYC
text: good location, no hassle, simple set up, excellent value for money! Rooms are small but comfortable. Only real thing missing is a restaurant accommodation with the hotel. Would have been good to for example arrange for breakfast of some sort for an early leave.

title: Ubicacion Pregferencial !!!!
text:
Este hotel , esta muy bien ubicado , en un punto estrategico para quienes quieran recorrer NYC , esta cerca de todo, Time Square, Metro , Terminal de autobus , etc.
El hotel, lindo, limpio y sobre todo buena calidad de la gente que trabaja ahi

title: The definition of excellent customer service
text: This is a massive thank you to the entire team at the Pod Hotel. Sahar, Reenie and Mila were extremely helpful and assisted us in any issues/queries we had during our stay. They were extremely friendly and welcoming as well as extremely understanding. Thank you to you all. We would highly recommend staying at this place if your around New York.

title: Everything is amazing, except the beds
text: Juan Carlos, Alden, and Vito really made us feel comfortable and at home at the hotel. Extremely polite, professional, and helpful. Only complaint is the beds were hard/stiff. Everything else was exceptional!!

title: PLACE WITH GREAT LOCATION AND GOOD PRICE
text: This hotel has a very good location in the city, very central, it is close to bus and subway terminals and the price of the room is very good compared to other hotels in the area. The rooms are small but comfortable. It is a hotel to only sleep comfortably.

title: Perfect location for the price
text:
The smallest room is very small for a couple. Though the rooms are quiet and the public spaces are clean. Staff is present 24/24, and very helpful. Concierge service is also very handy.
Room cleaning service is doing the strict minimum in the room each 2 days, and didn't vacuum the room in our 7 days stand 😔

title: Great!
text: We spent a really good time there. Very comfortable and good location. The experience was really comfortable and the attention was quick and kind. We recommend to go there when you have an express trip.

title: Top Spot for Tourists
text:
Top location for tourists to get to and to get everywhere.
Metro is just around the corner, supermarkets, restaurants & Delis also.
Cute, clean, european rooms, free Wifi, cozy bed, though a fridge would be amazing, modern equipped with usb ports, a TV, etc..
Staff is welcoming & friendly.

But be aware that the area around Times Square is quite dirty and a lot of homeless people and the like are around that area, but i never felt threatened.

title: Satisfied
text: Good hotel,perfect location.Small rooms but ok for this kind off Vacation. Missed just some storage room.And at the check in they forgot to tell us the way of housekeeping.Nice to have a restaurant and bar.

title: We won't be back - very disappointed
text:
Great location, that's the only positive. Our room had a huge leak in the roof. We came back from a day of shopping to find 2 guys on ladders in our room with the roof opened up, the floor soaked, some of our stuff wet - and nobody from the hotel had even phoned us to let us know, which they apologied for and said they should have called us. 

We were then moved to a different room but in this room the shower didn't work. It dribbled cold brown water. The receptionist tried to say it was city maintenance but after I asked if every room in the hotel had the issue she quickly fumbled over her words and changed her story. Magically after 3 times of being down to reception to complain, someone went to look at the shower & fixed it - so it wasn't the city maintenance. 

This was a trip for our 5 year anniversary and our experiences in the hotel honestly just tainted the whole thing. The staff weren't very apologetic or empathetic about any of it. We spent nearly 2K on accommodation and it was a waste of our money. I am also still waiting for our resort fees, city tax & deposit to be refunded, as promised by the hotel for the inconvenience caused.

Really disappointed, we had heard great things about the Pod Hotel chain but unfortunately our experience has turned us off returning or recommending them.

title: A little disappointing
text:
gaegsil-e naengjang-gowa poteuneun bichiga doeeoyahandago saeng-gaghabnida. ttohan 5ilgan keulliningseobiseuga 1beonbakk-e doeji anh-eungeos-eun munjega issdago saeng-gaghabnida. keulliningseobiseuneun sincheong-eul haess-eum-edo bulguhago da-eumnal seobiseuga doeeo tawol-ina hyujileul gyochehaejuji anh-a bulpyeonhaessseubnida.

I think rooms should be equipped with refrigerators and pots. Also, I think there is a problem with the fact that cleaning service was provided only once in 5 days. Even though I applied for the cleaning service, it was provided the next day and towels or tissues were not replaced, which was inconvenient.

title: Great Experience
text:
Great experience. The hotel is really well in terms of price, accommodation and location.  
Definitely I will return to this property every time I returned to NYC. My room also had a great view of the city! I was on the 17th floor.

title: Great place
text: East check in and out. Rooms were great. Location is good. Great bar and terrace. I’ve been here many time. Check it out. Friendly staff too. You have to be okay with efficient hotel rooms. It’s not made to be big and fancy. It has just exactly what you need. Which is great.

title: Perfect hotel
text: Good and big beds (bunk beds), Perfect bathroom with spacious shower and boards, many usb ports, clean, soundproof windows (only little noise), darkenking of the room (adjustable jalousies), adjustable air-condition-easy Check-in and check-pur-we loved it

title: Great Location
text: This is a great hotel! Staff are helpful and friendly. While the rooms are small and expensive (from an Aussie's perspective), they are modern and clean and have GREAT views. We also loved visiting the top floor to see the views from the rooftop and gym. And the location is so close to Times Square, the Metro and the Hudson River. We could easily get to all the NYC highlights from the hotel. Thank you for a top stay!

title: Great location, very NYC
text: Great location, the room had everything I needed despite being so small as NYC does. The mattress was hard, the pillows were small and flat, the room is really bright at night and it's super loud because of the location. Breakfast was a nice treat. The room had decent AC. The hair dryer only blows a little bit. It was clean and had everything I needed.

title: An enjoyable stay at hell's Kitchen, NYC
text: The hotel is stylish and modern, the room was rather small but well arranged, clean, modern with clean a functional bathroom, a sizable safe, good wifi access, big tv, and a great view (22nd floor). On the down side, the noise from the street reached the room (honking and ambulances) and the overall cleaning of the corridors and the room furniture could have been a bit more meticulous.

title: Good location
text: Good staffs and good location. But a little bit pricy for that type of room. Need at least a couple of water bottles. Cleanliness is good. Staffs are friendly. Location is good. Near Times Square and the transportation is convenient.

title: Professionalism needs to be reviewed, even if the location is perfect
text: The hotel doesn't deserve 3 stars in France. On the one hand, we are told on arrival that the type of room ordered is no longer available, even though I ordered it 4 months ago and no one notified me by email. Speaking of customer service, they don't reply to emails: I had to call them. The location is very good even if there is a lack of soundproofing (inside and outside). The cleaning service is perfect. However, the lack of a smile from the staff at reception and the under-rating mean that I wouldn't recommend this establishment.

title: Enjoyable stay
text: Very clean area, friendly staff, and great housekeeping. However, for whatever reason my computer charger went missing. Not sure if housekeeping took it or threw it away. Was a bit upset about this, had to buy a new charger.

title: Staff unfriendly
text:
Worse arrival in my entire life; but housekeeping service was great. 
The staff is absolutely not helpful (specially the guy at the reception Juan Carlos) very cold, not friendly, in a nutshell: a nightmare when you had a flight of 10hours !

title: Perfect stay for a intense New York visit.
text: Cool hotel with a good atmosphere, nice roof top restaurant and bar. Location is perfect. Rooms are well equipped, large shower, comfortable and with excellent view. Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful with all issues we had. High recommendation.

title: Birthday travel with my brother
text: Excelent!! I have passed my 40s birthday fantastic with my brother!!!! We had Pprt Authority very close where you could start 99% of your trips, move in Metro is very easy, New York has a lot of places to visit and a lot of steps to walk so y

title: Short trip
text: Our flight got cancelled and we stayed here for one night. It was a nice and clean room. Very central to times square and the Manhattan area. The location was important for us and the price was reasonable.

title: Perfect
text: Everything about this hotel ticked the box , highly recommend and will definitely return. Room had everything needed for a perfect stay . Restaurants coffee shops on doorstep walking distance to Times Square. Quiet hotel wonderful sleep

title: Great location, small (as expected) but perfect when not wanting to spend time in the room.
text: Great as a base to travel around NY, small room wouldn't suit people wanting to spend time in their hotel, but as a base it was great. Very well positioned close enough to Times Square but very quiet when sleeping. Definitely recommend.

title: Room
text: The room is too smaller for the high price, and the bed is very hard to sleep. In addition the insolation sound is very bad. Need to down the price for the room experience. The Staff ir very good but the room, terrible

title: NYC long weekend
text:
Nice for the price. Can’t beat location if you are coming via bus. The luggage concierge is a plus if you have a late city departure. 

Elevators could be more intuitive. From ground level you need to use elevator. Only use the touch pad not buttons. Same when you head up to your room.

title: Amazing experience and staff
text: We had an amazing staff, want to give a special shout-out to Sahar at the front desk who made our check in and check out very seamless and helped us with all queries, very good and clean hotel. The room is minimalist but value for money with amazing views.

title: Great place to stay! Times Square POD Hotel
text: This is a great location in NYC. You have easy access to everything you want to see and do!  You have plenty of choices for food, drinks and also local markets are close by. This hotel is always clean and the staff always great to work with!

title: Pod Recommendation
text: If you are looking for a clean place to stay near Times Square, this is it. No frills, just clean simple rooms, which is perfect for me. Near all the action but also a great place to relax. Staff is very friendly and helpful.

title: Great location & staff!
text: This hotel and staff exceeded my expectations! Excellent! Room was small but as advertised. Very clean, restful, and comfortable. I wanted to explore the city and have a nice place to rest even midday. Noise and lights were no problem!!! Highly recommended!

title: Nice Stay in Times Square
text: Hotel is in a great location near Times Square and Theatre District.  However, the rooms are small but clean.  There are lots of restaurants, deli, and grocery markets near by.  5 minutes walk to subway.

title: Qualità a buon prezzo
text: Posizione eccellente, vicino a Times Square, in pochi minuti a piedi si raggiunge la fermata della metro, supermercati e locali di ogni tipo. Camere molto piccole ma pulite e funzionali, bagno pulito con doccia grande. Personale disponibile e possibilità di deposito bagagli. Ottimo rapporto qualità -prezzo. Un hotel in cui ritornare.

title: A great choice
text:
Perfect location, great value.
Very friendly staff, great terrace bar and restaurant.  Yes  the rooms are small, it's a Pod Hotel, but very manageable and we weren't there to sit around in our room.  
Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Perfect for solo
text: Sahar is always so lovely! Explained everything very clearly, gave me a wonderful view, and was just a delight to talk to. The location is fantastic and the room itself is incredibly comfortable and cozy.

title: Perfect place in a perfect location
text: Clean, Safe, courteous, professional, attentive- loved that you were only able to access the hotel lobby without room key and that your room key was tied directly to your floor- Convenient to all- clean exactly as pictured- Thank you

title: Good location and value but very unclean
text: Hotel is in a great location and really is good value for money however the rooms were extremely dirty with crumbs etc. left. There was an eyemask left behind on the bed from a previous guest. I'm thankful that I was only staying for a short while.

title: Poorly managed overall
text: Need to work on your fire drills , everyone panicked on the stairs coming down at early hours of the morning , need to welcome guests properly and give them a understanding of how things are done on the establishment, perhaps a guidance pack , you should have information about the restaurant and bar area

title: Repeat Visitor
text: The POD on 42nd is a great place to stay if you are all about Times Square and Broadway. It is all about the sights and not the room size. I feel safe and secure while there.  The rooms are clean and being close to everything is a plus!!

title: Paraíso
text:
Tudo de bom .....uma maravilha de lugar. Local calmo e agradável...

Voltarei lá sim ...eu e minha família
Tudo bem organizado e sempre bem limpo. As pessoas são maravilhosas e atenciosas
Amei , tudo de bom

title: Excelente
text: Muy buen servicio! Muy limpios y cómodos. Me gusto mucho el servicio Las camas y el cuarto muy Excelentepara el precio y lo mejor fue la ubicación, cerca de todo. 100% recomendado si viajas solo o con amigos.

title: Perfect place for a mother daughter trip
text: I got the bunk bed room for my sixteen year old daughter and I for a mother daughter trip to see some musicals. It was perfect. The room was small, but we hardly spent any time there so it met our needs perfectly. The location and cost was great!

title: Good location and price
text: Good location, very good price and clean . The service was very good . There is also a restaurant in the top  with a good Italian food , in medium prices . So close to time square, good restaurants, near mini markets , deli , coffee shop, some museums , madam tissot and broadway.

title: Ideal budget location to see a Broadway show
text: The room was clean and quiet, albeit small (which we anticipated). The Pod Times Hotel is in a great location for folks wanting to stay within walking distance of theatres in the 40's. Very reasonably priced and helpful, friendly staff.  I would definitely stay here again!

title: Excelente ubicación
text: Excelente ubicación, a pasos de TS. Locales de comida y mercados, habitación pequeña pero funcional.  Estaciones de metro cercanas, teatros. Todo muy a la mano. Recomiendo absolutamente para parejas y viajes de negocios o vacaciones sin niños.

title: AWFUL NOT WORTH THE CONVENIENCE TO PORT AUTHORITY ••• VERY SMALL ROOMS. Unprofessional front desk staff. VERY VERY LOUD
text:
I’ve dtayed at Pod 51 over one dozen times in the past 7-10 yrs - this newest TS location was NOT at all the ssme!
Terrible customer service at front desk. Rooms bery small evrn for POD. Housekeeping was lovely and very polite. When I called ahead for address and cross street the person had no idea!!

title: PODS Time Square - Great Value!
text: NYC is expensive, the POD Time Square was 1/2 the price of most other hotels and fit our budget for 4 nights. The rooms are small but very clean, all staff excellent. Our room had a Queen Bed, standup glass shower with awesome controls, TV, Bluetooth alarm radio and a huge safe. It had a very European feel which we like. In NYC you just need a clean place to sleep, you're not hanging out in your room all day.

title: Great Experience
text: Sahar was great at customer service during check in and very proactive. Good sized room with everything you need. The lights literally could perform every function from dimming to being easily accessible despite being a smaller room.

title: Excellent stay at the Pod
text: The staff are friendly and helpful. The beds have cotton sheets and are very comfortable. House keeping will come everyday if requested. The room is clean and has everything required for a short stay.

title: Pods Time Square
text: Great location. Easy access to Times Square, bus station, train station and subway. Room was small but very comfortable. Nice shower with nice towels. Bunk beds were comfortable with separate tv’s upper and lower.

title: Excelente
text: Right place right location righ staff perfect Safe location for families groups close to all when I planing my net trip to New York  will sty in the same place loved thanks to all from the arrival to departure everyone was so nice

title: Great stay at time square area!
text: Overall this place is great. Lowest price I could find at time square with good reviews at short period. Short walking distance if you take the Bus and subways are a short walk too. Close too a lot of attractions.  Definitely will stay here again when I go visit New York City again.

title: Hotel at the pulsing heart of NYC
text: Ideal location, walking distance to Times Square, theaters, Metro Lines and Central Park. Rooms are small, but very functional and the views are awesome. The services are very helpful and also included some guided tours.

title: I love Pod hotels
text: I love Pod hotels. So clean and modern but simple. Sahar checked me in and was so friendly and professional. Easy access to anything you want to do in NYC. I went to US tennis open and had a blast. Met up with friends and found great restaurants.

title: Great  basic hotel in ideal location
text: Clean, basic hotel in central position. Helpful staff. Easy book in/out. Had everything I needed - towels, washing products, hair dryer and I could leave my luggage in a store on final day. Good restaurant for evening meal and breakfast

title: Muy buena opción
text: Excelente ubicación!!! La atención de Sahar en el el check in impecable. Resolvió todas las situaciones que le planteamos en cuanto a método de pago. El hotel tiene una terraza donde se puede llevar comida y cenar allí

title: Great location and reasonable pricing
text: Pod is a great budget friendly hotel.  I've stayed numerous times and the rooms are clean and have adequate, but basic appointments.  The pricing is usually pretty good, though the fees are a bit high.  The location is superb being right on 42nd

title: I like n my friends like it to
text: Sahar , the last three times I was there she always help me she’s really fast and always like oh she served me didn’t make it difficult made it easy and I had to go back and add more days and she made it so simple just to do it that’s why I was like coming back here

title: Did not give my money back !
text: I stayed at the hotel on July 21st and 22nd. The hotel was fine. But they charged me US$417 for “safety” (that money that they are supposed to give you back after your stay).Today, August 28th, I haven’t received it yet !

title: Functional & Modern
text: We stayed for 3 nights in Pod Times Square. It is a hotel located close to Times Square with all the comodities associated to a well located premise. The room is quite small but enough if what you want is visiting the city and using the hotel for sleeping purposes. Note that they don't do the cleaning every day, but you could request it. It is quite new, it is well isolated and the staff is really nice. We had a great stay!

title: Location great, cleanliness below average
text: Clogged sink would not drain. I appreciated that someone located the source and cleaned the drain, but I found the offending object, caked in gunk and hair, on the bathroom floor next to the trash can.

title: Really nice!
text: I have had a very nice stay at the Pod Times Square and will definitely come back for another visit when I stay in the City. I love how so much can be discovered on foot right from the hotel, the hotel even offers free walking tours, those should be advertised better - I only saw them on the day of my check-out.

title: Good
text: The bed linen and towels were a little stained the first time, but apart from that everything was fine. The location was great, the Times square was about 5-10 min walk. We are satisfied with the hotel overall.

title: Week trip to nyc
text: We stayed for 8 nights and every thing was pretty good. We opted out of the everyday room service because it was at 9 am every day and we preferred to sleep in, we didn’t mind too much though. If we did run out of anything we were able to call the front desk and they would bring it up quickly. We would have liked for the room to have tissue but that is splitting hairs. The only major issue is that the bathroom door would drift open while you were inside. The bathroom is all glass so you already don’t have a ton of privacy. Would not recommend coming here with someone you are not really comfortable with. Over all for the price and location you can’t really beat it.

title: Decent hotel in NYC
text: Room was small but clean and functional. Comfy bunk beds (wider than I expected based on hotel images) but terrible pillows that need replaced. Safety deposit box was broken, air con was noisy and you could hear noise from neighbouring rooms. I only stayed one night so didn’t use any of the other facilities but it’s in a great location close to Times Square and Hudson Yard.

title: New York
text: Clean, cosy lodging,  just around the corner of Times Square. I definitely would come back. It's fully worthwhile for cost-conscious traveling. Also, I like to recommend the  excellent Check-In and Concierge Services offered by Sahar.

title: small room but fully equipped
text:
Check in and out was very good. Luggage storage was excellent service.  
I stayed at the hotel for 12 nights during which I visited the balcony on the 28th floor, there is good air and the possibility of work and observation. The bar on the lobby floor provides pleasant and effective service and you can order food there. The elevator service is available and fast, which is very important, especially for high floors.
The cleanliness of the rooms is reasonable but not perfect.
The shower is amazing with a strong stream and relatively large for the size of the room.

title: Great stay in the heart of NYC
text:
Very clean, very quiet, friendly staff!
The room is very small, but very functional. The size is as in the description, therefore it does not have to be a surprise! We clearly recommend this place!!!!

title: Fourth Visit - and will return
text:
I believe this is my 4th time staying at the property either solo, with family, or with a friend.  The POD hotels in NYC continue to be my "go-to" for value in the city.  (I've stayed at the 39th Street location and I am planning a trip to the midtown location this fall.) 

Our bunk room was ready when we arrived hours before the published check-in time. This is was a nice surprise!  Check-in was efficient and friendly.   Our room location gave us a view down 9th Avenue of the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood.  

The room:
Decent cleanliness.   There is a little mildew build-up in one corner of the shower and possibly a small  water leak from the shower pan into the guestroom causing some bubbling of the wall behind the lower bed.  No odor of dampness in the room.  Linens and terry were clean.  Beds were comfortable.   All the outlets worked.  Have always appreciated the roomy shower and rain shower head.   The AC unit cooled the room quickly when we wanted it to.  Lighting is bright. There is a safe if you need it.  

Things that could be better:
By day three our small bar of hand wash soap was just about done.  I know we could have called and gotten another.  How about a wall-mounted dispenser for soap and lotion like the ones in the shower?
One more set of towels (we had two sets) would make it easier to avoid having housekeeping come for a three-night stay for two people and not take up any more room on the rack.
The reading lights are great but show age and do not always turn off after use.  I know this from a past visit and actually brought a small roll of tape with me so that I could tape them "closed" if necessary.  It is probably time to replace them, put them on a switch, do something with them.

Things to know: 
The shutters are great to let light in and for privacy, but they will not fully black-out the room. Bring an eye mask if you need 100% dark to sleep and/or plan to sleep late. 
The TV remotes will work both TV sets.  Aim straight at the TV so the signal doesn't bounce off the walls and onto the other TV set.  This can be annoying but the fix is not practical for a hotel.  
There is a small convenience store almost right next door for water etc. There is no refrigerator or microwave (or room for them!) There is a larger bodega about a block away.  
We had two carry-on sized suitcases, two back backs, and one handbag and were just about out of space to store things for easy access.  You will need to be prepared to live out of your suitcase and pack/unpack things as you need them to keep yourselves able to walk around the room.  That said, we also did some shopping and had no issues finding creative places to stash things when needed.  
It's easiest to plan for one person to be in the bathroom getting ready to go out while the other is in the "room."  
I've never had an issue with noise from other rooms or the hallway.  
I brought a small travel extension cord with USB/C and plugs on it that we plugged in under the desk for extra outlets.  But we would have been fine with plugging in phones at the bedside, laptops on the beds when we went out for the day etc.  
Wifi signal was good.  

The hotel offers luggage storage. Since our room was ready we did not need this service.  I also have never used the lobby or concierge services.  

The bar/lounge has a great outdoor terrace but it was completely empty at 9 pm on Saturday night.  It was unclear whether we could sit and get service outside so we didn't stay.

title: Adequate for the price
text: No real complaints except, for me, the beds were uncomfortable. Check in was easy enough, but staff wasn't too interested/able in helpful info/advice. However, at checkout the concierge was very helpful and interested in assisting me with info, cab arrangements, etc. But I wasn't expecting too much in the way of "luxury" in the room or service from the staff. I chose it for location and price and was content with my stay.

title: Amazing hotel! Highly recommend
text: Hotel staff ws super friendly and helpful. Easy check in and out process. Clean and efficient rooms. Highly recommend if you are just using the hotel to sleep and get ready to travel the city. Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Great hotel, Best location
text: Very clean and nice hotel near to times square. If I visit NY again, I Will stay in this hotel for sure. Best price in town, in this dates, good service and amability. Best choise definitly. Thanks for all

title: Value for money
text: Great Location! Yes the rooms are on the cosy side but it's exactly as you'd except. It has everything that you need. Ideal for a short stay. Beds are comfy. Didn't try the rooftop bar but it looks cool

title: Perfect stay in every way!
