text: This hotel was perfect for our stay in NYC.  Location is very convenient but not close to the noise of the city.  The room was spotless and the rainfall shower was awesome.  Lots of food options and conveniences in the area.  Front Desk staff were friendly and very accommodating.

title: Bank holiday break
text: Stayed at the pod for 3 nights with a friend, whilst small the room is functional and well located. I would stay again for a short break as we we were hardly in the room as NYC has so much to offer so your not in the room much

title: Great service. Clean rooms and extremely helpful personel.
text: This is a really great hotel. Excellent service! The room was nice and clean. One employee was extremely helpful to me. His name is Zaheim Jones. I was traveling solo to NY and lost my wallet with everything in it. I had no money left and no access to my money. Due to this i had to walk up to 10 miles to the hotel and was exhausted and hungry. After trying several things to acces my money i went distraught. Zaheim noticed something was wrong and asked me how he could help. I asked for left overs from the hotel restaurant because i needed to eat something. He invited me to the restaurant and paid for dinner with his own money. He even offered me to get some cash from the ATM after is sent him money trough PayPal. After that i still could enjoy New York City and had a great time. I am very grateful that he helped me out. So when i am again in New York i definately go back to this hotel.

title: Fantastic beginning to end
text: From the moment we got into the elevator and it was playing one of my teenager’s favorite pop songs, this hotel was great.  Nothing extra, no pool or gym or whatever but we didn’t need those—we aren’t in Times Square to hang out in the hotel!  The room was immaculately clean and well-kept

title: you get what you pay for!
text:
Stayed for two nights. Anywhere else this would be a two star review, but rating has to reflect the value vs other hotels in NYC.  Once you factor cost, then its not that bad. Yes, room is small and basic. But it has everything you need. Plus given the central location its likely most time will be spent exploring.  Bunk beds were comfortable, although slight issue with our tv's as one remote seemed to change channels on the other tv? Also strange light system by the bed which really doesnt work as far too temperamental and keeps switching itself on! 
But shower effective and soundproofing, given location, also good.

title: Mom and daughter trip
text: We stayed in a bunk room. Room was very clean and had everything we needed. The cleaning staff did an exceptional job each day in our room. We brought extra hangers and foldable bins to make a drawer for each of us to keep organized. Our full size suitcases fit at the end of the bunk beds.

title: room are very small but excellent location
text: The title says all: the room are very little, but the position in Manhattan and the friendliness of the stuff somehow manage to compensate. Anyway, we did not come to New York to stay in our room, did we?

title: Excelente hotel
text: La estadía en el hotel fue excelente. Las habitaciones son tal cual muestran en las fotos. Se nota que es un hotel moderno. Destaco la rapidez de la empleada que nos atendió para hacer el check in y la vista que teníamos en la habitación.

title: The Pod was perfect for the two of us
text: The Pod in Times Square was perfect for my daughter and I. Location was great for what we wanted to do. Close enough to everything but far enough that we weren't in the middle of craziness. Room was small, but that is the point of it. It had everything (a small fridge would have been a + though, but it was okay). The bed and bathroom were clean. The staff were truly so friendly and courteous. Felt safe at the Pod and I would recommend it to people. We will be staying again for our next NYC trip.

title: Clean and well located
text: Enjoyed the trip so far. Very clean and in a very good location at Times Square.  Friendly personal and a free welcome drink. Pretty accommodations. Very noisy though, heard cars honking and police cars. But I guess that’s normal in a big city.

title: Small clean rooms, awesome location!
text: We stayed in the bunk bed room. It was tiny, but clean and comfy. The hotel resto/bar is great, but closes early. You can’t beat the location! Right in the heart of Times Square. Check-in and check-out were super easy.

title: Staying in the city
text: It’s a pod so don’t expect a regular hotel room.  As an older person with some joint issues, I need a little more room, with a more comfortable mattress.  The bed felt more like a futon bed.  Without that issue would stay there again. It good for young people on a budget. I loved the restaurant and the servers were very good

title: Manager of the bar in the lobby
text: Hotel was nice rooms are small the manager          at the bar was very.   rude and disrespectful.   he discriminated against me due to my gender he s a     very         unpleasant         individual

title: Great location within minutes of times square, theaters, etc.
text:
Very good the location and price, you are within minutes of times square, theaters and two major hubs of the subway.
Consider that the rooms are really small. nicely decorated but definitely small. Consider this for long stays.
On the strange part, the restroom has a slide glass door without knob to lock it.

title: Nice stay
text: Hotel bem localizado, muito perto da Times Square e de vários pontos turísticos da cidade de New York. Funcionários do hotel bem preparados para atender as necessidades dos clientes com eficiência e cordialidade. O quarto poderia ter ilum pequeno frigobar.

title: Fantastic place to stay on a budget
text: Rooms were on the small side - but you probably guessed that by the name. However, they were clean, and the staff was phenomenal! And since we were only there to sleep and get ready to go out, we didn’t need much space. We were not familiar with the city, and they took extraordinary care of us. There is also a great bar and lounge area to relax in. I loved the fact that only people who are staying at the hotel and have a key card can get anywhere close to the rooms. That’s going to be a HUGE plus for me when I travel to New York solo next month.

title: Great location but tiny
text:
this hotel is at a great location in Manhattan, but the room is too tiny to the point that you literally do not want to be in it but just to sleep and shower. No condiments. No plugs next to the bed. They also don't come and clean your room unless you ask them to. Scanty bedding and our room s carpet and the hallway was not cleaned properly and it is generally a bit dirty. The music in the escalator is loud.

It has a wonderful restaurant/dining area and beautiful lobby.

title: Good
text: Value was good. I stayed for a couple of days with a friend and Times Square was a 5 minute walk from the hotel. Room very small but it was all we really needed. The subways are everywhere and it was affordable

title: Wow
text: I will stay here every time I'm in nyc. The reduced price for parking was so amazing and the staff were so nice and helpful. The rooms and hotel were clean and safe! No unauthorized access to floors you don't stay on! Very safe and nice.

title: Peaceful and convenient
text: Sahar was amazing and made my stay enjoyable! You can tell she’s a people-person and loves what she does. My stay was quiet and peaceful. I also didn’t expect the space to have the amenities it does. I booked it last minute and it exceeded my expectations.

title: Great Location
text: No muss, no fuss rooms but centrally located.  Rooms were clean, and while not spacious, made good use of all the space that is available.  Our queen bed was comfortable and room was quiet.  Would stay here again.

title: Great Stay!
text: The location of this hotel was great. It was central to everything and there was easy access to different kinds of public transport. The room was small, but it had everything you could need. For the price and location, it was definitely worth it.

title: NYC trip
text: Perfekt location, very nice people at the desk and the luggage room. Rooms are very small but absolutely clean. We  really enjoyed our 3 days stay in New York City and for sure we will be coming back next year.

title: Convenient room w/ great view; service needs TLC
text: I don’t think you can beat this price for a clean room in Times Square, with a view of the city (and somewhat of a view of the Hudson). It was small but clean and tidy; AC worked great, beds were comfy enough, with a working TV per bunk. Completely silent too (at least on the 10th floor), despite the square below. Bathroom stocked with soap, body wash, hair stuff. The hallways have an interesting sci-fi bunker feel to them. When we first arrived to check in, there was a slight miscommunication; our 3rd party booking receipt had made it seem like we already paid the hotel resort fee, but the employee at the front desk said we had not and she would charge our card the fee now. This was fine, just a confusing wording on the booking site’s end, but the clerk had an odd attitude even before we began talking. She didn’t seem to want to deal with guests at all. Maybe a personality thing. Every other employee we spoke too was friendly and helpful enough, though. One other small disappointment was when we were given vouchers for free cocktails (for our first stay there?), and looked forward to those all day, only to realize it was Monday and the bar/restaurant was closed. The one day of the week it’s closed, and they knew we were only there for one night. Oh well—-would still come again for the convenient location and price.

title: タイムズスクエアに近くて便利な場所
text: お部屋は綺麗でUSBコンセントがとても多く、スマホ等の充電には十分な数。アメニティは歯ブラシは自分で持って行く必要あり。バスタブは無くシャワーだけ。シャンプー、コンディショナー、ボディーソープは備え付けの物がある。ホテルの隣に商店があり、すぐに飲み物を買いに行く事ができる。少し歩けばスーパーマーケットのターゲットがある。地下鉄の駅までも歩いて５分もかからず、バスターミナルの中を歩けば雨にほとんどぬれずに地下鉄の駅まで行く事もできる。タイムズスクエアに近く、歩いても７,８分もあれば十分に着けるとても便利な立地。観光で使うには便利な立地。

title: Could be cleaner
text:
The toilet has poop stains every afternoon (after leaving all day and I did not poop or my daughter in the hotel bathroom). The carpet is the cheapest of quality and stuck to my bare feet, which felt gross.
All & all, great location & too expensive for the quality received.

title: Big value. Small room.
text: We stayed in a queen bed room, which is 10ft wide by 15ft long. This is big enough for a queen bed, a small desk, a very small table, and a bathroom. The room is well appointed for the size and all the materials and finishes are high quality. If you are traveling light, solo or as a couple, and don't have an issue with being in a small room, this is one of the best values in the city. If you need a larger room for all your stuff or traveling with kids, probably better off with a larger room.

title: A good stay but nothing spectacular
text: I asked a me ever if staff in passing if it were possible to get ice brought up to out room and he answered as though he had no idea and no intention of getting accurate information for us. Do i head up to my room and call the front desk directly regarding ice for my room and the gentleman who picked up answered me very condescendingly as though it was the stupidest most absurd request he’d heard of. I completely understand if a hotel is unable to accommodate something simply if the don’t offer it. but it’s not okay to make a guest feel that way. thanks.

title: Fantastic
text: Fantastic location. Clean and quiet room. I'll go again next time in New York city. Great staff at reception. Modern style. Short distance to subway. Very close to Broadway shows. Food near by. What else I can ask for?

title: Perfect vacation
text: Friendly and helpful staff, in a great location. I loved the tiny room - yes they are small, just like the pictures. But clean and comfortable. I will try to book here every time I’m in New York from now on.

title: Very good
text: Great location. Close to bus station and subway. Convenience store and food market just under the building. Room was just right for one person. Cleaning service when required and requested only. They also offered to keep my luggage in the storage after check out for pick up later in the day when I had my bus.

title: POD Time Square is very good.
text: It is my first time staying in POD. I selected Time Square for convenience. POD room is clean and comfortable. The hotel guests are international. They are also very polite and friendly. Although there are many rooms on one floor, elevators are very fast. The waiting time is short.

title: Ice only at the restaurant
text: Front desk staff is very friendly and professional, but if I could make a suggestion, invest in an ice machine. If the restaurant is closed (and it closes at 10) there’s no ice. Every hotel should give at least ice, that’s like hotel 101 lol

title: Kathy. Is. Awesome.
text: Kathy- From her phone etiquette to her A+ service at check in, I’m astounded at the professionalism and kindness of her. I will be staying in this hotel again if for no other reason than the excellent service given by Kathy. She made my stay, I was having a stressful nyc stay and she made it better. She is an asset. Thank you Kathy.

title: Nice, clean modern facility
text:
Nice hotel, clean and comfortable.
 I would stay there again.  I did not like the location, but the bus service was excellent in the area.
I think they should eliminate the music they play in the lobby.  The lobby should just be a quiet environment.  Also, I think they could serve coffee in the morning in the lobby, but not essential since there are plenty of places outside to get coffee

title: For sleeping, not working; but location is worth the compromises
text:
Placement and number of traditional outlets was awkward but manageable (if you happen to have a bunch of USB-A cables, that is... otherwise you're screwed). Recessed outlets prevent many types of AC adapters from fitting. Also, the HDMI plug on the wall which was presumably for the TV, didn't work, nor did the wireless streaming option. 
Wi-Fi speeds were not the worst I've seen at a hotel.. but not great.
Arrival experience only marred by the two-elevator setup but I realize there's not much you can do about that.
Staff was very friendly, no complaints there.
Would definitely have liked a coffeemaker (I get it, there just aren't enough surfaces or outlets); but the lack of a mini fridge was the biggest downside. If you get up in the middle of the night or the morning and need a drink, your options are tapwater or the warm, flat remnants of what you bought yesterday. Ick

title: Pod Times Square stay
text: We chose the place based on the location and on the price. The room was quite tiny but it was ok for two people. The game to clean the room everyday or you can chose when they come. The staff was friendly enough. We enjoyed our stay there.

title: Disappointing and cringy
text: This seems like a nice property at first glance. It is modern, and the rooms are very tiny. That did not bother us. However, waking up to find a bug bed in my bed is not something I’ve experienced before. We did mention it to the front desk and they said they would clean this room and the surrounding rooms deeply. However, that doesn’t make me feel better about sleeping with bugs.

title: NYC
text: Went with extended family to New York City for the usual sightseeing shopping dining. The hotel looks fabulous from the outside with clean lines. Modern furnishings minimal minimalist design. Customer service was exceptional especially Sahar. Housekeepers are great. Rooms are cool with a great noise, isolation and the views at night heart amazing. I liked the showers. The beds, the outlets for a charging electronic equipment. The safe for storing of Watertown belongings are a plus. The hallways are carpeted which allows you to walk with no shoes just in case needed much noise and Gerald pleasant experience. The hotel is within walking distance of so many good attractions and diming shopping locations, making it of tremendous value for the dollar you’re paying I cannot recommend it enough.

title: Clean but the carpet in hallway smells.
text: It's a great location in Times Square Area of New York City. It needs more attention to detail and to clean it better. The hallways had a foul smell do to the dirty carpet. Maybe shampoo it more often.

title: Great stay/location/price
text: Great stay, location was perfect for time square adventures. Was a great price point. Building felt very safe. Staff were very friendly.was able to check in super early which was nice. Checked out easily with a simple drop box.

title: Few days before international flight
text: I stay here whenever I fly in/out of NY. The TS location is so convenient; the quality is reliable and consistent. It's such a relief to know that I'll be able to relax before/after a long-haul flight.

title: Super
text: Very good value for money, clean and silent. Rooms are small but essential and functional, there is everything you need for a good stay. There was a problem with a room and they changed it keeping the view that we had.

title: Fantastic hotel
text: Excellent location.  Rooms were exactly what you need for a city trip.  Very clean and well organized.  Staff were very helpful and friendly.  I stayed here with my 12 year old son and had a great time.  Absolutely no complaints about the hotel.  Loved it!

title: Close to busy area - in god and bad
text: Very nice staff and easy check in and out. Rooms are rather small but have evrything you need and they are clean. Outside is s budy street which we could hear quite well in our room, so it was a bit noisy. We visited a broadway show which was in walking distance which is really nice! Overall good for some nights but not relaxing for longer stays.

title: Good location, great experience
text: Nice place, clean, but very very small! No commun area, so if you need more space, you should go outside! Perfect if you just want a place to sleep. We appreciate our experience. Staff were helpful, we definitely recommend.

title: Great experience for a good price
text: This hotel offers all the basic amenities for a good price. The location is prime: right at Times Square and a few blocks away from a central subway station. If you want a fancy/deluxe hotel experience, this place is not for you. If you want a comfortable, clean, safe space to store your stuff, bathe, and sleep after you've roamed around NYC, then this hotel is ideal.

title: The view!!
text: My son and I did a 3 night stay to NYC and chose Pod Times Square. The bunk bed room was perfect for us. We arrived late around midnight due to flight delay, but no trouble checking in. When we got up to our room on the 12th floor, our view of the NYC nighttime city scape took our breath away. I was not expecting that view. We could see all the way down to World trade one downtown. Then when we woke up in the am and saw the view at daytime, just beautiful. The beds we’re comfortable, I slept like a baby, and the room and bathroom were very clean. We had maid service daily, with new towels and beds made up. It was a perfect fit for us and a highly recommend.

title: Great hotel and location
text: Great hotel. Rooms are small...but very confortable. And you don't go to NYC to spend your day in yor hotel room! Great location with only à few minutes walk of the subway with several lines and the Port Authority Bus Terminal.

title: Cleaning
text: The cleaning was unsuccessful. I want it every day and never the housekeeper went to the room.The other service were very good. The location is perfect if you are going to use the train and go to tinessquare

title: Staying at the POD
text: What a great location, clean room, helpful and friendly staff. Room was small but very comfortable for sleeping.  We had a great stay and we will surely keep this hotel in my next time we are in New York City.

title: All the Basics covered
text:
Clean rooms and functional. 
It covers the basics but not a lot of extras (no fridge or microwave in rooms).  The room was small but that was expected. The trip was to explore the city and crash at the end of the day. The room was great for that- sleeping.

title: Great for getting out and exploring the city
text: Rooms are small, but that is not a problem when all you need is just a place to crash at night and rest so you can just regain strength for your next day. Location is awesome, with the Times Square a couple of blocks away, and easy access to public transportation. The rooms are clean, and the staff is very friendly. The only thing we missed was having a small fridge, because it would be nice to have a way to cool drinks and conserve leftovers from big food portions.

title: great stay!
text: this hotel is perfect if you want to be near Times Square. The room is small but very clean, big window, big TV, enough space for your bags, a chair and bedside table. Bathroom bigger than expected. We would stay here again and the price is right!

title: Nice service
text: it’s worth the price we paid. Everything is petfect, except the bathroom curtain, it’s smelly(it smells like an unwashable  old rotten rug. I want to complain but I’m thinking they might move us in  different room.  I like te room that we had and also the views at the windows  was awe. We could see the front view in our window. I suppose to give a rate of perfect 10, it’s just the smelly curtain why they deserve to have a 9 stars.

title: Muy buena ubicación. Hotel moderno y personal excelente.  100% Recomendable
text: Excelente ubicación a una cuadra del Terminal de buses de Nueva York la que conecta con varias líneas de metro. Habitaciones pequeñas pero cómodas y modernas, baño de buen tamaño con los accesorios necesarios, lo que debo destacar es la atención del personal, muy atentos y preocupados, en el equipo hay varias personas que hablan español lo que se agradece. 100% recomendable.

title: מלון המוני, רועש עם חדרים קטנטנים
text: המלון ממוקם באזור מרכזי מאוד אבל הוא סואן ורועש. הצוות מאוד לא אדיב. ביקשתי בזמן ההזמנה יציאה מאוחרת וקיבלתי תשובה שזה יהיה תלוי בזמינות ושאני מתבקשת לבוא בבוקר האחרון לברר את הזמינות. כשהגעתי ערב לפני העזיבה לבקש יציאה מאוחרת הסבירו לי שאין בכלל דבר כזה. החדרים ממש קטנים ואי אפשר לזוז בהם.

title: The check in service
text: The check in service is bad, not explaining why there is additional charge 98$, just say you have to pay. The second day when I was asking if possible to switch a room due to the floor I was staying was very noisy at night, staff was not helpful. Also the room was not cleaned everyday, it was cleaned every 2 days, not sure if that’s your hotel routine?

title: Good stay
text: Very nice place in a very nice location, clean and not expencive. The only disadvantage is that the bar.restaurant is working with unusual working hours, and the sitting room should be more often accesible.

title: Estadía en el POD
text: Nos alojamos 4 noches en una habitación doble con literas y baño privado. Por el precio abonado estuvo bien y principalmente porque eran pocos días ya que la habitación es pequeña, básica y hay que anotarse para la limpieza ya que no es diaria.

title: Great Location / Dated Hotel
text: Hotel was in a super convenient location. Room was clean, but smelled of pot in both the hallway and room. I can’t stand that smell so actually didn’t sleep well because of it. Staff was very nice. Hotel hallways were dark and in need of update.

title: Pod Time
text: Super place will come back anytime because it’s near every thing. Staff was cool and restaurant great, only problem was housekeeping, not so good, it was or is on demand.  However, will choose it again.

title: Cómodo, Limpio, Bien Ubicado y Personal súper Agradable
text:
Decidí pasar un día en Nueva York antes de coger mi  vuelo de vuelta a Madrid porque NY es mi ciudad por excelencia y siempre que puedo aprovecho y hago una escapada.

Elegí este hotel porque ya conozco esta cadena de hoteles de otros viajes que me he quedado en la ciudad.

El hotel está súper bien ubicado. El tamaño de la habitación no es tan pequeño como parece y para lo que yo uso la habitación(descansar y ducharme) es más que suficiente.
El personal es muy atento y amable.

Se ve nuevo y la limpieza está muy cuidad.

Y lo más importante, en comparación con otros hoteles, el precio está genial!!!

Lo recomiendo al 300%

title: Friendly and No Fuss
text: The rooms are tiny but exactly what you expect either Pod. They were clean and tidy but the stand out was the staff at this location. Everyone super friendly, helpful, and welcoming. Location is in a great spot for a variety of things and was super quick & easy to get to and from Madison Square Garden

title: Excellent staff!
text: While you get what you pay for as far as the room goes, the desk staff are the quality you’d expect from a higher end hotel. They were maybe the friendliest team I’ve ever encountered when staying in NYC.

title: Excelente!!!!
text: iPod time square es una excellence opción. Tiene una excelente ubicación, de fácil acceso al transporte público. Está cerca de los sitios emblemáticos de New York. Y tiene una vista espectacular de la ciudad desde su roof top.

title: Basic, modern accomodation in great location
text: The rooms are very small but very functional - all you need. They were clean and comfortable in a great location. In house restaurant was good. The new way to travel and keep costs down. We had a bunk room

title: Vacation July 2023
text:
I went solo by first time to New York. Pod hotel was the best choice!
the location is awesome, next to time square and the 42st bus station.
I would recommend this hotel for those who travel solo, couple or business!

title: Perfect for our stay
text: We were looking for a safe, simple, clean and affordable option for our stay in NYC and The Pod Times Square was perfect. It was close to great food in both economical dining (Great $1.50 pizza!) and fine dining and close to the subway station for seeing the sights. Our room was clean and had a great city view. It was very quiet once everything was closed up for the evening or we could open the window and experience the sounds of the city outside. My one tip would be to let the front desk know if you need room cleaning or extra towels. Our stay was short so just new towels was all we needed. Also, we did not know until leaving, but on your check out day if you need them to hold your bags for the day before departing, they will. I thought this was a nice bonus.

title: Room is alright, Service is not so good
text:
Room is tiny, but has everything you need to sleep, shower and store your luggage.
Service at the front desk was terrible. The hotel in general is very packed, and the staff did not seem very concerned about helping out guests.

title: Perfect Location and Stay for a Midtown Manhattan Visit!
text: The Pod Hotel at Times Square was everything we could ask for. EXCELLENT location for midtown Manhattan fun, helpful staff who informed us about nearest subway to use, and nearby restaurants, etc, our room was sleek and modern and made excellent use of the space, VERY CLEAN, price was reasonable for NYC and beds were comfy. We felt refreshed and revived during our stay even in the heat and humidity of July. I highly recommend the Pod Hotel near Times Square.

title: Clean, Secure, Noisy hallways
text: Pod hotel offers a clean and secure stay right in the heart of NYC. The rooms are small but most people don’t come to NY to stay in their room. The beds are comfortable. The hallway noise (most notably adjacent room doors opening and closing) is very audible throughout the night and can be disruptive to sleep.

title: Perfect location
text: Great hotel. The service was great and very friendly. I would recommend others to come and stay. Rooms were easy enough to maneuver. I am definitely going to be staying there again for my future trips.

title: Affordable lodging at great location
text: I liked this hotel for several reasons.  First and foremost, this was a relatively affordable price for Manhattan.  Second, I appreciated the stylish design and features of both the public areas and the room I stayed in.  Very clever ways to make a small room work, such as the light fixtures in the headboard.  I also appreciated the cleanliness.  And finally, great location, especially convenient to public transportation.   I will stay here again.

title: Excellent
text:
Super nice reception staff.  Knowledgeable and clearly nothing is too much of a trouble.
Location is super central to Times Square and rooms are just perfect.  Very spacious shower and very comfy beds (even when running a fever and sleeping many many hours to recover).
Transport-wise, it's very close to the Subway and connections to the airport.

title: Great location and value
text: Perfect for budget-conscious travelers who won't spend much time in the room. The cheapest rooms in Manhattan that aren't at a hostel or have a shared bathroom. The rooms are small but certainly manageable and have great storage features and a full bathroom. The bed is also VERY comfortable, one of the best hotel beds I've had! They have a bunk bed room if you are traveling with another person but don't want to share a bed with them--great idea! The location is amazing: easy walking distance from Port Authority, Penn Station, Times Square, Central Park, and all subway lines. I was a female traveling alone and felt safe in the hotel and outside. Staff was friendly and helpful. Quick check in and check out process. My only note is the rooms are showing some wear and tear, like rust in the shower and water stains on the ceiling. The rooms are clean and nothing is broken, but they are certainly showing their usage. I would stay here again and will recommend it to others!

title: Exceeded my expectations
text: Safety, cleanliness and location are my top priorities when I travel. My room at The Pod exceeded all of my expectations without my having to pay for extra floor space I don't need. I will seek out this brand in the future.

title: Fantastic find of a hotel!
text:
The Pod hotel ticks all the right boxes. The staff were helpful and informative. The rooms were really well designed and very clean.
The hotel has a terrace with a bar and this was a lovely place to sit in the evening and played good music. The hotel restaurant was really good value and a lot of good choices (particularly if you are vege). I highly recommend the bianco pizza or spaghetti with cacio and pepe sauce.
Housekeeping were amazing with the bed being made every day and bathroom cleaned.
The hotel is in a great location: close to all the attractions and local amenities. A Sichuan restaurant is opposite which was probably the best Chinese food I’ve tasted. 
The hotel also arranged transport to the airport and helped me with my luggage – an excellent added bonus!
Really good value for money.

title: Just what I needed for the long weekend
text: Hotel is Perfectly located, it smells really good when you get in to take the elevator, it is very price friendly. The check in and out was very smooth, not complicated at all. I only would like to have Serafina, the restaurant, opened until later, for some reason it closes too early, so no drinks available after the shows.

title: Nic Hotel
text: Good shower, great beds, friendly personel, perpect location for sightseeing Manhattan. nearby good restauarants, diners etc. Suppermarket on the corners. nearby metro station. Good connection bij metro and train to JFK airport

title: Perfect location, clean
text: Location is excellent, rooms are tiny, but we expected that. Very clean. Nice staff and service. Every request was solved immediately. Beds are comfortable. Lots of electric outlets. Everything was better than expected

title: The place you're looking for to stay in NY
text: If you're looking for a modern, equipped, clean hotel in NY, close to Subways, and not too expansive... This is the place ! Roms are just what you need, with cool views on the city. Restaurant inside.

title: Pod Hotel Time Square
text:
Hotel com excelente localização é fácil acesso! Além de ter um rooftop maravilho no lobby! Ganhei muito tempo com ele e com isso qualidade na viagem!

Ele fica ao lado do terminal rodoviário para ir a New Jersey, Washington, etc

Vale muito!

title: Clean, organized, great location!
text: I recommend Pod Times Square to anyone who is looking to be close to common tourist attractions. The location is excellent, and the soundproof windows block out all the outside noise.  Staff was very friendly and helpful. I would recommend to friends.  The rooms are small, but if you are looking for a place to sleep and will be spending most of the day out  and about this hotel is for you. Also, for those of us traveling in the summer I can confirm that the AC is working very well!

title: Great stay for great price
text: We had a great time staying at Pods Time Square! Everything was great and the view of the city was perfect! The room was very clean and well taken care of. The rooms are a little small but how much time are you really gonna spend in there anyway?! It’s was great!!!

title: Awesome Spot!
text: Highly recommend to anyone wanting a central location, with everything within walking distance. Also felt very safe day and night. The room is awesome for two people and loved the space. Cool decor and loves the glass shower!

title: Confortable and excellent location
text: Recommended totally. When I go again, definitely I will stay there. The location is incredible and near to the time square which is most of the main attraction in New York. The room is good and very clean

title: Best location for everything
text: The best place to go if you want to visit NYC. VERY NICE AND COMFY. I am so thankful for friendliest staff and helping me with any needs. The location is perfect place to get food late night. But near to walk around.

title: My stay at POD times square
text: The staff was welcoming and the check-in was fast and smooth. Even though they told me I have to request if I want them to clean. My room was cleaned every day. I really like the location, the price and also the service

title: Review from PHL
text: Great place to stay in NY City. Near in time square, empire state building, subway station, central park. Safety is observe because of police visibility. Proximity to broadway theaters, nice restaurants, coffee shops and may entertainment space in the city. The rooms are clean and the crew are hospitable. Easy to process the check in and check out. Generally, an excellent rating is given for the great service. Will befinitely go back and recommend to tourists who want to visit the new york city. The place is accessible to all mode of transportations most specially the subway and buses. There is a restaurant inside that guests could take advantage if trying to avoid the crowded streets. The price is relatively low as compare with other hotels and accomodations in the city. Highly recommended if staying for ang long vacation because of the cheap price. The hotel is accessible also in various booking sites.

title: Always a pleasure
text:
Great location, great staff, great view this trip and very comfy bed plus lg shower! We always enjoy POD in Times Square. Although we never used them, we were given free drink coupons. The ambience of being in the center of the world can’t be beat. There are coffee shops and a fruit stand around the corner. My church is a half block away. Port Authority for the subway is a block away and we also park across the street where you get discounts with Spot Hero app. Unknowingly, I booked a Saturday matinee play us, Lizard Boy, and we walked out the front door and it was located directly next door!

Although the room square footage is small, the design is great, especially the shower size and its versatility. This time we had skyscraper AND a river view, early check in has never been a problem, and the front desk service is quick, easy and efficient. My only suggestion is and will be to somehow obtain small cushions for the bed corners, as we both bumped into them.

Overall a solid 10!

title: A good stay
text: Found the hotel to be good. Always from Times Square but not far.  The staff was friendly and check in was a breeze. But they only offer maid service if you pay extra. It should be an everyday occurrence.

title: Amazing place
text: Best option in town. I wish stayed more time In there. Place really close to subway, facilities and Times Square is on the corner. The employees was so friendly and helpful. My room had a so nice view.

title: Bonne expérience
text:
Très bon hôtel dû à son emplacement, proche du time square. Cependant, le bruit est très présent. Nous n'étions pas rassuré de sortir le soir, je déconseille aux personnes jeunes et aux jeunes femmes (18-25ans). 
Le métro est proche également. La chambre est petite mais il y en a assez.

title: Mother/Daughter Trip 2023
text: The PODS was a cute hotel. The location was great for walking to places or getting the subway. We felt safe here in the Big City. There is a Starbucks and pizza place across the streets. We were able to nap/sleep anytime of the day it was quiet.

title: NY,NY
text: Friendly staff and room was perfect for what we needed - a place to sleep and shower. Check in/checkout was quick.  Luggage storage was available after checkout. Special note, when I got my morning coffee at Serefina, the server/counter person was a gem!  Just the right touch of humorous sarcasm that I needed to start my day!

title: Best Hotel in Times Square!!
text:
My girlfriend and I booked this hotel last minute after having a terrible experience at a nearby hotel. We visited NYC 2 years ago and stayed at another pod hotel, Pod 51. We decided to try our luck with Pod Times Square and they did not disappoint! They turned our trip around and made visiting NYC stress free!!

 Upon entering the woman helping us check-in was super friendly and accommodating. We overheard her telling a coworker she was working overtime, you would not have even known considering the smile on her face and how quick and efficient she was. She even bumped us up to a queen pod instead of the full pod we booked. I cannot say enough good things about her, someone give this woman a raise 👏🏻 

A gentleman helped us onto the elevator and ensured our key cards worked to get to our floor, which was very appreciated. He really went above and beyond to make us for welcomed! 

Entering our room, we were not disappointed! There is a ton of storage space, the bed linens were spotless, and the bathroom was also very clean. The bed was very comfortable and the checkout time was not until noon, this was great to be able to sleep in and not feel rushed after a late night out in the city. 

The location of Pod Times Square was fantastic, we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go and the self-park garage across the street was great to be able to have access to anything we may have forgot in the car. 
As 2 younger woman staying in the city, we felt very safe here and will definitely be back!! I cannot recommend this hotel enough!! We have been raving about it to everyone since our stay!!! Thank you Pod Times Square!!!

title: Loved our stay
text: This was our first stay, so we were not sure what to expect. Our room very clean and the beds were incredibly comfortable. Great location. Walking distance to all the sites and subway. Staff was very helpful

title: Perfect hotel!!
text:
A really price worthy hotel with everything you could ask for! 
I had the “full pod” room and it was the perfect size. I had a really nice view even tho I was in the 8th floor. 
I loved everything about this hotel! 
When I travel again to New York I will definitely stay here again. 
The location was great! 
I would absolutely recommend it, 10/10!!

title: Excellent Location
text: Great location! Great price. Just what we needed for our quick getaway to see The Cure at Madison Square Garden!  Parking deck was right next to the hotel. Shower had great water pressure. We wished we had an extra blanket …the AC worked really well!

title: Broadway trip
text: The rooms have adequate space for two, very close to broadway shows, proper security measures put in place.  Free tours that are great. Lots of eating places nearby for all types of tastes and budget.  Would highly recommend a stay at this hotel.

title: Great Place to Stay!
text: Very pleased with this hotel, The location was great because it was very conveniently located making it easy to go to and from places (most places were within walking distance) The staff was super helpful and hospitable, the rooms were clean and tidy, I would definitely recommend.

title: Small but perfect for the solo traveler
text:
Regular visitor to the city but first time staying at POD Times Square. 

Rooms are small but exactly as described on the website, so exactly as I expected. 

Perfectly comfortable for myself as a solo traveler. 

Location was good but could get a little sketchy later in the evening compared to some other locations in the city. 

Staff were a little disappointing compared to some service I have had in other NYC hotels. 

Good value for money. 

Would stay again for a short visit.

title: Good value for money
text: The location is great and the price is relativelty affordable compared to other hotels in the area. The room is clean and enough if you plan to explore the city and would like a place to sleep and take a bath

title: Great stay, great value
text: I just needed a place to crash for one night while traveling, and The Pod was really great.  The room was modern, appealing, and very clean.  The staff was very helpful.  The only drawback was some street noise at night, but earplugs solved that problem.  The room was small (anything more than one suitcase won't fit) but suitable for only one person.  I would definitely stay here again!

title: Visita desde Ecuador
text: Muy buena ubicación todo queda cerca y se puede conocer manhatan caminando entre la 5ta,6ta,7ma y esta muy cerca de las paradas del metro. Ha sido una muy buena experiencia y esperamos regresar nuevamente. SERIA RECOMENDABLE QUE INCLUYAN DESAYUNO

title: Amazing stay in a vibrant boutique beautiful hotel in dynamic NYC
text:
Very convenient location just steps away from Port Authority station and Times Square. Even room is small, it has the space I needed and everything I need (minus a fridge) and elevator is surprisingly fast in a high building. The check in/out process was efficient.
Thank you for Sahar who let me check in early on June 11 arrival date and she’s very helpful during the check in process.

title: A great New York stay
text: Pod Times Square deserves a top quality recommendation. From location, service, cleanliness and facilities. A great place to stay. The bus stop 30 or 60 feet away depending on direction, connects you to the whole greater New York City.

title: EXCELLENT/PERFECT
text: Great location, near Times Square and safe. Staff super friendly and go out of their way, especially Vito. Ask how to plan your sight seeing and will save you a lot of money. Rooftop Restaurant is opened until 11 p.m., food is fine. Rooms are perfect for what they are just to rest to continue exploring. This little gem is NOT to be overlooked.

title: Cosy room, great location
text: Although the room was small, it was impeccably clean. The location was fantastic, offering easy access to attractions. Overall, a great choice for cleanliness and convenience, despite the limited space.

title: Perfect location
text: I stumbled on this hotel while looking for a stay in Manhattan and it didn’t disappoint ! The location was perfect, we were 3 mins on foot from Times Squares and public transportation. The lounge bar and restaurant was really good as well, highly recommended for a short stay in the Big Apple !!

title: Perfect location, spotlessly clean
text: This hotel is perfectly located just off Times Square. The hotel was spotlessly clean and despite the room being basic, it had everything that you needed. The rooms were soundproofed to ensure a good nights sleep. Perfect location and wouldnt hesitate to stay again. The hotel can arrange transfer to JFK for you which is cheaper than a yellow cab. Overall, great stay.

title: Brilliant
text:
Am definitely coming back to Pod
In my next trip I wish I can get a room that has iron and also breakfast 
I like the idea of luggage keeping 
Trash should taken out from the room every day cause we found ourselves sleeping with lot of thrash

title: Lively outside, quiet inside.
text: The clientele is young and international.  This place must be in everyone's NYC guide book.  For good reason.  Rooms are VERY small (Euro style), but if you can live with that, this is a good place to stay.  Right in the middle of everything, near subway, bus, and train hubs, but quiet and restful inside.  "Serafina in the Sky" is not at the top of the building.  It is at Lobby level a few floors above the street, but with a roof deck which was very pleasant this warm summer evening.  The last time I was here there was a noisy party in the room next to mine.  Afraid this could go on for hours I went to the front desk to ask to be moved.  Front Desk said "We have a rule against parties.  I will send security."  Being used to Front Desk service in the standard American motel, I was surprised when ten minutes later the floor returned to silence.

title: Excelente!
text: Hotel com excelente localização, muito bom, limpo e organizado. O pessoal do staff é super atencioso e solícito. O atendimento do concierge também foi excelente, dando dicas e informações dos melhores lugares, inclusive reservando o transfer do hotel para o aeroporto.

title: perfect location, clean
text:
the location near times square and the port authority bus terminal is really perfect.
the rooms and the hotel is very clean and the service is quite good.
the rooms are very small but functional and we slept good in the beds.
the price is not cheap for this sort of rooms, but for this location in the middle of manhattan and the price-niveau of nyc it seems to be ok

title: A little gem!
text: Having explored all the possibilities, cost, accessibility, distance from airport , accessibility to attractions, this option was by far the most economical and safest option. I think its a great option for the individual traveller or a couple.

title: Pod Hotel
text: This was exactly what I was looking for -- a good value at a good location. The room was exactly as described and was comfortable. I had a room with a double bed which was good for one person. It would have been quite tight for two people

title: Loved this place!
text: This place was the best! Friendly staff and super easy to check in and out! Good price and beautiful view from the room! This was my first time in NYC and I’m so glad I picked this place to stay in. It’s near the Hayes Theater which was great since I was seeing The Thanksgiving Play there, and there’s great food nearby. Can’t go wrong with staying at The Pod

title: Great price …. Great stay!
text: The hotel is very cute and trendy yet very efficient. The rooms are small but it is very well designed and has everything you need. I really liked the lighting settings so it is flexible for different needs. The bed was comfortable and I didn’t feel I was missing anything. For a short stay in NYC, this is definitely the place to be!

title: Pod Times Square.
text: I was very happy with the check in process. I got a higher floor like I requested. The hotel restaurant is great. The area can be pretty dicey, but I felt very safe and comfortable within the hotel. It is a great location, close to lots of public transportation, checkout process was also easy - view from my room was beautiful!

title: Good location, dusty room and lasck of communication
text:
The location is great, just a few blocks away from Times Square and Subway. The rooms are little pods and super cute. however the room was so dusty I had to take the only wash cloth (there should have been 2 as I had a bunk bed and we were 2 guests) to wet it and wipe the bed, TVs and remote control. the vent in the shower was extremely dirty and the shower had moldue growth in all the corners. The shower drain was slow so you had to take a shower in a pool of water. 
Additionally, you have to sign up on a sheet to get your room cleaned the next day. They never told me that so after a couple of days of no cleaning I went to ask and thats when they told me. I signed up and still no cleaning the next day.  There is no iron in the rooms so that was inconvenient. They should have a coffee station in the lobby since the room doesn't have anything.

title: First time staying a a Pod
text: In NYC to attend a conference at Javits Center.  Very convenient location, in middle of Times Square.  Would definitely come back on pleasure travel with spouse. Easy check in / check out, though a little confusing on first arrival late in evening, there is only an elevator bank on ground floor to take you to lobby.  Could be better signage.

title: For Times Square it's OK
text: When you look at comparative rates around Times Square, this place works.  Much cleaner and nicer than nearby Yotel.  Rooms are tidy and great A/C.  Free wifi but expect to pay for EVERYTHING else including coffee.  Surly bartenders who don't like giving the limited-choice free drink, and dont like any questions at all.

title: Reservations
text: You are made to pay the entire balance before the end of your stay! It is very insulting to guests. I wonder is this practice is done to all guests coming to visit New York. It is a great location.yes

title: Empfehlenswert ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
text:
Tolles Hotel mit super Lage zum Times Square. U-Bahn, Busse, Restaurants und Geschäfte befinden sich praktisch ums Eck 👍🏻. Mega Aussicht auf die Skyline von Manhattan, tägliche Zimmerreinigung ohne Probleme. Zimmer sind zwar, klein aber sauber und praktisch ausgestattet.
Absolut empfehlenswert und gerne wieder...

title: Opción accesible en NYC
text: Estuvimos 4 noches en una habitación doble con literas. Por el precio abonado estuvo acorde, sí es reducido el espacio tanto en el baño como la habitación pero es funcional, igualmente le faltaba un poco de limpieza a la alfombra. Lo que no me gustó es el sistema de persianas, ingresa la luz a la habitación y por la fecha desde muy temprano y resulta molesto. El wifi funciona muy bien, la vista que nos tocó era muy buena y tiene una terraza para fotos. La ubicación si bien está en la 9 av, nos resultó cómoda.

title: Great service, great mix of guests & great restaurant.
text: The employees are so helpful and nice. Small rooms with no whistles, but clean, minimal & safe. I will stay again for sure. Great restaurant with a beautiful terrace and yummy food. An easy walk from restaurant row.

title: Big Apple Business Trip
text:
Decided to try a micro hotel vs the traditional large full service hotels in the city, out of curiosity. 
I was pleasantly surprised properties public spaces were well appointed, the restaurant and bar quite nice while the rooms are expectedly small you don’t really need much more when in a city like NewYork, when the main intent is either business or pleasure and your only in the room to sleep. I will definitely consider POD for a future visit.

title: Perfect for Solo Traveller.
text: Room size and layout is efficient. WiFi is a bit slow though when I had to upload and download something for work. It’s close to subway. Got no major problems while staying in the hotel.  There’s a free drink coupon for Serafina, but only available at night, I wish  it was available for entire day.

title: Excellent location
text: Perfect location, safe, you can walk everywhere. Will stay here again. Staff were friendly and service efficient. Room was clean and comfortable. Highly recommend this hotel. Lots of dining choices and coffee shops nearby.

title: great location
text: close to subway lines, broadway, times square. you can even walk to these places. The best part of this hotel is without a doubt the location. I chose a double room with a bathroom for my and my wife's comfort. but horrible room cleaning service. in fact my room was only cleaned in just one day. no fridge or cupboards. very simple indeed, just to sleep. In relation to daily rates, it is really competitive, however, it does not offer breakfast included, it does not have room service, so it cannot be compared with large chains. but at the end of the day despite everything I have reported I would stay again, just because of the location and because I only use the hotel, in fact, to sleep.

title: Perfectly situated on walking distance of lots of highlights
text: It’s a great hotel. The rooms are small, but clean and very efficient. The bed and pillows are comfortable. We slept with the window open since the room was a little too warm. The bar in the lobby is a bit over priced.

title: Love the Pod hotels
text: 3rd time staying at a Pod hotel, love the properties. They’re all unique, the rooms are small, but we didn’t stay in it long during the day, so who cares? The staff was friendly and helpful. Had air conditioning issues, but maintenance arrived quickly and was able to fix it.

title: G
text: I had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel. The combination of its excellent location, clean rooms, and essential amenities made it a perfect choice for my business trip. I would definitely consider staying here again in the future.

title: Tiny onTimes Square
text: It's everything you need in a tiny little package!  Restaurant, bar, outdoor seating, breakfast bar IN the bar every morning.  Close to Broadway and other NYC places worth the walk, Museum of Broadway is one.  Sound proof windows open if you want to hear the city.

title: Clean and safe
text: we were on vacation with a friend and our room was overlooking the city! great staff and very friendly attitude towards guests. calm and safe. cleaning every day and the room has everything you need !!!

title: Very nice stay
text:
Be sure that you can benefit the discount they advertise at the restaurant.
Staff very nice and helpful. Specially the young man in charge of the luggages room. He help us with our luggages till the corner of the block to the taxi!
Very well maintain and clean hotel.

title: Perfect!
text: The room was very clean,The bed was very comfortable.The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location is perfect to explore New York City, busses and trains are just across the corner. I will definitely come back.

title: Good location
text: Excellent location, extremely close to Times Square, basic rooms, lots of sockets. Also has a bar (used) and restaurant (didn’t use)-all on hotel lobby level. Lots of lifts to rooms so you never have to wait to go up to room.

title: Basic hotel
text: Basic hotel, met piepkleine kamers. Wij hadden de kamer met stapelbed. Heel weinig ruimte nog naast het bed en nergens een kast om je kleren weg te leggen . Hier zijn enkel haken voor voorzien in de kamer.Tijdens ons verblijf van 6 nachten hebben we ook enkel 2 maal een poetsvrouw gezien en zuivere handdoeken gekregen. Ook zijn we op een nacht wakker geschrokken van het brandalarm. Heel het hotel evacueerde en zo stond je om middernacht in je piama op Time Square. Beneden aangekomen van verdieping 15 vertelde de conciërge gepikeerd dat er niets aan de hand was en werd iedereen terug naar zijn kamer gestuurd. Excuses hiervoor niet gehad.

title: Great stay, great location
text: This is an efficiency stay, just what we were looking for as why are you spending time in the hotel in NYC?!? The location is great, the view was great, it was quiet. My only two complaints is that the pillows were very uncomfortable and the shower curtain needed to hit the floor in order to not soak the whole bathroom and extra towels solved that problem. We had a great time.

title: The POD hotel is great
text: I traveled to NYC for a journalism conference and I stayed three more days to walk around the city. The hotel was perfect, clean, close to everything and safe. At the reception everyone was friendly and gave us correct directions.

title: Tiny but very functional
text: Rooms are basic but efficiently designed.  When I come to NYC, it's not to sit in a hotel room, so I just want something clean, comfortable and affordable. Pods checked all those boxes.  It's conveniently located to major subway lines and easy walking to all the theaters of Broadway.

title: Opção razoável considerando o alto custo de Nova Iorque.
text: Hotel simples, movimentado, bem localizado - perto da rodoviária, metrô e atrações da Broadway. Quartos bem pequenos mas conservados, limpo. Banheiro minúsculo e integrado ao quarto. Silencioso. Atendimento normal, sem brilhantismo. Wi_Fi bom.

title: Good stay
text: Flew into jfk late and delayed (around about 12:39am) called to advise I would be late. Staff were very friendly and understanding. Rooms are clean and surprisingly functional and the prices are very affordable considering the location

title: Amazing location for great price
text: An amazing hotel that has a great location to an ok price. We loved our stay here and the fact that, pretty much everything, is within walking distance. Would definatly come again. This was a mother daughter trip and well worth every cent.

title: Excellent geographical location
text: We stayed there between May 13 and 23, 2023. In general terms our stay was fine; the excellent geographical location very close to important attractions and places to visit, as well as public transportation; Security through electronic cards for the elevator and the room are strengths to consider. Despite the fact that the rooms are small, we liked the cleanliness of the bathrooms and the water service. Some suggestions for improvements are: 1- If the client does not ask for the room to be cleaned daily, they do not do it. Before our complaint that the room was not ready, they told us that we should sign up on a list at the reception. We did it but still another day we had to ask the reception again for cleaning and change of clean towels. We consider it important to pay attention to this point, since cleanliness is essential for a comfortable stay for customers. 2- The hotel does not have its own cafeteria, so hotel guests must look for nearby cafeterias to have breakfast. At the end of our stay we found out in a nearby cafeteria that hotel guests enjoyed a discount on breakfast. Despite the fact that we stayed for around ten nights, this benefit was not communicated to us, so we could not take advantage of it. We suggest better communication and information with customers. 3- Despite the fact that the Hells Kitchen neighborhood (where the hotel is located) celebrates an annual international gastronomy fair, we found out on the last day of that event when it was ending. Once again, we suggest better information about the activities of the community and the city that can be enjoyed by hotel guests. 4- The hotel has a bar, which during our stay was closed most of the time. Several nights we wanted to have a drink but could not.

title: Super stay
text: Small bunk-bed room, but super beds. We just missed a closet. The location was great, close to Time Square. It was very quiet and clean. Great stuff, friendly and helpful. Perfect location for a short stay in NY.

title: Great for business trips
text: The Pod Hotel is my go to for business trips. The amenities in the room are basic but adequate and very clean. Especially good value for short 1-3 night stays. I highly recommend this place not just for business but for all types of trips.

title: Clean, friendly place in the heart of Manhattan
text: I would stay there again.  The location is as good as it gets.  The rooms are small but clean and comfortable, there's TV, good water pressure and plenty of towels.  The walls are thick or my neighbors were quiet - but sleeping there was restful.  I had a cool view at the 17th floor.  The staff is friendly.  Highly recommended.

title: Safe Sleep-Shower-Go
text: Clean and well kept. Our room was quiet, not much noise perceived, great for sleeping. Rooms are small. No space for handling luggage, and no closet or drawer space available. Bathroom space is OK. Breakfast is continental breakfast, but not included, need to pay for items. Elevators worked great. Fire alarms went off for a while late one night, it was very annoying, but it was fixed. Staff is very polite and serviceable.

title: Perfect place to stay in NYC
text: Great value hotel in a great, central location, friendly and helpful staff. Room has everything you need without having to pay for all the extra things you never use in a room. Really comfortable bed, big shower, hair dryer, soap, shampoo, etc, quiet (6th floor room and I could hardly hear any street noise). Room has a clean, simple style - think IKEA. Cool bar/restaurant on site. Would definitely stay here again and have already recommended to other people.

title: Great location and nice room - very clean
text:
Super central location, excellent bed and showers, room
small but optimised and quality material. Friendly staff. Nice lobby and lounge for breakfast or donner of happy hour. Free waking tours proposed to guests. Baggage storage available, free maps, taxi service to airports and excellent wifi connexion. A little expensive but good value for exploring Manhattan!

title: Expensive, rude staff
text: Rude and unfriendly staff. Staff doesn't do his best to make you feel comfortable. Blindings in the room are insufficient; at night it feels like daytime. Very loud music in the elevators. No possibility to make coffee or tea in the room

title: Eh
text: Expensive for what you get. Room setup is awkward utilization of space. Shower curtain isn’t long enough to prevent water from spilling into the bathroom space. Sink is hard to use due to shelf above it. Second person in the queen room has maybe 6” of walking space to get in and out of bed. The fire alarm went off in the middle of the night and we had to evacuate via the stairs but then nobody was there to tell anyone what happened. Fire dept never came. Finally a staff member came out and basically lectured us that it was a false alarm because the elevators were working, which is a “clear indication that everything is fine”. Upon checkout nothing was even mentioned about this incident and we weren’t even asked how our stay was. A guy in street clothes took our key and was like “you’re fine, have a good day”

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: Convenient and good value for the central location.  Staff was super quick, efficient, and pleasant. Room was  clean- it was verrry tight but works just fine for a quick stay.  Very happy with place & would stay again!  Mattresses were on the hard side.

title: Good safe place to stay in the city.
text:
STAFF: Staff were very attentive and booking in was quick and easy.  Domestic staff were very helpful and room cleaned daily unless we requested it to be left.  Iron was requested and this and ironing board were delivered to the room within 10 minutes. 
CLENLINESS: Room was clean although the main bedroom door could have done with a wipe over.  Room cleaned daily.
FACILITIES: Two lifts which took you from Ground floor to the reception area. 6 lifts which took you from reception area / bar / resturaunt to the bedroom floors. This meant you only had to wait a few moments before a lift arrived. Your room key is needed to access the lifts and this will only allow you to access the floor your room is located on. This improves security. 
The resuraunt area has outside seating with views of the city as well as indoor tables. Decore is extreamly tasteful. Food is lovely.
ROOM: The bedroom was as stated on the website. This consisted of a large comfortable bed. Pillows were a little thin and had to be doubled over to suit my sleeping position. Beside the bed there was a small table with charging points and a phone. At the bottom of the bed was another small unit which contained a safe. Storage space available under the bed for shoes and suitcases. There was 4 hangers for clothes. (could do with more hanging space)  We had an on suite which comprised of a shower , toilet, sink and toiletries. The shower/ toilet cubicle was wall to ceiling frosted glass which didn't provide a great deal of privacy. OK if you are with partner or on your own but not good if sharing with friends.  Bedroom door was metal and had a security latch on the inside. Again this was good for solo travelers. 
The hotel was quiet so no issues with sleeping.
AREA: Handy for Times square and transport links around the city and further.  There was groups of people smoking weed around the exterior of the building but this was normal for all of the Times square area and not a reflection on the Hotel or people stying there.

OVERALL:  I would stay here again when next in New York but will bring hangers and an extra pillow.

title: Great Location and Well Maintained!
text: The hotel was in a perfect location for getting to and from Penn Station and getting to the theater.  The room was very clean and quiet.  Never had to wait very long for an elevator, which was wonderful.  Reasonably priced breakfast available in the hotel restaurant, Serafina.  Would definitely stay here again!

title: Great location - Price as advertised!
text: We had a great stay at this hotel - no issues at all! Rooms are exactly as advertised, and beds were super comfortable! Check in/out really easy and great location to everything we wanted to do! Times Square, Highline, shopping, Broadway shows and more!

title: Good experience!
text: Recommended for solo travelers. If I go to New York again, I want to stay again. You can get a refrigerator at this price in New York, and you can walk anywhere in the midtown manhattan. Staff are quick to respond.

title: Pod Times Square
text: Awesome location, clean room but the mattress wasn’t so good. Also when I took a shower the water ran into the carpet, so I have to put. towels to avoid happening again. Restaurant is good and service in general too

title: Simple, smooth and top notch!
text:
What do you need of a hotel when you travel to a city like New York? A room with a comfortable bed and a nice, clean bathroom, somewhere smack in the middle.
Pod Times Square is within walking distance from Penn Station, if you arrive their from the airport(s), and is located right next to Restaurant Row and Hells Kitchen, so you have your breakfast buffet right outside the from door. 
Also, you happen to have a rooftop bar, right next to the lobby.

title: Easy check in
text: Great check in experience. If you have stayed in these style hotels that have small rooms many of them will make the check ins automated. This hotel had a great helpful staff to get checked in, secure bags for early arrivers and quick to offer restaurant suggestions and even discounts to guests. Sahar was especially helpful and made everything great.

title: Fantastic location
text: The location of this hotel is fantastic, one block away from authority port and a five minute walk away from times square. The bees were comfortable and the room was clean. Upon departure we could leave our luggage safely so we could enjoy our day before our flight back home. We would stay here again.

title: Localization
text:
It is really good. We can find bus, train, subway to go wherever. We can walk around the city at anytime and we can find too good restaurants, interesting pubs, bars, bakery, everything that we need. More important for us the hotel is near the Time Square and the Central Park. The mainly point to visit in New York. I just say thank all the team. 
I recommend the POD Time Square Hotel.

title: Nice stay - Good Location
text: I was looking for a clean, safe, room near the theatres and Penn Station for a quick weekend visit. The Pod was great just for this stay. I also enjoyed the location near Restaurant Row. I could easily get to all the theaters and places to eat within 15 mins.  I'll be back. (It would be nice if there was more social area on the lobby floor.

title: I have come to rely on this hotel
text:
This is a great building with spectacular views from high up, within
the rooms. The rooms are
modern with big windows. The wi-fi has always worked so well. The bath 
is well-appointed and clean. There is a room safe,

title: Convienient safe clean location
text: I was travelling by myself to sightsee and meetup with friends.. this location proved to be very good.. the shuttle from newark airport stops a min walk away.. for one person it met my needs.  Bed was comfortable. Some sound could be heard  upto the 13th floor but not enough to disturb my sleep.

title: Pod Times Square
text: Clean warm room, plenty of fresh towels. Very helpful and friendly staff and excellent food and service at the Serafina restaurant. Good central position for Times Square and all the usual Manhattan attractions. Would recommend!

title: Always a good experience.
text: Pod Times Square is in a perfect location, near bus station, metro and obviously Times Square! It’s clean, practical and with a good service. At the moment there are a bar and a restaurant. They are also good. Everything was as always a good travel experience

title: Perfect location and view in NY
text: We spent our vacation in POD hotel. The hotel is very nice, the staff is always helpfull and the location is PERFECT but you have to ask for cleaning room, and i think it’s unbelive for a 4stars hotel

title: Pod Times Square
text: Good space overall. The room was small but comfortable, checking in and out was easy, staff was friendly and respectful. Only complaint was that room service came in and moved my stuff around when I was not expecting them to be in the room.

title: NY 42nd street
text:
That was a real good time in NYC. So colorfully. I would recommend you come to NYC to choose POD at 42nd street. First off all location is everything in NYC. And POD’s location is one of the best. 
What i didn’t like that it was close to buss station, and with that engine noise i had bad sleep. 
However, when you are in NYC why the hell you sleep. Live your life

title: Excellent
text: Love the concept and the hotel was fantastic! Relocating and may look into staying for an extended period of time! From the doorman to the front staff, everyone was professional and extremely helpful. A company I would love to be a part of.

title: Clean room
text: Room was very clean but hallways are dark and and dingy feeling. Staff are very friendly. Complimentary drink at checkin was a nice touch. Plumbing needs work as the toilet kept breaking and we’d have to call for a repair. Location was pretty good.

title: Pods NY—Good location, but overpriced
text: I stayed in this hotel in spring 2023. The room was ok, but it was tiny, there was no fridge for us to store food, and the pillows could have been more comfortable. The room was clean, so no comments about that. All in all, for what is being offered, I think the room was overpriced.

title: 4 Days in NYC
text: Very convenient location! though the room was small and built for efficiency the view of the city was fantastic from the 20th floor. Subway accessible plenty of restaurants and eateries is the area. A lot of international guests staying at the hotel! The cool thing about they layout of the room is that made you feel as if you could be anywhere in the world!

title: Posizione eccellente
text:
La posizione è il suo punto forte. Vicinissimo a Times Square e vicino a tutti i servizi. Il personale è molto gentile e le camere anche se sono molto piccole hanno tutto. Pulizia eccellente sia in camera che in bagno.
Unica pecca, il servizio di pulizia va richiesto giorno dopo giorno e a volte può succedere di dimenticarlo.
Sicuramente consigliato

title: GOOD LOCATION AND NICE ATMOSPHERE
text:
I was for a Bussines trip and was near the Javits center. In relation making tourism it is near the main metro station  and easy to reach from airport or train.
very friendly hotel with nice staff
I will come back when i visit New York

title: 50th birthday stay
text: I took my daughter for my 50th birthday and it was so fun and memorable. This location is hopping and convenient to many areas like Times Square, Broadway, Central Park and Chelsea. The rooms are well designed, compact and clean. We had a great view of the city and slept well on the comfy beds.

title: Good location and prize
text: A good experience in and so good located hotel, special for bussines trips. The room was cleaning, the services aproppiated, and the staff gave me so good atention. Only the breakfast service is too basic.

title: Excelente
text: me pareció que es un muy buen primer lugar para conocer New York, está muy bien ubicado para las atracciones principales por que puedes estar muy cerca de ellas. Además las habitaciones están muy bien pensadas para que puedas descansar, guardar compras y volver a salir a recorrer la ciudad

title: vacances à new york
text: L'hôtel est bien situé près de timesquare, les chambres sont très petites, pas de possibilité d'avoir un petit déjeuner à l'hôtel (ou alors je n'ai pas eu l'info). L'accueil a été très neutre, remise des clés et voilà. Sinon les chambres sont propres et pas de bruit sauf si on ouvre les fénêtres et la vue est assez moche, dommage étant donné que l'on est resté 9 jours.

title: Ottima esperienza
text: Siamo una coppia e abbiamo soggiornato qui nell'ultima settimana di aprile. L'esperienza nel complesso è stata buona. Ottima la posizione dell'Hotel. Pulizia davvero ottima e anche il personale molto disponibile

title: Pleasant stay
text:
I was a nice stay I had a good sleep staffs are friendly and helpful  They have real concern 
I had early check in  thanks for the sympathy and kindness 
Hotel Pod is close by with restaurants
And concierge is polite and reliable 
I I recommend Hotel Pod 
Proffessional and clean rooms

title: A week in NY
text: We booked this hotel and it is located near of the important things to visit. The room was a bit small, but you have everything on it. The bathroom is big and very clean, you have shampoo and soap.Probably the aspect I should mention is you have to advise to the reception to clean the room, if not, they are not cleaning.

title: Great experience, convenient and all necessities met!
text: There was no glamour in our room - but it was neat, clean, contemporary and offered all necessary amenities. The front desk was friendly and attended to our need to check in quickly as we were running late for an event. There is parking directly across the street for $60/night. This was a perfect spontaneous stay and we would absolutely visit POD Times Sq again!

title: Super Hotel, Top Lage!
text:
Ich war schon zum zweiten Mal im Pod Times Square. Zimmer sind wie auf den Fotos. Ziemlich klein, aber wenn man sich darauf einstellt ist es kein Problem. Betten sind sooo bequem, wir haben lange nicht mehr so gut geschlafen. Wir waren im 22. Stock und wir haben vom Strassenlärm nichts mitbekommen. Es war absolut ruhig. Personal nett und freundlich. Teppichboden im Zimmer finde ich generell nicht so toll und er könnte etwas sauberer geputzt werden. Der Rest des Zimmers war aber sauber. 
Top Lage! Times Square und viele tolle Bars und Restaurants in ein paar Schritten zu erreichen. Ich würde definitiv wieder hier buchen.
Die nächste Subway Station (42nd Port Authority) ist im Block nebenan. Super Verbindung zum Flughafen JFK.

title: Lavoro e turismo
text:
Le camere sono piccole ma molto funzionali. Personale super gentile, cortese e collaborativo (grazie in  particolare a Sahar S che ha aiutato me e il mio collega a gestire al prenotazione al meglio)
Posizione strategica sia per Expo che per visitare la città. Ottimi ristoranti nelle vicinanze.

title: great time.
text:
Service was excellent, and Sahar was such a fantastic help. I had a great experience. 
Budget-friendly, on a smaller scale, but a great place to sleep.

I liked the gym at the top floor, it provided a great view while working out.

title: Great place to stay
text: Dear , I enjoyed my stay in your hotel and I was pleased to stay here. The accommodations are sufficient and with a great quality. All services and personnel are kind and appropriate. I will be glad to recommend you to my network and friends .

title: Best location in Manhattan
text: Nice hotel close to Times Square. The room was really small, but this is quite usual in Manhattan. Our room was cleaned every day although we were told that it will only be cleaned upon request. The staff was nice and helpful. We would stay again at the Pod hotel.

title: Nice place!
text:
Really nice hotel, decent location, clean, quiet, good service. The rooms are small but the design and layout is functional and really well thought out.

Couple of things to note though...

The hotel is not on Times Square as advertised - its about a 10min walk from Times Square.

The hotel bar is on the lobby floor and not in the sky, on a high floor, or an oasis above the hustle of midtown. It's a nice bar but IT'S ON THE LOBBY FLOOR!

title: Localización ideal!
text: La localización es perfecta, a pocas calles de times square. El checkin es rapidísimo y para el checkout hay sitio para dejar las maletas gratis para aprovechar el último día. Las habitaciones un poco pequeñas pero para dormir y ducharse están muy bien. La mía tenía vistas al Empire State!

title: Management tosses out guest who perfume the room
text:
Management barred me over perfume use
The management refused my new reservation over incident.
When I speak to the manager
He accuses me of burning encens in the room. I show him the bottle if perfumed oil and the spritz pump bottle I use to perfume the room
He said he did not need a reasin to barr a guest.

title: Great place in the city
text: Completely quiet, very clean and comfortable with a good price and staff were super friendly.   Plus if you drive they offer a discount at a nearby parking garage. Who could ask for more? Oh, and centrally located just in case you needed more.  This will be my go to hotel wherever it is available.

title: Great location and value!
text: Hotel is exactly what we were looking for, a place to sleep. Space is small and cozy but newly renovated so feels very clean. The location is practical, and one block from port authority terminal. 100% recommend

title: The rooms are small, deffo a pod!!
text:
Clue is in the title - POD.  The rooms are small.  For a place to lay your head and nothing else.  No wardrobe, just a few hangers.
Decent shower. Hairdryer provided.  Shower gel, shampoo and conditioner provided.  There was a safe.  USB sockets fir charging

title: Clean, modern, quiet
text: Stayed here with my sister. The room was modern, clean, and very quiet. Bunk beds were sturdy for adults and mattresses fine. Plenty of outlets for charging, etc. Easy walk to theatres, restaurants, NYPL, Times Square, and subway. We also enjoyed Serafina In the Sky, the restaurant in the hotel (discounted for hotel guests). There were no face cloths in the room, so you might want to bring your own.

title: Posizione comoda, ottimo servizio
text:
Noi avevamo letti a castello.

Pro:
• a due isolati dalla stazione centrale della metro (Grand Central Station), a 20 minuti a piedi da Times Square e 30 dal Moma e la 5th Avenue;
