• camere risistemate tutti i giorni, asciugamani sempre puliti, bagno in camera con phon, bagnoschiuma, shampoo, letti comodi e robusti, cassaforte;
• organizza passeggiate gratuite con guida, considerate che il Pod39 è uno di una catena e ci sono altri 2 hotel “Pod” a New York, quindi le passeggiate potrebbero iniziare dagli altri.

Contro:
• camere piccole e niente privacy per il bagno, la nostra aveva una finestra bloccata dal letto, quindi inutilizzabile

title: A gem
text: The staff was friendly, location convenient and room was super clean, very comfortable and surprisingly quiet.  The temp could be regulated so it was cool to sleep. After we checked out we could leave our bags to continue to enjoy the city.  All in all a great experience.

title: Compact
text:
The name speaks for itself - small rooms but well kitted out. We stayed for 6 nights splitting each bunk room between adult and child. That was manageable but it may be too long for two adults in a small space. Bathrooms were good.
The staff were very good on anything we needed. 
There is a very good looking restaurant on site but we didn't use it. It was busy every night.
We would stay again so hopefully that says it all.

title: Hardly Slept
text: Guests partying and arguing and so much weed smoke it was overpowering. Hardly slept for two nights. The restaurant is good though. Rooms ok but beds hard and pillows soggy and everything smelt of stale smoke. Wish we had stayed in Soho.

title: Nice NY accomodation at a reasonable price!
text: I loved the concept of this hotel, as well as its location. It's fabulously located on 42nd St. in New York. If you're going for a theater weekend or whatever you can't be better situated. It's a "no frills" sleek and modern concept that fulfilled my needs. My only real issue was that the shower needed better safety features. It's a glassed in standing shower with very slick flooring and no grab bars! It's somewhat dangerous to users. I hope they will address this!

title: if something isn't right - make sure you hold your ground to switch rooms right away
text:
i liked this hotel from when we stayed there a previous time. It is definitely compact but it's clean, centrally located and interestingly enough - comfy!
this time around we were given a room with a toilet that wasn't functioning and for 3 days they tried to fix it and finally switched our rooms the night before we left. It really made the stay annoying to have to complain at the end of a long day of being out.

title: Value for money
text: The location is amazing. Everything nearby. Room was spacey enough, with big bathroom. Check in & out were super easy, and the staff was nice. Cleaning service on request. Has everything you need.  Definitely recommend.

title: Fun hotel
text: This room was just as described online.  We loved the restaurant West Side Cafe which was just across the street.  Also found the staff to be most welcoming.  However, when hiring a driver to take us to the airport I would use Uber or Lyft next time.  Fun hotel overall

title: Excellence!
text: I travelled to NYC solo and felt entirely safe, comfortable, and confident while staying at POD. The staff were friendly and helpful, the room was clean, well located, and had everything I needed. 100% recommend!

title: Best Pod Room ever
text: Excellent value for money. Very clean and comfortable beds. Nice view of the city. Open window for fresh air as well as an AC. So comfortable big time. We had bunk beds. Each bed had its own TV and night light along with a change station for cell phones.

title: Great hotel, rude staff
text:
The hotel location was perfect for us. The room was decently clean.
The shower is nice and big, hot water with enough pressure.
We had a Nice view of the Empire State Building.
All other clients were nice and friendly.

title: Stay Away
text: Room was dirty, was never told we had to get on a list to get our room cleaned. Guests can’t use any amenities as it is for residences only. Stay away, was in a good location but hotel is awful and staff is not friendly. We stayed three years ago and it a turned into a awful place.

title: Over Charged for what I'm not sure
text: Stayed in February this year with my wife. Could not swing a cat in room. The smallest hotel room I have ever come across.  Checked my credit card a couple days after leaving hotel & had been charged £60.00 for what I'm not sure have emailed hotel but never got a reply.  We didn't use hotel phone or have room service.  So what the charge is I do not knows watch yourself

title: Tiny room
text:
Strengths: Location 
Opportunities: room cleanness (window and floor were full of dust) and space (the room was so small that we had troubles in finding space for our two baggages, so were forced to keep them closed all time)

title: STRAIGHTFORWARD QUALITY AND PRICING IN THE HEART OF MANHATTAN
text: This hotel is a wonderfully laid out and situated venue. It's remarkably modern and - while there are no major frills, it's very functional and provided for all the needs of my stay. I will stay again

title: Small and well thought out
text:
We knew this room was going to be very small, but was very well thought out. The beds were fine. My sister and I stayed in a twin bunk bed room. I was nervous about the size of the bed, but slept well. The pillows were super comfy!

The room was immaculate upon arrival. You do need to request housekeeping in advance. We didn't feel the need for a cleaning during our 3 day stay. Although we didn't request  cleaning, fresh towels were delivered on the 2nd day. This was very appreciated:)

The front desk staff was always helpful and friendly. 

The location is very good and close to many things including a main subway station.

We were there for a sister trip and felt the area was safe for 2 traveling women. 

I would recommend and stay here again, especially for the value. It is a very basic hotel but clean and in a good location.

title: Friendly staff, good value for money,
text: If you are looking for a “value for money” accomodation on Times Square, this hotel will be the one! Friendly staff, nice service, and very clean. Hotel rooms aren’t big but beds are comfy and it has all you need.

title: BFF trip to NYC
text: We chose this hotel based on its location and Booking.cos reviews. We were extremely happy with everything about our stay and would love to return. Check-in and check-out were really easy. No-frills rooms but the room we stayed in was spotless. We loved the wall-mounted bedside shelf with light and multiple charging ports (USB and AC). Mattresses were very comfortable. Shower was lovely. Easy to use safe. Lobby area and Serafina surpassed our expectations - food and service both great!

title: Excellent value for money—lacking security
text: Really enjoyed staying here. It was the cheapest option for my needs, great location near port authority. There is not security at the front door, however, which made me nervous. I came in late one night and there was a man waiting outside that followed me in. You can’t get to the guest floors without scanning a key card but he could have easily come in with me and followed me to my room. That said, there was an employee in the lobby but there should be someone at the front door at all times as well.

title: Great location and very affordable
text: Great location and very affordable! Staff was also very accommodating. Arrived 2hours early before check in was able to get a room ready. And was able to do an later check out. Great service also. Will definitely be back again

title: Good room
text: The hotel are good, clean and friendly. I only didn’t liked that the bathroom it’s one blur glass and it’s uncomfortable when you share a room with a friend. The location is great, subway and bus very easy to find.

title: When we arrived to the hotel the front desk lady was very rude not friendly at all
text: The beds are not comfortable at all and there was dirty water coming out of the faucets we also use the restaurant in the property the food was horrible for the money that we spend we could have eat better across the street for less

title: Solo trip to New York
text: Pod Square Hotel is a very good hotel. The rooms were clean and modern. Everything was also close to the hotel. It was a very pleasant stay for my first solo trip.I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Great Value
text: Hotel was great bad service was tremendous. The location is right near port authority so you are able to access any point in Manhattan.  Sahar was very kind, helpful and answered any questions I had!

title: Great! Quiet & comfortable
text: Second time staying here - both times the room was very quiet - we never heard any sound from above, below or the sides. The windows insulate outside noise well too but I still recommend earplugs for the sirens & car horns. Room is small but modern & clean with everything that you need. Perfect for couples and great location.

title: Perfect location and great hospitality
text: Perfect location! We walked to every broadway show and felt totally safe in and around the hotel. Highly recommend! Took advantage of their free walking tours and complimentary happy hour! The room was just as pictured and nothing can beat the location.

title: Zentral und praktisch
text:
Die Größe des Zimmers ist kein Problem, es ist ausreichend Platz. Aber Wände, Teppich und Türen könnten gern mal einer Grundreinigung unterzogen werden. Einer der Kleiderhaken war lose, der Safe ohne Funktion, die Kissen klumpig. Glücklicherweise habe ich immer mein eigenes Kissen dabei. Das Bad macht dafür einen guten Eindruck, alles funktioniert und ist sauber.
Auch das WLAN und die Klimaanlage laufen gut. Es gibt genügend USB- und normale Steckdosen. Im Haus war es überraschend ruhig. Lobenswert, dass die Zimmer nur nach Vorbestellung gereinigt und so nicht ständig Seife und Handtücher gewechselt werden.
Die Lage nahe Port Aithority ist top!

title: Small Room but great location
text:
Overall the experience was great and the staff is very friendly.
Bathroom door kept sliding open by itself and the vent was loud all day.

It’s perfectly located, about a 5 minute walk away, at the times square.

“Pod Times Square” is accurate.

title: Enjoyable Stay
text: I highly recommend this hotel.  It is within walking distance to the Port Authority terminal, Times Square and all of the Broadway theaters. The restaurant in the hotel is convenient and has a varied menu.  The staff is very friendly, The hotel is clean and inviting.

title: Bunk beds with a view!
text: Great location, close enough to the hustle and bustle of Times Square, yet away from it all. Small but efficient room with bunk beds for Mom and her independent teenager, with a bonus view on the Empire State Building! And great cocktails at the Serafina in the sky on the lobby level. All in all, a perfect experience! I would definitely stay here again!

title: Budget Friendly, No Frills Stay
text: We just returned from a 2-night stay here. It was myself and my teen daughter. We were on a budget trip to NYC and this fit the price! Compared to what other area hotels were charging this was a deal! We had a bunk room and it was tiny but not terrible. We had enough space for us and our bags. Pros: it was cheap! They allowed us to check-in early which was a huge bonus and they also will hold bags free of charge after check-out. Full-sized amenities in the shower. Beds and temperature of the room were comfortable. Wi-fi in the room. Elevators were timely, not too much waiting. Cons: It's in good proximity to Times Square but I'd stay closer to 8th ave next time. We hated the bathroom!! The door didn't shut all of the way. It's a frosted glass sliding door and every time that you tired to shut it, it would just slide back open. Door also doesn't go to the top of the wall. Zero bathroom privacy in this room. The entire bathroom is frosted glass wall so whenever anyone is in there, it lights up the entire room. The shower was horrible! Took forever for the water to get warm and very low pressure. Some room features didn't work - light on the top bunk was broken and bluetooth connectors to the tv weren't functional. No tissue, only toilet paper. I really hate that every hotel in the area is charging a resort fee and this one was no exception. Don't feel like we really had anything that justified a resort fee - at check-in they give a 20% off coupon for the restaurant which was only open one night of our stay.  Housekeeping needs to be requested and we didn't know that until we saw the request sheet when dropping off our keys. Lobby is very cramped and busy. Really disliked the two elevators. One to get from the ground floor, one to get to your room (you need to tap your key then hit your floor!!! also not explained to us at check in). Overall, it served its purpose for a budget stay but I wouldn't stay here again.

title: Rude staff and scammers
text: Staff were beyond rude everything was to much hassle for them and the car to the airport is a scam don’t fall for it just book an Uber actually don’t even bother staying here. It’s cheaper than other hotels for a reason

title: Great stay for a short trip
text: The rooms are small, but clean and freshly renovated, the view is beautiful. If you are traveling for NYC for a short time and need a place to sleep and be close to everything, this is perfect. We stayed for a night to attend an appointment in the city and it was just what we needed.

title: a business trip
text: have been before at POD but not in times square : a simple but confortable format of rooms that I like but not for a very long stay due to wardrobe small space in the room . Good quality of bed and bathroom with a confortable shower . My room had a beautiful view on the skyline with the empire state builing in font of my bed .

title: Pod Time Square
text:
May I book for New Years Eve? Good price. At the wee hours only place open is 7 Eleven.
The staff there is a turn off they made me feel very uncomfortable. Perhaps your hotel could have a vendo machine with the essential toiletries and some snacks  ?

title: I will definitely return to the POD TIMES SQUARE for my next NYC vacation.
text:
Everything was excellent. My wife and I lived wonderful moments together at the Pd Time Square. From the location to the staff and the hotel services all was really wonderful.
I definitely highly recommend this hotel to anybody wanting to spent time in NYC.

title: Good location, price and functionality
text:
Location, price and facility is perfect. 
It’s very tiny room. There is no kettle in the room. Except that, it’s very Functional and you have what you need in a compact and modern way.
Staff are not very friendly but hep when you ask

title: Comfortable stay
text: No frills, but a very reasonable price for a comfortable bed, clean room, fast elevators, a block from Port Authority airport bus, short walk to many of the Broadway theaters, many food options in the area.

title: Super séjour  à NY
text:
Tout s'est très bien passé pendant notre séjour au pod hotel, la chambre était conforme à la description, petite mais fonctionnelle. Nous avions une chambre avec lits superposés avec salle de bain en paroi fine et floutée. Mieux vaut bien connaître son camarade de chambrée! ;)
 Très propre et très bien placé. Le restaurant est bon et les guests ont 20% de réduction.

title: Very good location and lovely staff!
text: The location made it worth every penny! Staff were very helpful and experience overall was more than expected. Only downside was that the room was not cleaned after day 1, but nonetheless it was a very good stay.

title: Good deal for convenient stay near Times Square.
text: Had a good three night stay at Pod Time Square. Minimalist room. Bunk set up. Quite adequate. Only issue was the was never hot enough water for a comfortable shower. Night or morning. Otherwise it met our needs nicely.

title: 4 night stay
text:
We loved our stay at pod. 
It was clean, in a great location & had everything we needed. 
We found it great value for money. 
Staff were friendly. 
Only thing I could gripe was that £147 was taken from my account but it was 1st nights pay - this could just have been communicated. 

Otherwise we will recommend POD to everyone we know going to NYC.

title: Don't leave your luggage...otherwise fine.
text: Expensive...but that's NYC! Overall, not bad value. The room was small and basic, but functional, with a great shower. I think the "optional" housekeeping service is a great idea. I don't need someone to clean my room every day. Considering its central location in NYC, it was quiet. Left my suitcase in the luggage room and returned to find it has been severely damaged (and nobody took responsibility).

title: Amazing
text: Clean and fresh room with partial view of the Empire State. Good location in midtown. I felt safe at all time. Hope they could open more hotels in Manhattan and keep the overall quality and cleanliness overtime.

title: Great location!
text: This hotel was better than I was expecting!  The location is great.  It’s just a few blocks from Times Square.  The subway isn’t far.  Some rooms have great views.  We had a great view of the Empire State Building.  You can even open the window and we were on the 18th floor!  It only opens about 6 inches but I’ll take what I can get!  The area wasn’t bad at all.  The room with bunks is tiny, but we knew this and it was expected.  It was nice and clean though.  We were in NYC!  Why would we hang out in there anyhow?  One elevator takes you to the lobby.  The other elevators take you to the rooms and is only accessible by your room key.  There us now a restaurant and bar on site.  We didn’t eat there but did have a delicious cocktail.  I would totally recommend this hotel, especially when traveling with a friend as the bunks are a great idea!

title: Times Square!
text: Location and value cannot be beat. The rooms were exactly as described. We loved the hip vibe and no nonsense approach of the hotel. The lounge was a great place to relax. Would stay here again and recommend to anyone. You will not be disappointed.

title: Convenient
text: Nice property but no ice machine in the building and we had to buy ice from the bar. Would stay there again.  Nice views, clean and modern and they offer paid transportation to the airport.  If you’re staying with a friend in the bunks, beware the bathroom is made out of glass and somewhat see-through

title: Cleanliness
text: The room itself had a clean bed and bathroom but the sink and desk along with remote was extremely dusty like it hasn’t been cleaned in months. Other than that the staff is very nice and the hotel is aesthetically pleasing

title: Perfect for solo travel
text: The pod style hotel room has everything a solo traveler needs for a comparatively low price compared to other hotels due to its room size. I could see multiple people in a room being a little crowded, so this type of hotel is really optimized for a solo traveler. The hotel provides the same quality service as any other good hotel would, but at nearly half the price.

title: Great value - except for the “trick” fees
text:
I loved this hotel - great value (as long as you know what you are getting!) Great location - extra clean - and super comfortable - even the bunk pods. 

However, I despise the “sneaky” add on fees called “resort” or “facility” fees. Many states have banned them.

Get rid of these deceptive fees. We all know what they are for - to make your initial fee seem more attractive, 

They are dishonest.

Other than that - a great experience.

title: Great reasonable priced place to stay.
text: Sahar at front desk was awesome for check in.  We were upgraded to a queen bed. We had booked bunks. Small but new and clean and modern. Everything we needed! Would stay again. Good location. Close to theatres - we went to Hamilton.

title: Perfect stay
text: Modern hotel conveniently located at reasonable price. I booked the bunk pod but my room was upgraded at arrival for a full pod at no cost. Very clean rooms with all you need for a pleasant stay. 6 fast elevators, luggage concierge, restaurant in place. In my case was a solo trip and I really enjoyed the location near of everything in Times Square and Port Authority station. Highly recommended.

title: I will book this hotel again and again!
text: Very friendliness and hospitality by the staff, affordable price and awesome location. You don’t have to go too far for amenities, they are so close by, nice restaurants and bars and musical theater. I will book this hotel for my next trip to NY.

title: Does what it says on the tin
text: The hotel is in a very convenient location. It’s modern and very clean. The rooms are small, but sufficient for 2 people and their suitcases. All staff was very friendly and did not give “budget hotel” vibes - other than the room size!

title: Camere molto piccole ma ben organizzato
text: Ideale per soggiorni brevi e per una persona sola. Le camere sono molto piccole ma pulite e funzionali. Non fanno le pulizie se non le richiedete. Posizione ottima vicino alla metro e Times Square. La colazione da Serafina è mediocre, meglio farla fuori.

title: Suitable stay for an affordable nights sleep in NYC!
text: A suitable stay for an affordable nights sleep - easy walk to Times Square. Lots of dining and shopping options nearby. Skip the Italian restaurant - awful service. David R. was very pleasant at check-in.

title: Night on my own
text:
Pretty , great  location ( foot distance to timesquare ) and very affordable .
Perfect for some alone time , not sure I would have liked it if 2 in the room ( I booked the full Pod) 
Enjoyed the discount at the hotel restaurent

title: Super verblijf!
text:
Keurig net hotel, warm ontvangst door David.
Schoon en personeel is erg flexibel, je kunt bijvoorbeeld je kamer gratis bijboeken voor een uurtje. Ook je koffers opslaan is geen probleem. Daarnaast kregen wij gratis een kamer upgrade! Top service!

title: Great if you just want to sleep in.
text:
I stayed here for a five day trip, and it was a great place to stay. I can recommend this hotel for two reasons. The first is the location. It is only a 10 minute walk to Times Square and Broadway musicals. Also, there are many restaurants, cafes, and supermarkets around the hotel, so you will have no trouble finding a meal.
Second, the staff is friendly. Currently, the hotel does not provide housekeeping unless you ask for it, and on the third day, I forgot to ask for housekeeping and was about to use used towels, but they immediately provided me with new towels.
However, there is one bad thing. It is very dusty. There was quite a bit of dust and it was hard to cough and have a runny nose. Not recommended for those with house dust allergies.

title: Great location small rooms
text: It's convenient to walk to a Broadway show and visit Times Square but I think for the price paid rooms are very small. Bunk beds room has hardly left space to maneuver and the bathroom doesn't have any privacy. Overall you're paying location.

title: Rude staff and dirty carpets
text: Rude staff at check in, he was the worst person ever. The carpet on the room had so much dust that left all my things dusty, I couldn’t do anything because it would get dust everywhere. I didn’t complain so I wouldn’t run into that staff again

title: A good choice in Midtown
text:
I like especially the bunk bed rooms with their sleek single beds
one on top of the other. The room is well laid out,
and the bath is very nice. In the bunk bed rooms there
are two little TVs. A fun room.

title: Love it!
text: Excellent experience and recommended to stay! It is amazing hotel! It have an excellent location. Excellent customer services. The rooms are very comfortable and cleanliness. Have a good restaurant and bar too!

title: Highly recommend
text:
Its location was perfect. 
Room was compact but well organized. A coffee maker would have been nice, but yet starbucks next to the hotel opens at 6 am everyday. So i had no problem. All the staffs were friendly and caring. 
The water pressure was a bit low, but instead i got a view to the hudson river.

title: Al centro del mondo
text:
Ottimo hotel sulla 42esima a meno di 10 minuti a piedi da Times Square.
Check in veloce (apprezzato arrivando la sera frastornato dal fuso orario) con personale cortese.
Camera al 23esimo piano con una bella vista sui grattacieli di dimensioni limitate (ma lo sapevo) ma molto pratica e confortevole. 
La struttura è nuova, con tutti i vantaggi che ne conseguono, e dispone di 6 ascensori per accedere alle camere per cui non ho mai dovuto aspettare.
Sono stato nove giorni e le pulizie non mi sono mai state fatte (ma mi era stato detto che avrei dovuto chiederle il giorno prima)
Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo (sempre rapportato ai prezzi di New York!) una struttura sicuramente da consigliare.

title: Awesome stay!
text: We really enjoyed our stay in a bunk room at Pod Times Square!  The hotel was super close to everything we wanted to do (Times Square, Broadway show, shopping, eating, the St. Patrick's Day Parade, etc.  The room was small, but was spotless and well stocked with amenities (2 TVs, rain shower and wonderful smelling soap, shampoo, and conditioner, REALLY comfy beds, and an amazing view!).  The windows open to let in fresh air and hear the sounds of the city which was nice ... and are amazingly soundproof when closed (we slept great!).  There was a safe, but no microwave or frig.  Also, bring headphones with the traditional 3.5mm jack to plug into the wall for the TV if two people want to watch different shows :)! Absolutely perfect stay for me and my college-age daughter!

title: PERFECT POD
text:
I arrive in the night and my room was not ready but the front desk immediately solved the problem by making an upgrade.
very clean rooms and friendly,helpful and resolving staff.
I was in NY for business and they help me a lot.

title: good ratio price position / cleaning / price
text: Excellent cleaning (daily cleaning is on request), new structure. The room is a little small but it is for the standards of Manhattan.Good price position / cleaning / price. good ratio price position / cleaning / price

title: Good, low price option for NYC
text: My friend and I stayed in the bunk room for three nights and it was comfortable and safe. The rooms are pretty small, but that was expected, so no big deal there. The initial check in process was a bit confusing and we didn't get too many instructions on how to get to our room, but we figured it out on our own. This is a good option for a low price stay in Times Square!

title: Perfect location
text: This hotel has everything you need for a trip to NYC, it's comfortable, the staff is really nice but the best thing is location, you can go from upper Manhattan to lower Manhattan, from west to east in a blink of an eye.

title: Excellent location and very clean.
text: very good location, clean room and nice view of the Empire State. Reasonable price for one night in Manhattan. The attention of the staff was impeccable, there is a restaurant in the same building.  Nearby they have the Westway to have a rich breakfast.

title: Excelente experiencia!!!
text:
Esta fue mi 7ma visita a Nueva York. Encontré el hotel POD de casualidad, navegando en internet. Realmente superó todas mis expectativas. 
La habitación es pequeña pero super funcional para poder dormir 2 personas super cómodo. Tiene todo lo necesario, es super limpia y completa.
La ubicación es inmejorable. El precio acompaña toda la experiencia.
Sin dudas volvería a hospedarme allí y lo recomendaría a mis amigos y conocidos.

title: I will definitely stay here again...
text: ...if I need an overnight in NYC.  It was so convenient, clean and the staff were great.  I loved the multiple convenient charging ports all over the room.  The shower was clean and spacious compared to what I expected.  We loved our stay here.

title: Great location!
text: My sister and I went to NYC primarily to see Broadway shows. This hotel was in a great location where we could easily walk to all of our shows and plenty of food options around. The room was perfect for our needs and the bunk beds were a great space saver. Only downside was no microwave or mini fridge in the room.

title: Great Location and Clean!
text: Located close by the Port Authority Station and is centrally located. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful.  Overall the hotel’s location and price is a big plus for my travel needs.

title: Fit to Purpose
text:
clean, friendly helpful professional staff, amazing location.
The room is having whatever anyone will require but well arranged to fit the room size.
Modern furnished.
I recommend Pod Time square to anyone going to Manhattan.

title: Muy buena opción para tu primera visita en NY
text:
Es una muy buena opción para tus primeras visitas a NYC. La ubicación está perfecta, puedes llegar a Broadway, Times Square e incluso The Vessel caminando. 

La estación de metro te queda a solo unas cuadras (4 min caminando). El personal es súper amable. 

Ahora en las contras, los cuartos son diminutos y te sientes un poco aprisionado, igual la mayoría de gente lo toma solo para dormir pero aún así es muy pequeño.

title: Great location
text: The location , the staff all very professional . I stayed an extra night , they was able to accommodate me , easy check in and check out . I will definitely be returning and sharing with family & friends !

title: Small, cute, hip and clean
text: These are tiny hotel rooms with a modern feel. Conveniently located near Times Square and Hells Kitchen. Staff was friendly and helpful. Thick windows muffle (but don’t totally eliminate) noise of the city. Beds on the firm side-I slept fine.

title: Two night stay for one!
text:
I chose this hotel on price and location although I have stayed in a pod hotel in New York before. 

Check in was easy and the staff were very pleasant and helpful. I was given two vouchers for free drinks and another for 20% off food in the restaurant. I had a full pod room on 20th floor. The lifts take a little getting used too!

The room was clean and neat. All rooms are small but this was fine for me, with a great view down towards Hudson yards. The bathroom and in particular the shower was perfect.

I used the restaurant, the service and food was good and very reasonable using the vouchers

The hotel is in a great location, easy access to must sites and the subway

An excellent stay

title: Very clean, perfect location, very cozy
text: 100% recommended, it’s very clean, good control of the noise from outside, perfect location! Just a few blocks from Times Square, however the location itself is pretty good, there’re many restaurants and convenience stores nearby, as well as subway station nearby, Super friendly staff!

title: Busquei um hotel que tivesse uma boa tarifa de hospedagem e bem localizado.. e Pod Hotel atendeu todas minhas expectativas. ♥️✌️
text: Hotel Pod.... muito bem localizado, os recepcionistas super atenciosos e educados.... muitos prestativos.... aptos bem limpos, espaçosos, gostei muito... super recomendo o hotel POD em New York... Logo voltarei 😁♥️✌️👍😃🇧🇷🇱🇷

title: Great Hotel Near Times Square
text:
Great stay. Very good value, Small rooms but all we wanted was a clear, safe, affordable place to stay.
Short walk to Times Square. $1 pizza joint right across the street! If you want nice accommodations  at
reasonable rates this is your place ~ no frills.

title: My fantastic stayt
text: As usual, I’m explaining that I have always my time with eh hotel, and woiuld not hesitate to stay again when I have to chance. I have always recommended your hotels to friends and family. I’ve heard nothing but good things in response after they’ve stayed.

title: Good value
text:
Good location
Near from shops, restaurants, or activities.
There is just a water boiler or café machine missing in the room or lobby hotel
Rooms are quiet dispite the street noise
Serafina restaurant located in the hotel is too expensive and no that good

title: Not enough
text: Negative: It was 2 nights, they didnt inform that they dont clean the room. They make double charged to my credit card for the resort fee. I just noticed that. Positive:  We arrived really early in the morning and they gave us the room at that time. The people was really nice.

title: Great place to stay
text: Rooms are small very clean and was the perfect size for me and my daughter. We did the bunk bed room and each bunk had its own TV which allowed for our own space when we were in the room.  It is perfectly located within walking distance of Times Square and the Subway. I would highly recommend!

title: Très bon séjour
text:
Super emplacement à 5 minutes de Times Square, la chambre était super propre, attention il faut demander la veille pour que le ménage soit fait, chambre bien agencée malgré la petite taille, rien à redire je reviendrais.
Pour info un Market est juste à coté où le café et petit déjeuner vous coutera nettement moins chère que dans les chaine type Stabucks.

title: Very satisfied and worth the money!!
text: this hotel was very clean, no parts of the hotel were dirty at all. the staff was very nice and allowed us to keep our bags at the front desk when out touring. They did charge us by accident for an extra night before we had to check out but otherwise that we got a great view and a high floor like we asked for.

title: Ladies Trip!
text: My cousin and I went to New York for a fun little getaway, and we had so much fun. We are in our 30's so some people were like "why on earth are you staying in bunkbeds?" but we had a blast. The room was what we needed it to be. It's small but clean, and if you're in NYC, you shouldn't be spending lots of time in your room. So it totally met our needs. Thank you!

title: Great!
text: My sister and I were on a quick weekend trip in the city and needed a nice but less pricey place to stay. The Pod hotel fulfills this and more! The staff were extremely nice, the rooms were very clean and the location was perfect!

title: Cheap and cheerful
text:
I spent a lot of time looking over affordable hotels in Manhattan and finally chose POD. 
Though it lacked certain amenities - no coffee maker, refrigerator or iron in the room, no ice machine - it ultimately had everything I actually needed for my stay. Room was bigger than other more expensive places I have stayed at in Manhattan. It was quiet and clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. I would stay here again.

title: Quiet, clean, modern hotel
text: For their little size, these very modern rooms are well laid out, technologically up-to-date, super-clean,  and offer a fab view of the city and a comfortable and quiet sleep experience. We always choose the bunkbed option to keep the price in check. Older relatives take the double-bed room option and are happy with it. Location is perfect, with lots of great eating options nearby. Only a few blocks' walk from most major theatres.

title: Visit to New York after 10 years
text: At my arrival I had a great experience at the front desk. The front desk agent Sahar did an awesome costumer service.  The room is nice , the  furniture is brand new, the view is nice and it is close to very good spots. I recommend to everyone who wants to visit the City of New York

title: Nice hotel, cold water
text: Hotel was nice. Staff was friendly and accommodating. Water in the bathroom - shower and sink - was cold during 4 day stay. Front desk sent someone up to the room quickly to check on water; however, it lasted 10 minutes.

title: Gorgeous, Friendly staff and great location
text: All you need for a short stay.  Clean rooms with all you need.  Friendly staff.  They can safe your baggage the last day if you need it before leaving to the airport.  Perfect location walking distance from everything with the subway station nearby.  Easy access by subway, we use it from the airport and back to the airport again and it was very easy.

title: Sahar is great’
text: Sahar is so friendly! She was a great host at check-in. Hotel is very nice. Layout is great. Happy with the beds and service so far. Very modern. Great location, we’ll see how tonight goes noise wise.

title: Pod time Sqaure
text: I stayed at Pod Times Square Hotel before as well. I knew it was a great hotel. Checking in was not an issues with young men. They were very kind but when it came to check out. Those 2 young african amercan ladies made fun of us over there while checking out. Showing attitude and disrespect. I will never forget this.☹️

title: Sahar is amazing
text: Booked rooms with five co-workers and Sahar worked to get us rooms on the same floor and also queen beds instead of bunks. In my opinion she went over and beyond what was expected. If you are in New York City you would be silly not to book at pod times square. Clean rooms, great stuff, great location, great rates everyone wins! And if you are lucky Sahar will be working when you arrive!

title: Good in general
text: Really nice in general, the location of the hotel is perfect and the price is correct. The only negative point is the noise of the climatisation in the bedroom. Bedroom are also a bit small but it’s ok as we haven’t spent so much time in it.

title: NYC-quick trip
text: Staying at the POD in NYC was great.  It is in an excellent location.  We were able to see 4 shows in 2 days.  Don't forget the matinees.  The rooms are as pictured - on the small side, but I was just in the room to sleep.  Soundproofing supports a good nights rest.  The staff are friendly.  We indulged with a  complimentary Preseco at the hotel bar/lounge.

title: Great place to be when visiting New York
text:
The Pod Times Square, perfectly situated near times square and the Port Authority bus terminal (for easy access to public transportation. Affordable prices (for our period 25 feb-3 mar).
Nice little bunk bed room with good showerroom

title: Pod review
text:
Overall nice. A few minor repairs would make this a better experience for future guests: 
- bathroom sink did not drain well. 
- window latch coming apart
- used soap bar left in shower from previous guest

title: Kann man machen muss man aber nicht
text:
Reinigung des Zimmers muss man an der Lobby anmelden sonst wird keine gemacht. Nach frischen Handtüchern und Toilettenpapier muss man auch fragen.

Double Bed Room bedeutet laut dem Hotel ein Hochbett. Auf den Bildern jedoch sieht man ein Queensize Bett.

title: Comfortable and well located but services to improve
text:
Positive points : 
- very well located hotel 
- favorable price-quality ratio 
- small rooms but well appointed and comfortable

Negative points experienced during the stay :
- false fire alarm triggered during two nights in a row and no gesture from the hotel to compensate for the very significant inconvenience 
- room not cleaned, beds not made and towels not changed despite the indication that we posted on the door every day of our 3 nights stay 
- staff not very smiling nor friendly

title: First time NYC experience, done right.
text:
Enjoyed our stay.
Always felt taken care of. Was just what we needed, amazing value for money and clean. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff and we always felt safe. Great location, will definitely consider for the next trip over.

title: Genial
text: Todo genial, buen y atento personal, habitaciones cómodas y limpias. En el centro de todo, que mas se puede pedir, relación calidad precio insuperable. Si tengo que volver, volveré aquí sin dudarlo lo más mínimo

title: Tiny rooms but very good location and value
text: Location is fantastic however the rooms are VERY small. We opted to book another room as we couldn’t share a small double bed and the lack of space was claustrophobic for two people so I was glad we pre booked separate rooms. The hotel is great and I slept well with no noise at all. Would stay again

title: Great location - Great stay
text:
Value for money and very clean. Excellent amenities in the room from soap, shower gels, shampoo and conditioner. Spacious shower and excellent bed. Had great undisturbed sleep. Small rooms (literally like pods) but does the think if you are just looking for a place to sleep rather than hangout.
Recommend that there be better info on where the reception is located - take lift to the lobby level. A little confusing when you arrive first into the entrance and find only lifts there and nothing else.

title: Simple.  Great location
text: This was my second stay here.  Rooms are small and simple, but the price and location is right.  Unfortunately, they didn't clean my room even once during my stay, though daily housekeeping was listed.  Hopefully, that's not the norm!

title: Cozy
text: They kept nocking on checkout day before it was time. very distracting. But location is great and the rooms are small but cute. The shower has an opace glas wall to the room, which an be kind of fun ;-)

title: Genial, para que más!!!
text: La verdad que sólo puedo tener buenas palabras para con éste hotel y sus empleados. Tiene todo lo necesario para hacer mejor tu visita a Manhattan, con el espacio justo,para que más. A destacar que nos dieron una habitación superior a la reservada, sin ningún tipo de costo, DETALLAZO,!!

title: Good location and price
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado. Moderno y funcional. Habitaciones pequeñas pero bien equipadas y limpias. Excelente propuesta de visita guiada por New York. Muy buen restaurante. En general el servicio es muy bueno

title: Small, clean, functional
text: The room was functional, as I travelled alone the small size was no problem. Everything was basic and clean. I guess that is as mutch as one can hope for at this rate and location. The location is really great to explore Manhattan.

title: twins take on NYC
text: my sister and I spent 2 days in the peloton studio and just wanted something close by to crash, safely. Our pod met all of our needs. We used the phrase “urban glamping” to describe our stay. Thank you!

title: Awesome
text: Clean, efficient, well-designed rooms in a perfect location. Easy walk from Penn Station, can walk to all of what Manhattan has to offer. Elevator set-up might be a bit odd, but you’ll figure it out. Would stay here again for sure. Friendly staff, too! A win.

title: Great value Price/Location
text: It was my 1st NY trip and I went alone, so I found the hotel really nice, close to several subway and bus lines, walking distance to Broadway theathers and Times Square. I got the bunk, but didn't felt to too small, just fine for its purpose, to rest after long walks.

title: Perfect spot!
text: We had a quick couple days in NYC to go to a Broadway show. It was the perfect location for waking everywhere, safe for 2 women, room was clean and just enough. We were there to sleep so we could enjoy the city.

title: Great efficient stay
text: We really enjoyed this hotel.  My daughter and I came to NYC to see a few shows all we needed was a clean cozy place to sleep.  Pod was hip and just what we needed.  We got the bunk bed room which allowed us privacy!

title: Top location New York visit
text: Efficiënt room, don’t expect à hug room. It’s very efficient use of small surface. Clean sanitairy quick transport by many elevators running day and night. Personal freindly, helpfull. Good service for luggage storage at arrival and departure day.

title: Appropriate for price
text: Bathroom wasn’t especially clean, at least bed was, could smell weed at times in room and in halls. The staff is super friendly and always helpful. The location is great close to all the things you need.

title: A+++ Stay
text: I had to be in the city for 2 nights for an event on-site. A+++ stay just perfect. Comfortable beds, huge shower, perfect location, quiet & peaceful sleep, even had a desk for me to work at. Definitely recommend.

title: Clear the room
text:
I stayed for 4 days and my room is not cleared. It was bad, horrible. Thought I requested to clear my room, writing name in list de clear in loob, my room is not cleared. 
Other question is necessário one fridge in room

title: Clean, functional and perfect location
text:
I travelled with my daughter for her 21st birthday. We arrived a little before advised check in time and were checked in no problem. The male receptionist that checked us in was friendly and efficient. 

We were in room 2110 on the 21st floor. Room was small which we knew before booking. Bunk beds were comfortable and the room was spotlessly clean. 

Each bunk had its own tv and there are plenty of USB charging ports.

The ac and bathroom extraction was quite noisy but otherwise when the window was closed the room was quiet and calm. The bathroom walls are glass and the light comes on automatically when the door is slid open. 

Housekeeping services could be requested the day before if needed. 

On check out the staff were happy to print boarding passes and store luggage. 

The location is perfect and within walking distance of many sights and attractions.

title: Exceptional value for location and price, very clean, friendly stuff.
text:
As a solo traveler visiting NYC for the first time, I was a little concerned about safety, particularly at night and overall cleanliness given the price. Other than a minor issue with hotel not following through on cleaning room as requested, which was resolved by me, moving to an equal quality room, this is a great value. The bed was very comfortable and hotel was quiet. The hotel itself overall was very clean and location is fantastic. With the lobby being a few floors above street level I felt secure - as well as it being right on 42nd St. There are so much police presence around that. I never felt uncomfortable walking alone at night. Just don’t stray far from the main streets! Hector, the daytime, manager was exceptional, by providing a five star level of service with a genuine, friendly engagement with all guests.
 I will stay again for sure.

title: Great budget option
text: We had a great time at the Pod. The rooms were small but perfectly formed. Comfy beds, peaceful at night. The staff were friendly and helpful. We had a problem with our s safe, it had a flat battery. Maintenance came right away to change it. Same with a broken hair dryer.

title: Clean!
text: One of the cleanest hotels I’ve been at in Manhattan at the price point. Truly a smart decoration inside. You have everything you need. And the location is great too. Definitely a steal when it comes to value.

title: Excelente e pratico
text: Excelente atendimento. Hotel bem pratico e funcional, possui cofre no quarto, perto de metro, estação de ônibus, Times Square e alguns dos principais pontos turísticos. Funcionários do hotel super atenciosos, o restaurante que possui no hotel é maravilhoso, menu excelente! O hotel não possui café da manhã, mas tem padarias, cafeterias e mercados perto. Recomendo!

title: love it
text: as someone who lives in nyc i just wanted to get away from my place and i made the right choice coming here. the bed was so comfy i didnt even want to leave, the sliding doors for the windows right by the bed looking at the view from your pillow was amazing and i loved the stand in shower with 2 shower heads i will be back!!!

title: Good Deal
text:
If you're going to be in NYC for work and do not need a lot of amenities for your travel style, this is a great place for the value. The rooms are bare-minimum for sure, but they are clean and functional. The staff is pleasant and the hotel has a restaurant and plenty of lounge space if you want to meet friends. I have stayed in the room with the bunk beds and in the room with the full sized bed - both are comfortable if you're only interested in a good sleep. 

Great traveler's hotel for bare-minimum travel if you're looking to save a few dollars in NYC. NOT a great fit for families traveling on vacation or if you're going to have to work in your hotel room for any length of time.

title: Perfect stay
text: Clean, very well located. Room is a but tiny but ok for à few days. We ll come back for sure. Only 10 minutes walk to Times square. Area is safe. Surronded by many restaurants, bars and everything you need.

title: Happy with my stay
text: This is my second time using POD Hotel Times Square and I’m happy again. It’s a solid, nice spot to sleep when you want to be near all the activity of NYC and the modern usb power ports made it easy to leave my chargers in the bags. Recommended!

title: Vollkommen In Ordnung für einen Städtetrip
text: Lage ist super wenn man Midtown alle schnell erreichen möchte . Kleine Zimmer aber 2 Koffer haben Platz . Den Tisch braucht kein Mensch-steht nur im Weg . Bad ist groß genug. Manko: Teppichboden. Da keine automatische Reinigung erfolgt trotz Servicegebühr. Als Paar würde ich nicht ins Etagenbett , für nen Trip mit Freunden -super .

title: A great place to stay with a friend or partner
text:
My friend and I stayed at Pod Times Square 10th February 2023 for four nights. I was really happy with our stay. 

The staff were very friendly and helpful when we checked in. 

The maid service is on request, you just write your room number on a sheet at the lobby and they'll do it that day for you.

The room itself, although tiny, is well equipped. They make no secret of the size, we were prepared for this prior to staying. 

We were in a bunk bed room where there was a TV at the foot of each bed, and several USB charging points for each bed. 

The bathroom was surrounded by frosted glass rather than walls so be prepared for that! It had a great shower with plenty of power, and full sized shampoo, conditioner and shower gel dispensers.

The room and bathroom were absolutely immaculate. It looked brand new and was exceptionally clean. As were the lobby areas and hallways.

The location was great, only 5 minutes walk from Times Square and two subway stations (Port Authority and Times Square). The area felt safe and had plenty of food options nearby. It didn't get loud or rowdy at night either. 

They held our bags for us on our last day for a tip (no standing charge) and check out wasn't until 12pm.

Overall very happy and would stay here again without hesitation.

title: Good for a short trip
text: If you're in NYC you're not meant to be spending a lot of time in a hotel room. For a short turn around where we were out for most of the days it was serviceable. We were on the 15 floor and it was still pretty loud/bright being so near time square so if you're a light sleeper bring ear plugs/sleep mask. Room was clean, small issues were fixed or ignorable. Close to subways and busses. Overall net positive.

title: Perfekt
text:
Das perfekte Hotel für ein Städtetrip. Sehr zentral, sauber, gemütlich und modern.
 Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und empfehlen das Hotel mit ruhigem gewissen weiter. Check in und Check Out super unkompliziert.

title: Top
text: Hôtel à moins de 10 min de time square, la chambre est bien équipée (lampe de lit, port usb et télévision). La salle de bain est bien équipée (il manque peut-être une brosse pour les toilettes) et le service nettoyage est parfait !

title: Good
text: I had a great time at this hotel! The staff were there. Just that you have to tell them if you want your room cleaned. I had noted it at the reception but nobody ever came. It's not a big deal, it didn't affect my stay so thank you Pod!

title: Mother daughter trip
text: Overall great place to stay and perfect for our needs, location is perfect with access to subway, port authority and lots of places to easily walk to. Few things need addressing in our particular room but easy fixes. Asked for a higher floor room for the views and we got it. Was great.

title: Good but extra charge for cleaning ... that is done only on request
text:
Good location, well renovated 
I would recommend however $20 of extra fees / day requested at the arrival for cleaning services that was not clearly mentionned when booked.
The cleaning only occurs on request and you have to sign 1 day before to apply. At the end $120 extra for 6 days and the room cleaned once...

title: Muy bien
text:
Para lo que se necesita en Nueva York. Cumple con todo, buen colchón, agua muy caliente sobre sobre todo en invierno.  Pero si tengo que destacar una cosa, una vez vivida la experiencia es la localización. Es inmejorable la verdad.
Muchas gracias

title: Very good value and good location
text:
Rooms are small but clean and the beds are not bad very good value for the price 
Location is good and the restaurant on site had some pretty good drinks. Elevators were always available without a wait and off site parking is nearby

title: Great location
text: Clean rooms, friendly, helpful staff, amazing location! I couldn't have asked for more, especially at the price! I didn't miss any of the extras that other hotels have, and the room had plenty of space for the two of us.

title: Rude staff smell heavy blanket it wasnt wash put back on bed and leaking shower stall on the outside of rug
text: Had to call for towels but i kept stepping on the wet towels my feet stayed cold  my socks got wet did not use the heavy blanket it smell it was not wash hair was even on it tub drain brought hair back up it was disgusting long brown hair 😞

title: Great location!
text: Hotel has a great location, prices are good...rooms are a bit small but that is NYC! Staff seems helpful, I would stay there again if I am traveling solo and at same price. Lots of public transportation and areas to walk to in the neighborhood

title: The Best Value in Manhattan...
text: Small but perfectly nice room, great shower, flawless and extremely professional service. Great location. Staff invariably welcoming, professional, friendly, attentive. I will return again and again. And the price was unbelievably low for what is on offer.

title: Nice Hotel
text: My first stay at this newer hotel.  As advertised, the room is small but perfect for one.  Comfortable bed, well-appointed room.  Good location for going to Broadway shows.  My one BIG gripe: the addition of a "resort fee" just prior to confirming the booking.  This is a MANDATORY fee which, in my opinion, should just be added to the room rate right up front.  This practice seems to be becoming more and more popular and I find it VERY annoying.

title: Overpriced
text: Room with bunk bed and shower was ok. However, when checking out I had to pay a daily tax of 22USD for WIFI, early or late checkin/out and luggage storage, so on average a 20% price increase while WiFi is generally included in each 3 star hotel, early and late checkin/out were not used and for the luggage storage a tip was requested. So, when you consider to book, add the tax to the price, there might be better options in midtown Manhattan!

title: Excelente servicio me voy muy contento
text:
Excelente servicio y estancia , buenas instalaciones y funcionales , cercano al centro de la ciudad a muy buen precio 
Solo un día no hicieron la limpieza de la habitación y eso no me gustó 
Gracias good

title: 혼자서 여행갈 때 좋은 숙소입니다
text: 6일간 숙박하면서 깨끗하게 잘 지냈네요. 위치도 좋고 뷰도 방마다 차이가 있겠지만 위치가 좋아서 가성비 생각하면 좋은 숙소 입니다. 방이 좁다고 하시는 분도 있는데  혼자 지내기에는 차고 넘치는 크기였습니다. 호텔 직원분들도 전체적으로 친절하고 나이스 하십니다. 다만 제가 묵은 방은 냉장고가 없어서 장기간 식품보관이나 냉동은 어렵습니다. 화장실 변기가 조금 높아서 키가 작으신 분들은 불편할 수도 있겠다라는 생각이 들었습니다.

title: Family trip to New York
text: I booked the room for myself and my son who is at university in the states. The room was economical, perfectly situated and the bunk beds worked perfectly for us. We found the staff to be really helpful and the bar and bartenders really great. It was lovely to get coffee and pastries in the bar before we set off for the day. I cannot recommend the hotel highly enough.

title: Preis Leistung ist top
text: Für 5 Tage New York perfekt. Man ist zentral, es ist sauber und vollkommen ausreichend für einen City Trip. Einziges Manko, die Betten haben so laut geknarzt beim schlafen dass man echt oft wach geworden ist.

title: Very nice place to visit New York!
text: Pod Hotel is a very nice hotel which is near to Times Square. The rooms are clean and also quiet. We’ve got a nice view out of our window and we’re definitely coming again! Also the service was very helpful und kind!

title: 10/10 would recommend
text: It was a really nice Hotel to stay in nyc. The rooms are clean. Also the view from the hotel is incredible. I really enjoyed my stay at the pod hotel. I would definitly recommend this hotel to my friends!

title: Buena ubicación , mala atención.
text: Buena ubicación. Desastre la atención. Tienen disponible limpieza diaria de los cuartos pero para ello debe anotarse en un libro. Aún en ese caso no limpian. Lavamanos del baño tapado. Realmente si tiene chances busque otro lugar.

title: Bad experience
text: Pictures of the room could be better  on booking site. The room was so small that bed was too small for 2 ppl. I even asked the receptionist guy to upgrade to better room at the time of check in but he said that’s the biggest room we have got. We were shocked to see that. It’s only good for 1 person.

title: A gem in NY!
text: This hotel is the nicest and clean. Staff are friendly especially kathy! Quick checkin & checkout. Room was comfy and clean. City view was amazing. Shower is nice as well. Walkable to timesquare, markets, restaurants.Will stay here again!

title: NYC
text:
I really enjoy staying here
Great location every thing is so close to Time Square. For sure Pod hotel made me feel welcome here
Thank you staff ❤️.  I will be booking with you guys next year In January 2024.

title: Ich buche wieder !
text:
Preis /Leistung waren dem üblichen Preisverhältnis von New York angepasst. Lage war top. 
Linie E (42 St/ Port Authority) die zur Jamaica Station (JFK) führt war nur 2 Blocks entfernt. 
Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich.

title: New York Getaway
text: No surprises, no issues, clean affordable rooms, great location. I would definitely stay there again. Check in and out was seamless, the staff was all pleasant and friendly. If you are looking for traveling on a budget and need a place to stay without the big room, just a place to crash. This is the place to go for the value.

title: Great stay! Great location
text: I will stay again for sure, very friendly staff. Clean modern rooms. Very safe and great location. Great view! No coffee or magnifying mirror but it had hairdryers and shampoo and conditioner body wash.

title: Pod room in NYC
text: Pod Times Square was an excellent overnight option with a clean room, comfortable bed, and an easy to manipulate temperature gauge.  The hotel was close to my parking and within walking distance of Times Square and the subway.  Great location, and the staff was friendly and helpful.  Couldn't ask for more!

title: The Best vacations with my kid¡¡
text: I had great time staying in Pod Times square, great staff, location and room. I loved that is very easy to go from there to the main atracctions in NYC, it is safe, clean and have all we needed. I also loved the view from our room in the 22nd floor¡¡¡My son and I had great time, and we will sure stay in Pod next time we visit NY.😊

title: Great launching pad for all over town
text:
Great price, room, and location for midtown. take the 7 line if you don't want to walk at all, or walk to time square and take all the major lines of subway. Shower was hot, towels were clean, plenty of hanger and coat rack for new york attire. 

Well thought out hotel for new york activity traveler.

title: Satisfying, but could be improved
text:
The pods are a little tight and may be hard for two people to walk comfortably around, there are no microwaves or water bottles in the hotel so you would have to leave to buy food or water and bring it back if you wanted. The water pressure was also pretty weak, but overall it was still a pleasant stay. 

The beds were soft and blankets were comfortable, the bathroom is spacious enough, you have a nice view depending on where your room is, it is clean, and uses double ply toilet paper, which is always a plus. The service is great, they are not disrespectful and if you need blankets or a remote they would bring it immediately.

title: Perfect
text: Stayed 2 nights with my adult daughter at a cost of one night elsewhere. No need for all hotel amenities others offer that you most likely will never use. The bunks were so comfy and shower was spacious.

title: Place to sleep
text:
Fantastic location. I needed a place to sleep close to the theatre district and I got that. The room was a hole in the wall. Thankfully it had a city view so wasn't claustrophobic. If you predict that you are likely to spend time in the room apart from just sleeping in the night, wouldn't suggest. Bed was comfortable.  The room could take a solo traveler but more than that is a very very tight fit.

Attaching a picture of the view from the room. I was there three nights and zero days effectively as I left before breakfast and returned after dinner. Would have found it difficult had I needed to spend more time in the room.

Worst was the checkin experience. Slow and indifferent counter staff, maybe it was just a bad day, I don't know...

The checkout on the other hand was great. The chap in the counter was pleasant and nice and the process was instantaneous.

My biggest grouse. No water or coffee maker in the room.

The overall upkeep was bad. Door was scratched all over, bathroom sliding door wouldn't stay in one place.

title: Tremendous value
text:
Great location for starters.  The woman who checked me in and out was very friendly. 
 Clean, bright, modern room... all I needed for a one night stay.  Instead of "cramped" I'd say it was "cozy."  And with an $89 rack rate--granted it's the dead of winter but also it was on a Friday night--I felt I got a great deal.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing place with amazing people
text: Loved this place. Very friendly people and very helpful to take care of people who are not familiar with NYC. Set my mind at ease. I believe they could tell I was a bit nervous coming from the backwoods to the big city but I would definitely recommend this place.

title: Great value if it works for you
text: Very small rooms (obviously), but clean, surprisingly quiet, and in a perfect location for our trip. Could have used a few more shelves, and our trip (4 nights) was about as long as was comfortable in such a small space, but if you just want a place to sleep, it’s a great choice.

title: Pod Stay
text: Great location, friendly staff, amazing room view. There are lots of places to eat close by, you can walk pretty much everywhere from the hotel, there is a 7-11 close by and they have everything (food and personal care if needed) , coffee was amazing!

title: Convenience is key
text: Amazing location and value. Don’t expect lots of room or crazy amenities. It’s a great place to sleep, refresh, and go and that’s about it. Would benefit greatly with a mini fridge in the room for storing leftovers and a small common area with a toaster and microwave. We also experienced a fire alarm and all the stairs from the different levels brought us to the lobby but not the ground floor. Had it been a real fire I’m not sure everyone would have gotten out okay so that was concerning. I’d stay again assuming the price doesn’t go up. This is basically the hotel equivalent of frontier or spirit airlines if you understand that reference. Barebones and minimalist but sufficient for most low maintenance tourists.

title: Excellent!
text: Thank you for being so great! The friendly staff made staying here so delightful. Also, thank you for recommending the diner down the street from the hotel. The food was delicious. We will definitely be staying here again.

title: Good value for the money, great location
text: This is a very barebones place but very modern, not a dump like you'd get in some areas of town. The room was *very* small without much privacy.  The walls of the bathroom facing the bedroom area were the frosted glass walls of the shower.  So you wouldn't want to be staying there with someone you didn't know well.  Basic amenities were there, but there was no closet, just a rack with hangers.  In all, the room was about the size of a parking space.  I was traveling with my daughter and felt very safe at this location, though.

title: Great place
text: Centrally located, clean, modern, easy and courteous check in/out, and the place is safe, with double locked access and doormen in the lobby at all times, and down in the vestibule after dark.  Nearby pharmacies, restaurants, mass transit, and just two blocks from the heart of Broadway’s theater district and Hell’s Kitchen’s LGBTQ scene.

title: Comfortable and affordable stay near Times Square.
text: Surprisingly pleasant stay for the price, which was very affordable given the location. Yes, the room is small but if you expect to be out in the city for most of the day, it has what you need.  Was perfect for a solo trip.  It reminded me a bit of a cruise ship cabin !   And the bed was very comfy and good hot water.  Only minor gripe is that shower water spilled into rest of bathroom despite closed curtain.

title: Positive Pod
text: I hesitate to write a good review because I don't want other people using this hotel.  I want to keep the secret to myself.  LOL! Perfect place for a one night stay.  Friendly staff.  Great experience.I WILL recommend the POD to all my friends.

title: very good choice
text: very well designed rooms with everything you need,excellent location, especially if you attend the javits, which you can walk to, as well as times square.fast and enough elevators to always travel alone in them.all this together with its price make it a good choice

title: Simple and cheap accommodation
text: This spartan hotel room is small but to be expected for the price. Great location, shower was hot and had good pressure. Basic but everything you need. A small fridge would be useful but  was fine without. Would recommend if you’re looking for a simple place and will down most of your time out and about.

title: Location & value
text: A great location & although bare bones a lovely place to stay. Convenient to the 42nd Street Port Authority Station to grab pretty much any bus or train, close to the theater district, so a quick walk to a show,  and the price is right Room size is a little like being on a boat, but efficient & functional

title: Clean and friendly great location.I will stay there on my next vacation
text:
Clean and friendly 
I would recommend it to anyone who is visiting New York on vacation 
It is cemtral for all the sights
they are all in walking distance. You right near to the Portauthorty which is a bus station to anywhere

title: Great location to visit Manhattan
text:
Great location,
Perfect to visit Manhattan,
A bit tricky at first to get the lobby,
I would for sure go back at Pod Time square,
Staff was nice and friendly,
Room were fairly big for a Pod,
Everything convenient in the room

title: Good stay
text: Despite its size- the pod room is ideal when my teen and I visit NY. Kathy at the front desk is incredibly helpful and friendly. December in NY is beautiful- busy but a nice Time to visit. The location is ideal for broadway.

title: NYC Trip
text: The hotel location was very convenient,  from everything to restaurants and museums and clubs as well. Staff members were very helpful once I got there. Checking into the hotel was very easy as well. Thank you!

title: Budget friendly, clean and comfortable
text: My sister and I spent the night in a pod. We opted for the bunkbed option. The beds were very comfortable. The room is small but suited our needs. It was clean and modern. There is no ice machine fridge or coffee machine in room. They did have a safe. Overall if staying one night this is a great budget friendly way to do so.

title: Preis mehr als gut, Komfort mangelhaft
text:
Die Lage des Hotels ist optimal, man kommt man Flughafen JFK gut mit der Bahn zum Hotel. Generell erreicht man alles durch die Nähe zum Times Square sehr gut. Wie hatten einen so genannten Bunk Pod gebucht. Das Stockbett hat uns beide nicht gestört, das Badezimmer war auch okay, jedoch war auch nicht mehr Platz in dem Zimmer. Wir haben es ausgemessen und es hatte tatsächlich inkl. Bad 11qm. Und keinerlei Möglichkeiten den Koffer auszuräumen geschweige denn zu verstauen. Nicht mal unter das Bett konnte man ihn schieben.. na gut jetzt könnte man sagen selbst schuld wenn man etwas so günstiges bucht. Sind wir warscheinlich auch jedoch finde ich das doch erwähnenswert für die Kofferplanung, wir hatten zu 2. 4 große Koffer, das war etwas viel für diesen kleinen Raum.. 
Was noch erwähnenswert ist, das wir in 5 Tagen nicht einmal den Ansatz einer Reinigungskraft gesehen haben. Ich erwarte nicht dass ich bei einem Stadturlaub jeden Tag frische Handtüche bekomme, aber den Müll der nach einigen Tagen überquillte könnte man doch schon mal leeren..

title: Perfect stay!
text: Great location and price!!! Room was very clean! They stored our luggage so we could enjoy the city without dragging our stuff around! The view from the room was magical. Truly happy I choose this hotel to stay at and will go again!!

title: Great location!
text: This was my second stay at this property. Like most NYC rooms they are small - but very well suited for one or two people. Minimalist and modern are two words that best describe these accommodations. When I’m in the city I don’t spend much time in my room - so a comfy bed, and a good shower are all I usually need.

title: Perfect value
text: This was the perfect deal so close to Times Square. The room (bunk bed) was good enough for us (couple at the age of 25/26), and the restroom was quite spacious and clean. We would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Manhattan.

title: Highly recommend!
text: My husband and I stayed in a bunk pod and it was great!! Room was super clean, stocked, and beds were super comfy!  No need for all the frills of a big hotel that come with a price tag!!  Highly recommend!

title: Pod hotel
text: Great little hotel staff really friendly room was nice and clean great location if I went back to New York would 100%stay here again this was are first time in New York and all the staff made us feel welcome

title: It’s the place to book in Manhattan
text:
Best welcoming place in Ny 
We were skeptic when we saw it online , we physically had a check and booked straight away 
You ask the stuff a q and they quickly assist , even late at nights
Five stars to Vito ( made our trip unforgettable )

title: Simple, clean and convenient
text: My only complaint is the noise in Hells Kitchen at night that will keep you up. If you have noise canceling headphones, they would be ideal. Inside, the rooms are simple, clean and pretty noise proof. So, you cannot hear any other guests in their rooms on your same floor.

title: Simple and perfectly located
text: Excellent hotel located near the Broadway theaters, restaurants and other attractions, mainly Time Square, with lots of Metro access. So many options around this hotel. nothing luxurious but it has everything that you need to spend a few days in the city. I have been there many times and I will definitely return.

title: Horrible stay there is nothing I can say good about it. I paid 110$ for parking nothing was ever said about anything.
text: Horrible stay worst service I paid 110$ for parking nothing was accommodating staff is horrible there is really nothing good I can say about my stay. I will not be coming back I don't know how you are so highly rated

title: Pod stay
text: Decent stay no complaints except my credit card was charged 8 times and I’m not sure why. I booked through bookings and after staying, it says it was cancelled and so that was a bit frustrating. Waiting for someone to contact me

title: Perfect Get-Away
text: Everything about this hotel was to die for. The rooms were a decent size for two people, especially since it was a block away from the heart of 42nd street and Times Square. The bed was to die for; so comfortable. They had all the necessities: Towels, rags, body wash, shampoo, conditioner, a hair dryer, soap, television, a safe and room service. On certain days there are activities for tourists like walks to specific popular locations in NYC. Overall, for our first time experience (my boyfriend and I) I can definitely say we’re booking this hotel again.

title: Love the Pod
text: If you are looking for a basic place to sleep and shower for a great price, this is it.  The rooms/bathrooms are very clean and functional and have everything you need if you are not spending a lot of time in your room.  The staff is very helpful as well. I highly recommend it.

title: Great place
text: Great hotel within walking distance of Times Square.  Conveniently located among a lot of restaurants and theaters.  The beds were comfy and, even though the room was small, it served its purpose. Would definitely recommend!!!

title: Don’t except much
text:
There’s no restroom is the lobby, so after check out and before our departure on a long drive we had no toilet we could use. We had to search a place near the hotel that let us use their restroom.
Beds are uncomfortable, but the bathroom is clean and decent

title: Excellent budget choice
text:
We stayed here for 4 nights just after new years and we couldn’t fault the hotel. 

Obviously it’s a budget option but I had no issue with the small size, we got a double room and it was more than enough space for sleeping and showering in aslong as your fine with mostly living out of your suitcase.

The absolute best thing about the hotel is the location, everything is on your doorstep with a subway station a block away and a short walk to Times Square.

title: Compact but fully functional
text: Small room with bunk beds but no smaller than we expected. We only slept here so was everything we needed. Did request room service as informed but they didnt turn up. Asked at reception and was told they will be there the day after which they were

title: Great location
text: Located on the corner of 9th & 42nd street the hotel allows easy to the theatre district & midtown. Access to the lobby from street level requires an elevator ride. It is a busy place as the pod units are located vertically in a tower. To get from the lobby to the rooms is via a second bank of elevators that is activated by your room key, meaning only those staying on each floor can access that floor. We stayed in a bunk room with bath & like other Pod hotels it is small but well laid out. There was ample access to everything including USB plugs, but we did miss a small fridge that we had at other Pod hotels. The bath sits inside the door behind a glass barn door, but because the shower curtain was too short, water ended up everywhere. They need longer shower curtains with magnets to hold it closed. All in all an ok stay for one or two nights while in transit.

title: Hotel a 2 passi da times square
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per capodanno.
Ottimo hotel, camere pulite e personale gentile e accogliente,
Ottima la posizione, vicina alla fermata metro e a 10 minuti a piedi da times square..

title: Great stay! Great quality!
text: Our stay at Pods hotel during the end of the holiday season was amazing! I did not expect to find a hidden gem with friendly staff, extremely clean rooms and a great view near Time Square! I will definitely be coming back again (:

title: Fine, with limitations.
text: Very small, clean rooms with good sanitary facilities.  Windows do not seal against noise.  Rooms couldn't be cooled in winter, so you had temperatures of 25°C in the room.  Circulation fan too strong, so you had a constant draft.  Although room cleaning was announced, the room was never cleaned.

title: Was ok, could be better
text:
Wasn’t as close to Times Square as I expected, and the area seemed a little dodgy at night (especially as a solo female traveller). It’s actually a good 15 mins walk to Times Square (if you take into account people walking & crossing roads.)

Every staff member I dealt with was rude. From the checking in girl, not even looking up & making eye contact or a smile, not even a hello, just chucking me my room key, no information given as to where to go, how to use the lifts, amenities, restaurant etc. Luckily other guests were around to help. To the end when checking out, and getting an eye roll when I said I was wanting to check out (different girl) and then the concierge not being helpful, he went running off to laugh & joke with a friend when mid telling me something. Luggage storage broke my suitcase and I didn’t realise until I left the building and was already running late for a flight (was fine in the morning when I left it with them but they’d put all the suitcases on top of each other and didn’t realise I could see them just yanking them & bashing them around from the door).

Do not use the concierge service to the airport, much cheaper options, depending on the time of day. Overall the room was expensive for what it was and the size of the room & the service from the staff. Also make sure you’re close to whoever you’re sharing the room with, as the glass bathroom sliding door that didn’t shut properly, barely had any privacy.

Good points, it was modern & clean.

title: Really enjoyed our stay !
text:
You know what it's like....you read all the hotel reviews and can't decide ! I picked this one as with my daughter I needed separate beds and the bunk beds seemed ideal.
Situated very close to Times Square in a relatively quiet part of 42nd Street.
A lift takes you up to reception where the staff were very friendly for a quick check in. It's a tall building, we were on floor 17 and had a great view down to the freedom tower.
Room was just right, clean,tidy and just right for two people.  A little more space might have been appreciated, but not a big deal.
Point to note....toilet light goes on and because its a glass enclosure with bunk beds backing on to it....the light may wake up who is sleeping !
Decor is bright, corridors slightly in need of refurbishment but I certainly didn't feel I was staying in a place that was dated.
Didn't use the bar,it did seem lively a couple of times. Good bag drop room if you have a late flight out of NY.
I would recommend this hotel. Got it at a decent ( for NY) price. Clean and tidy and friendly staff are my must haves...it had these.

title: Easy place for a nice weekend trip!
text: Does the job! It’s exactly what the hotel is called - a pod. But it’s the perfect size for a place to stay at night or nap during the day. Super convenient proximity to the train, Times Square, and other foodie spots. Staff is very friendly.

title: i will come again
text: location is very good, walking distance to times square, resturant, terminal and other important places.  employees were very polite.  The rooms were clean, the bed was comfortable.  The only downside is the space is quite small but adequate for sleeping

title: Stay in NY
text: I was looking for a comfortable place close to the center to be able to move easily, even on foot.  Good location close to several points of interest that can also be reached on foot.  Not in the chaos of times square but still a few meters away

title: Toppen hotell
text:
Bodde fem nätter med min dotter. Rummen va rena och i bra standard. Hade ett rum med våningssäng vilket fungerade kanon bra.
