Väldigt små rum men bra planerad, saknades endast ngt att ha resväskan på fick ha den på golvet och kylskåp hade varit ett plus. 
Trevlig personal, kändes säkert. Läget perfekt med nära till de mesta. 
Där ska finnas frukost men den dagen vi skulle äta där fanns de inte så kanske inget att lita på riktigt.
Fanns ett jätte bra frukost ställe på tvärgatan om man går en liten bit förbi starbucks.
Skulle absolut kunna tänka att bo hör igen.

title: Nice Hotel
text:
Central location in Manhattan. A friendly hotel. One minor is that we didn’t know about the Gym at the top floor. A complete gym with a magic view. Over manhattan. 
The restaurant is also a very nice place to eat.

title: Gonna Keep This One For Future Use
text: This hotel really exceeded my expectations. From the moment I walked in the building and  met Kathy at the front desk i knew I was going to love my stay.  It aint the Waldorf but it's Hip and modern, However I Love this place

title: Heart of Manhattan
text:
Loved the location- close to Times Square and theatre district. Easy to get metro and trains. 
Rooms are small but all you need since it’s really just a place to sleep and shower!
Check in and out were easy.  Key card elevator access provides extra security!

title: My go to hotel when visiting the city
text: This is our third visit at this hotel and it never disappoints. We will be back and I can’t wait it’s always clean friendly and a great location. The room had a great view and is everything you need. Thanks

title: Bunk bed room
text: This past summer, my son and I took a short getaway to NYC. We stayed in a bunk bed room and it was surprisingly cozy and comfortable. It had everything we needed.  The staff were friendly and always ready to help.

title: Highly recommended!
text: I had a great stay here. Will surely come back. Great staff and location. The staff were very accommodating for my requests for early check in and late check out which is very unusual for hotels in New York. The control panel near the bed was also convenient. The toilet, particularly the shower, was very modern and easy to use.

title: Wonderful experience
text:
Comfortable hotel in the heart of Manhattan.
Functional and well equipped.
Serafina bar just fantastic.
Unfortunately the roof bar was not accessible due to cold weather.
Thanks to Kathy for kindness and professionalism.
Luigi and Giovanna

title: en plein cœur de nyc : je recommande
text:
Nous avons reçu un bon accueil par la réception. Quant à la chambre malgré que celle-ci donne sur rue, le bruit était presque inexistant. De plus nous n’entendions pas les personnes dans les chambres voisines. C’est un point très important ! 
Quant à la propreté de la chambre il n’y a rien à redire ! Après la chambre reste relativement petite mais fonctionnelle avec des aménagements pour ranger valises, affaires etc…

Un bar et restaurant se trouve également dans l’hôtel, que nous recommandons !

Concernant l’emplacement de l’hôtel, on ne peut pas rêver mieux ! Il est entouré par plusieurs lignes de métro, bus qui emmènent aux quatre coin de la ville !

title: Good
text: this is an excellent experience, the hotel price is really fair in such a good location. In addition, the interior design made me feel comfortable, the view from the window is also quite nice, I can see the urban scene from the window.

title: POD Times Square
text: Our stay at the pod was very nice. Gave us a nice view of the city on the 20th floor. The room is a bit small but that is storage I’m under the bed and the location is perfect. The parking garage is right across the street and I had no issues the whole week I was there. Definitely would come back

title: Place very good:)
text: I like the location:) Many places too visit, many attractions, church near bay area, I don't have any problem with this place, I hope in few months come back, maybe in summer, So that it guys, for me everything works:)

title: Katherine great front desk agent!
text: Kathy (Katherine) made the check in process easy and enjoyable. She greeted us with a pleasant smile and beautiful welcoming attitude that made our first visit to New York even better. Thank you Kathy

title: Great place to stay
text: The location is great if you want to stay close to the times square, staff is very friendly and helpful, the only problem we had was that the heater was off during the first night and it was about -20C, the vents still made noise so we thought it was normal but no hot air was coming out.

title: The staff were very friendly, great experience from beginning to end.
text: Our first time staying in the city. The location provided easy access to the metro and everything else we needed. The price was affordable and the room was all we needed. They held on to our bags at departure so we could wait for our flight without hauling everything around as well. 10/10

title: Very good
text: The hotel is great! Located in Manhattan in a prime area, so, I didn’t need to take taxis because the hotel has all the things around it. The public transportation (subways) in New York works well and the stations it’s near to the Pod Times Square Hotel. The room is a little smaller than I thought, but it’s clean, comfortable and all the employees are very carefully.

title: Best stay ever in NYC
text: We LOVED the Pod. Great staff, great price, great location. Easy check in/out. Our room was clean, simple, just what we needed. Loved that they could hold our luggage after checkout. Highly recommend!

title: Week-end couple
text:
Very good for a week end trip, close to everywhere in Manhattan (central park, Times square..) nice room maybe a little bit small but it’s ok for us. 
Recommanded for all travellers who want to go to NYC
Staff all good, clean room

title: Perfect place Perfect price
text: Walkability, safety and value. Friendly and accommodating staff. 20 min walk to everything from Broadway to Carnegie/Park and Rockefeller. Subway 2 blocks away for any other sights to see. Easy to get car share as well.

title: Our Favorite NY Hotel
text: Great location in Midtown. Close to Times Square, Broadway theaters, fine restaurants, and public transportation. The hotel facilities and rooms are clean and in good repair. Staff is always helpful. Clientele has a nice international flavor. A great value for your dollar.

title: It is tiny
text: Be prepared for no housekeeping, fresh towels or emptied garbage can. I asked for someone to clean bathroom but no one ever did. The room is just too tiny to have anything extra laying on floor. Great location & value but won't be staying there again. The concierge did give recommendations for fabulous restaurants!

title: Pod ist klein, Pod times square ist zu klein
text:
Waren im November in NYC und schliefen im Pod Times Square. Das Hotel ist gut gelegen und +/- ruhig.
Die Zimmer sind zu klein (kein Koffer liegend im Zimmer) und dass keine Möbel im Zimmer sind, ist in der Pod-Reihe bekannt. Bad/Dusche ist sehr gut.
Beim Einchecken erfahren, dass man Reinigung und Tücher jeweils "bestellen" muss. Da wir 5 Tage dort waren, dachten wir alle 2 Tage an neue Tücher und in der Mitte des Urlaubes das Zimmer reinigen.
Leider hat beides nicht funktioniert.
Sauberkeit: nichts ekliges, aber sauber ist anders.
Preise sind in NYC hoch, aber für die Leistung ist das Hotel deutlich zu teuer.

title: Fantastic!
text: Hotel reps were genuine and sincere. I asked about some food options and they were very willing to give me their personal favorites, all within walking distance. Was offered a complimentary drink ticket for the bar inside the hotel.

title: Had a great time!
text: We had a wonderful time at this hotel without breaking the bank! The rooms are small but so cozy, and the queen pod was just enough room for two. The location was great, everyone was nice at the front desk, and there was a yummy .99 cent pizza shop directly across the street from the entrance that we loved. We'll be back the next time we visit NYC!

title: Ótima experiência de acomodação
text: Ótimo localização, ótimo custo benefício.  Fiquei no quarto onde tínhamos 2 camas de solteiro (beliche), quarto pequeno mas atende bem. Ambiente muito limpo e aconchegante. Foi minha 2º estadia e voltarei com certeza. Agradecimento em especial a Concierge muito atenciosa e simpática, nos ajudou com transporte no retorno até o aeroporto JFK. Chegamos antes do horário do check in e foral guardados as malas até o horário. Nada a reclamar.

title: Excellent location
text: If you want to stay close to time square/Manhattan area without breaking the bank, this is a perfect location for short walking distance to most sites and a great price. Rooms are small and bed was a bit uncomfortable, but we went walk and explore, not for the room.

title: Amazing hotel (with a lousily managed restaurant & bar)
text: Great place for a stay in this amazing city. Small rooms, with (almost) everything you need. No coffee facility, neither in the hotel really. Otherwise perfect. Good value for money - especially viewing the location. Unfortunately the Serafina restaurant is terribly managed and not the place you would expect as part of a hotel like this.

title: My good hotel
text: I liked of your hotel, your service, your location and the value about the room. The staff was nice to me and my family. When I return in the future, I am going to stay in this location again. Thank you

title: New York City Break
text: Had a great stay in the POD Times Square, it has welcoming friendly staff and a superb location just off Times Square. The rooms are basic but functional, comfortable, clean and you’ll be spending most of your time outside anyway. The staff are f, welcoming and informative.

title: Great
text: Excellent location lovely apartment type room very clean reception staff very helpful can’t fault it would definitely stay again was a little cold at night but expected given the time of year luggage room available and late check out

title: Birthday weekend
text: My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay, everyone was so nice! Our room was upgraded upon our arrival which was also great. The room was clean and simple, just as expected, and I’m the perfection! Walking distance to everything you need or want to do. I will definitely return!

title: viaggio regalo laurea
text: ottima permanenza, e ottima accoglienza, ho avuto un contrattempo risolto senza problemi, e in tempi brevi .mi piacerebbe solo un piccolo armadio per le giacche o gli abiti.l o staff simpatico e gentile

title: Mauvais service
text: Le service n’est pas bon. Les chambres ne sont pas nettoyées sous prétexte des règles sanitaires alors que l’hôtel ne pratique aucune mesure sanitaire (pas de masque, pas de distanciation, restaurant bondé ) Le service au restaurant est mauvais.

title: Excellent!
text: Very affordable and a great location, and it was quiet considering it was in Time's Square. I stayed in the bunk pod and it was perfect for my friend and I to stay in. I will definitely be staying again.

title: Dicembre 2022
text:
Hotel a 10 minuti a piedi da Times Square.
Personale gentile, struttura pulita.
Comodo per i vari collegamenti per raggiungere JFK (LIRR- Air Train).
Consiglio colazione da Andrew NYC Dinner, tipica tavola americana, a 2 isolati circa dall’albergo.

title: Okay
text: More cleaning would be okay, location is the most amazing, you can walk to anywear, the bus stop is very neer and the subway is two street down, súper easy to find, only the cleaning room was really bad, i stay one week and never clean the room

title: Quality has gone down
text: We have stayed here 2 other times but we’re very disappointed in this last visit. The room carpet was smelly. Made the room smell of feet and you had to ask for housekeeping each day before 7pm. Lobby toilet facilities very disappointing

title: NYC
text:
O hotel é muito bem localizado, mas o preço não vale o que oferece.
O quarto é mínimo, nao tem armários e nem frigobar.
Acredito que existam opções mais custo efetiva na cidade, não há espaço nem pra as malas adequados.
Acredito que só sirva pra viagem curta e individual.

title: Small rooms - ideal for single travellers 12 nights
text: Room was veey small but clean. Not much space to store luggage but if you travel light it is perfect. Good size shower. Some noise from traffic in the street but overall slept well.Friendly staff and (free of charge) luggage deposit at departure. 5 minutes from Times Square, 15 minutes from Pier 88 Perfect position.

title: Clean and convenient
text: Best value for being in the middle of Times Square. Rooms were clean and had all that you need. Stayed there with a friend and we both enjoyed it. Would stay again. Maybe bring your own blanket. The ones they provide are very thin.

title: Another Perfect Stay!
text: Love the pod.  Can’t beat the Times Square location.  So close to everything. Walking distance from Penn Station! Small rooms but they are clean and more affordable than other locations. Love the bunk beds.  Very comfortable and very quiet!

title: Great experience!
text: Location is great, near Times Square so perfect to live the heart of NY city. Our room was small but clean and cozy, so we’re satisfied. The view from the window was spectacular, we loved that! The staff was kind and welcoming. It has been a great experience!

title: Very Good
text:
The Experience is great since the rooms design is modern and minimalist , you definitely have all you need for a practical and confortable staying.
The rooms , bath and Common space is designed to use all the specific space and the experience is very good due to the natural light in the Room and the forniture contempo design.

title: See the city, not stay in the room!
text: Very pleased with overall experience.  Yes, it was a small room, but we only needed a place to sleep and shower.  Close to everything, clean room and linens, and felt safe.  Pleasant staff.  Highly recommend!

title: It's a pod for sure!
text: Stayed in the bunk bedroom with my daughter ( adult).  Super tiny space, but clean and comfortable.  Only minor complaint,  the person who checked us in, barely acknowledged us.  He did not look up or explain anything ( There are walking tours included in your stay, happy hour at the bar and a tricky elevator). Would have been nice to have had that information given.  Great location though, Walking distance to Times Square.

title: Great Location - questionable extra cost
text: The Location of the Hotel is great, just one Block from Times Square and right next to PABT. But they charge you a 20$ Facility Fee per day for no explainable extra service. The room will only be cleaned by request - you have to sign up in a list to get your room cleaned. I stayed in many hotels around the world, but never experienced such a thing.

title: All-round great value for the money
text:
Friendly, helpful and accommodating staff.   Front desk, concierge, and housekeeping all on the same "how can we make you comfortable?" page.  Able to access my room a bit earlier, wonderful perk as I was exhausted- and able to check out at time I requested with no fuss.  Missed the "walkabout" - free!- on my check-in day, it was not offered on the day that would have been perfect (Thurs) which was a bit disappointing.   
Suggestion- There are a number of free "winter shopping experiences" near Times Square in various neighborhoods- tried to get to one but got hopelessly lost on the subway- oh well.  Have a few of these during the Holiday Season.  Thanks!

title: Great location, great price
text: This was a great stay. Room was clean and had everything I needed. I got one of the full bed rooms and the room might be a little small for two people and their luggage, but for one person, it was perfect. It was very close to where I wanted to be (Broadway theaters) and was so easy to come back to in the afternoon for a little rest in between exploring in the morning and shows at night. Hotel was very quiet. I heard no neighbors and no noise in the hall. It was a great experience and I would definitely make this my first choice to stay on subsequent trips to NYC.

title: I’m coming back for sure
text:
Excellent location.   Safe and super clean.  We were in bunk beds and it was comfortable.  Accommodating staff for both early check in and late checkout.   Amazing price. 
What else does one need in NYC?  Would definitely recommend and repeat my visit! 
Lisa

title: Clean rooms and great location for food, drinks and sightseeing
text: Clean rooms and great location for food, drinks and sightseeing. Close to train and bus stops to travel the city. Extra security with have to use your room key to use the elevator to get to your room.

title: Incrivel
text: A localização do hotel é ótima, consegui ir a pé pra vários locais e também é próximo ao metro. Local bem-organizado, atendimento tranquilo, quarto limpo e agradável! Com certeza ficaria novamente por lá

title: Quick overnight stay
text: Perfect location - close to the attractions, transportation.  There are a lot of dining and shopping options near there.  The room was super clean and comfy.  Desk staff was friendly.  I would definitely stay there next time I'm in NYC.

title: Propaganda enganosa
text: Tinha me hospedado lá há cerca de 3 anos. Como fui sozinho, o quarto, apesar de pequeno, parecia razoável. Desta vez voltei e marquei 3 entradas com minha esposa em um período se 10 dias. As fotos dos quartos de casais no site pareciam de acomodações amplas, até com um sofá. Mentira. Fomos colocados em quartos em que mal cabia a cama. O serviço de quarto só vem se pedirmos com um dia de antecedência. Certa noite aconteceu uma emergência e os lençóis precisariam ser trocados. Depois de muita insistência, eles deixaram novos lençóis no quarto para que nós os troucássemos

title: Great option!
text: Clean rooms great location excellent staff! Easy to access the trains, near by restaurants and well equipped rooms. The bathroom shower makes it worth another stay alone. JC Diaz at the front desk was amazing!

title: No amenities and the price is too high
text: They have nothing for the price. The staff is great. Very kind, very helpful. Just a shame that they work with no amenities. Nadda, nothing. Not even a microwave for the guest to use. For the price they charge. Its better to shop around because other hotels offer better prices but you have to get it on different days. One day other hotels may over charge, the next day or the next hour the prices of other hotels may drop. Doing it that way. At least you get better amenities and a bigger room. Not a life size closet. .

title: A Holiday Get-A-Way 🦃
text: Extra space was required for my family and guests of Thanksgiving weekend, Pod Times Square was first to come to mind! Since having stay here myself many many times, I feel very good recommending this Pod location for anyone looking to visit or travel to NYC.

title: Pod perfect stay
text: Great reception at check in. Clean room, good air quality, clean comfortable bed. Perfect for my two day digital nomad stay. Would recommend to others and stay here again. Nice view from room. Don’t have more to write.

title: Excellent space in heart of the Big Apple
text: Absolutely great bargain and with all of the modern conveniences.  I felt safe at this property and staff was wonderful.  Modern and up to date.  Although the rooms are small--it's New York after all--they have everything you need.  I love my view from my room!

title: Boa opção
text:
O quarto que ficamos era extremamente pequeno, mas super limpo e organizado. Bem localizado e silencioso para dormir. 
Serviço de checkin e checkout são rápidos e tranquilo. Deixam guardar as malas e não cobram por isso, um benefício pois o outro hotel que ficamos eles cobravam.

title: Location and convenience
text:
The hotel has every basic thing that one’s need for a short stay, location, compact rooms , clean and to the point. I have stayed several times and it always delivered. This Pod in particular, has Serafina restaurant ( for later drinks at night after the theater and a night club with a cool vibe, right by the elevator) 
My only observation is that they need to replace those pillows, they are already in very bad shape. 
For the rest of our experience, it was great ( I always take my own toiletries, body lotion etc, they don’t offer those but yes, there is body wash, shampoo and conditioner in every room with bathroom inside ) 
Oh! And they keep and hold the luggage after check out if you’re leaving New York later on, which is very convenient.
I enjoy this hotel and I will definitely return.

title: One Night in Times Square
text: My son and I had so much fun staying in the bunk bed room.  It was perfect for the two of us. The location was great, room was comfy, and staff was all super welcoming and kind. We will definitely stay here again next time we’re in the city.

title: Schönes Hotel Mitten in Manhattan
text:
Lage war Top - 5 Gehminuten zum Times Square - ebenso 5 Minuten zu den Ubahn Stationen.
Zimmer klein aber fein. Ausblick aus dem Zimmer sensationell. Sauberkeit war auch in Ordnung.
Gut organisierter Check In. Hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter.

title: 1 night in NYC
text: Highly recommend this hotel. It was in the heart of NYC. There was parking less then a block away. It was clean and funky. The price was affordable but the stay was luxurious. Will definitely go back if I’m in the city again.

title: Nic
text: I would have appreciated the daily cleaning of the room. When requested, clean towels were delivered but baskets were not emptied (for the 6-day stay) nor was the room (floors and bathroom) cleaned. It is very important for me to stay in a comfortable room and cleanliness is the most important thing. Covid is not an excuse. In all other countries cleaning is done regularly.

title: Convenient location and clean
text: We liked staying at this hotel. It was clean and the location was great! The room is very small but I wish they had a small fridge in the room or at least ice available. I had brought drinks and snacks for the room but had no where to keep them.

title: Charged the wrong card
text: Great, but they charged the whole trip to my personal card instead of the company card on a business trip and it was never something they asked me about. Now I'm struggling to get them to change it so I have to leave a mean review to get their attention.

title: A clean place to rest your head
text:
This might not be everyone’s cup of tea, but for me and my daughter it was just right. 
It was small but clean. We just needed somewhere to sleep after two days of shopping and sightseeing. Don’t expect too much and just go with the flow

title: Perfect small space in the theatre district
text: I was traveling alone and looking for a reasonably priced place to stay. Pod Times Square was the perfect place for me. The staff was friendly and helpful, the location was exactly what I wanted and the cost was reasonable. The room in which I stayed was very small with bunk beds; that was fine for me but if someone is not traveling alone, I would suggest asking for an upgrade. The facility is very modern and perfectly clean. I was looking for a negative but couldn't find one. I didn't visit the restaurant and bar but stuck my head in to see what it looked like and it appeared to be really nice. I will return!

title: Atendimento não é bom
text: O hotel é bem localizado e bom para até duas pessoas. Não fui bem atendido no check in e em uma segunda oportunidade pelo gerente que ficou irritado em ter que procurar uma entrega que recebi no hotel. No dia do chechout, uma funcionária bateu  e me acordou às 9 da manhã para confirmar se eu iria realmente sair… Oi? Se não for pelo preço, recomendo outro. Wifi não funciona bem. Ponto positivo, localização, tem um mercadinho ao lado do hotel, é perto do metrô. Se for para economizar e não liga para o atendimento é um bom hotel. Ah, só limpar o quarto se for solicitado, então se quiser toalhas limpas, você precisa ir até a recepção e anotar em uma lista que você deseja que seu quarto seja limpo.

title: Un soggiorno gradevole
text: Possizione eccellente. Stanze molto piccole, letto matrimoniale appoggiato alla parete molto scomodo, mancanza di un armadio, il bagno si allaga personale molto disponibile e cordiale, il terrazzo non appartiene all'hotel.

title: Price-quality perfect
text: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at Pod Times Square. The location is great: shops, nice restaurants, metrostation etc is nearby and Times Square is only a few minutes away! The room was small but perfect for two. The bed was great and the shower was big & clean. Unfortunately our suitcases did not fit under the bed, so it was a little bit difficult to mive through our room with the suitcases open. So we closed them each time we were dressed. Also the room was very quiet. That was very important to us. We couldn't hear our neighbours. The staff was very helpful. And there were free walking-tours available which were great!

title: Great Place for the Price
text: This hotel is great place to stay if you are in New York on a budget. The room is small, but has all you need and the bunk beds were really comfortable. Great location near Times Square and walking distance to many attractions in the city. The staff is also really friendly and the facilities are nice. Will definitely stay again the next time I'm in New York.

title: Great stance
text: Great place to stay at if you’re willing to stay near times squares. Really nice environment and the staff people are great. Good for couples. Clean rooms and hotel in general. Lots of restaurants near by if you’re ever craving something at whichever time. Keep in mind there is no breakfast even though it says the serve.

title: Great location, great staff
text: Stayed with a friend in a pod bunk. Room was small but served the purpose. Location is perfect to Times Square, The HighLine and subways. Staff were friendly and accommodating even helping with recommendations for pizza to be delivered to the room on a rainy evening. Would recommend and will stay here when I return.

title: Not good
text: Two women who worked in the morning were kind, but i dont like the men working at night. I asked them about slippers but they didn’t even know whether they have or not. I think they are not hotel employees. My first language is not English so my pronunciation is not perfect, but they frowned at me and acted as if they totally cannot understand me. I felt the men employees were so rude.

title: Good
text: Not a bad experience/service. They are so clean . The bunk paid brought back some memories . You get what you paid for. The name is literally the pod . Don’t go expecting a master bedroom. If you are coming for a short period , it’s highly recommended.

title: Pod like but nice!
text:
I was a bit skeptical about staying at the Pod Times Square--but I really liked it. Yes, the rooms are small. But they aren't tiny, and they are very functional. They're also immaculate. Moreover, I asked or a fridge, and they brought it right away. The folks who work here are very nice and efficient, esp. given the general check in/check out chaos. Back to the rooms, though: There are hangers, and a desk and chair, albeit small. If you're in NYC for work, you shouldn't be staying at The Pod. 

Suffice to say, it's a very young crowd, so the lobby has kind of a hostel feel. I did see some 35+ year old tourist types. It's a great location, though, walkable to everything., subways as well.  It's not *in* Times Square, it's more Hell's Kitchen/Midtown. It's a busy neighborhood, lots of coffee shops, eaterie, etc. I'd stay at the Pod again.

title: Good Price, but disappointing in the details
text: Good price, but there were some issues.  The bed had no space at the head or foot.  I am only 6 feet tall, but had to sleep diagonally in the bed.  The toilet never stopped running.  They never cleaned the room despite me having a magnet on the door asking for service.  They were somewhat rude when I checked out.

title: Meh
text: Great location if you want to be in the middle of the craziness/busy New York. Very close to everything if you’re there as a tourist. With that said it’s so busy that getting taxi or Uber is just too hard and if you’re getting dropped off the traffic is just not nice so walk everywhere. The hotel is very clean as well but the staff wasn’t very friendly. I think they just don’t know what hospitality means

title: Too small, needs cleaning
text: Hotel has a perfect locations, with many bars and restaurants in the hood. Unfortunately, room was too small (smaller than it looks on internet) and nobody has cleaned the room for four days. There is no fridge in the room.

title: Small Room, great staff and location.
text: Small room if you are traveling with more than two people. Great staff and location. The elevator was not functioning 100% at time in terms of the connection with the key card (which they have for security). Would recommend looking further into that. But great location.

title: Pod Square Hotel
text: This is a pod hotel.  The rooms are small and have bunk beds.  Each bed has a TV.  There is a small desk.  There is a basic bathroom with shower.  We were on the 22nd floor.  Still  a bit noisy but it's NYC and Times Square.  The room is small and can be a problem navigating around suitcases and people.  But the value is there and it's right in the Broadway district and we use it for opera at Lincoln Center. (which is a subway ride away or a 20 block walk).

title: Great for price and location
text: Everytime I visit NYC I stay at this hotel. When I come to NYC all I ask is for a cozy, convenient location, and reasonable price. Pod Times Square offers all of that. Staff was super friendly I will definitely be staying here again!

title: Great location
text: The room was tiny but comfortable and clean. The location is excellent to visit the city because it is very close to the subway terminal. The staff was nice and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay in New York city.

title: Economical and practical hotel located in the Heart of Manhattan!
text: Pods Time Square is a great value for your money! The location can’t be beat! So convenient to get everywhere in the city. The rooms are pretty compact but for a NYC trip where you aren’t spending a lot of time in the hotel, it’s a perfect sleeping quarters! The storage under the bed is a really nice perk giving the minimal design/ space of the room. All in all it’s a perfect stay for a weekend trip of exploring the city! If you are comfortable with an efficient economical room this is the place! Kathy was excellent at check in and was able to get us a room at 10am despite check in not being until three. This SAVED us as we had an early flight in so the opportunity to get out bags put away and have some time to freshen up before exploring the city was such a relief. We even got upgraded to a queen room. Great experience!

title: Clean and Comfy
text: When you need a good night sleep and a hot shower this is it. Serafina a plus, walking distance from GCT. As a solo female traveler I felt safe and secure. Room was super clean and the shower had a rainfall showerhead. Awesome.

title: Amazing location
text: Amazing location in the heart of NYC, close to Hell’s Kitchen for amazing restaurants and handy to Times Square, High Line and Hudson Yard.  Rooms are small but has everything you need.  Showers are a bit see through so not great for modest people.

title: Pod Time Square
text: Stayed for 4 days . Location great close to Times Square, however bed super uncomfortable & shower floor was slippery. You have to request for your room & sheets to be changed 24th in advance. No small refrigerator . Expensive for what we got

title: A fantastic Place to stay
text: The POD at Times Square is incredibly convenient, a great price and the rooms are fantastic. Clean, modern, bright rooms with a great shower. The building is secure (you need your key card to operate the elevator in order to get to your floor) and there is plenty to do in the neighborhood. great restaurants  and some really awesome bars. only a few blocks from Broadway, its super easy to get to the subways too.

title: Sahar
text:
Sahar really helped us out and was smiling all the time.
Thank you for everything.
The room and the view was great.
Loved the style and interior of our room.
The guests were friendly and diverse .
When we come back to New York we will definitely stay at POD again

title: Room size matter
text: The size of the room is so tiny and no space for luggage is not high enough we cannot use the iron for the cloth because no space to use it, it will a good idea to add small fridge like other hotel, finally is better for young people

title: Fun, affordable hotel
text: Had everything we needed. Clean and the staff was friendly. Bed was comfortable and bathroom shower was spacious and had great pressure. We had a great stay and would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family looking for an affordable hotel in a central location. Kathy was very friendly and helpful at the front desk.

title: Great experience and location
text:
The room was really comfortable and had a great view. In the reception Sahar was nice and helpful, we would like to thank her for her hospitality. The location was perfect 😍 
We asked one day for a cleanup of the room, and it was perfect, with a change of towels and blankets.

title: The worst hotel
text:
The worst hotel I’ve ever stayed, the staff is horrible and slow.
I went to their restaurant for some drinks on Saturday night, but wasn’t allowed to get in because they had a private event.
Just not worth the money staying in this hotel.

title: Nice and práctical
text:
Fui por la maratón de Nueva York y es muy conveniente para llegar los buses hacia la salida.  
En general el hotel es bueno. 
Cómo aspecto negativo: El desayuno muy limitado y además cobran una tarifa diaria por “resort”, cuando en realidad no hay ninguna instalación adicional que lo justifique.

title: Lovely stay
text:
Enjoyed my stay at this hotel , lovely location , room , gym and staff !
Shonnah was very helpful as well telling my sister and I where to go.
Thanks for the lovely stay and I’ll deffo be back there xx

title: Great place, great oocation
text: Our stay was great. Kathy who checked us in at the front desk is an angel and deserves all the praise. Would recommend. Location is great with access to all the sights you would want to go to. Parking lot across the street was so convenient

title: Good location
text: Clean and modern rooms, good location to time sq. And pen station. The sky bar was not on the roof top, only on the middle of the building without any good view. We have 4 good nights stay, thanks for good service

title: Excellent midtown location
text: The hotel is literally a few minutes walk from both the Port Authority Bus Station and the huge Times Square subway station so is perfectly situated for exploring Manhattan. It is also reasonable walking distance for most of the Broadway theatres, plus it's right next door to Stage 42, currently showing Kinky Boots :)  Definitely recommend as a great base for a New York stay.

title: Great, especially if on a budget!
text: The hotel/rooms are very clean! Don’t forget you’re in NYC: the rooms are SMALL! But so worth it for the price & location. The beds are comfy with lots of restaurants & theaters just outside your door. The only “issue” we had was one slightly rude agent at the front desk but perhaps she was just having a rough day. Otherwise no complaints & would definitely stay here again. (Side note, we had the bunk bed room which was very convenient & comfortable).

title: Great Value
text: Great location and great value for NYC. Be warned though, the rooms are tiny (not unexpected in NYC, and as advertised). Not going to lie, the bunk bed situation was difficult for ladies in our age bracket. Would recommend if you're looking for something budget friendly.

title: Hotel “descolado”, ótimo custo benefício
text:
Hotel sem grandes luxos, mas bem moderno e funcional, quarto pequeno (e olha que não escolhi o quarto com beliche ou com banheiro compartilhado)

Localização top, perto da Times Square, metros e restaurantes, StuffIt bem atencioso

Achei o custo-benefício ótimo

title: Pod small but nice and clean!
text: Great location!  Walk where you want to go!  Pods are small but convenient!  No fridge, microwave or irons (have to ask for one) in the rooms but otherwise nice!  Stayed one day for my daughter’s graduation.  Would stay again!

title: Séjour parfait
text: L’hôtel a un emplacement idéal pour profiter de Times Square. Tout est à proximité : métro, restaurants, commerces… Les chambres sont propres et agréables. Le personnel est très accueillant. Nous avions en plus une vue magnifique sur l’Empire State Building!

title: Nice place to sleep
text: The Pod concept is novel, provide a nice place to sleep in a clean, modern but tiny hotel room, at great locations, but save money by offering no amenities. The price is usually lower than comparable quality but larger rooms of near by brand name hotels but as long as you don't need to hang around the room, it perfectly adequate.

title: Enjoyed the experience
text:
While the Pod rooms are very small, it is large enough for 1 person if you have a short stay in NYC. Every time I've arrived, check in is fast and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The elevators are fast too, which is not something I've always experienced at other hotels in NYC. 

The bathroom is really nice - very room considering the actual room is small. The bed is comfortable. Only problem I've had is that there is not a plug by the bed and the USB ports don't work. Clearing the electrical is cheap and worn out as I've had this situation everytime I've stayed there.

title: AWESOME - Great for a few days in midtown.
text: Great location, staff, cleanliness and price. Beautiful and new. Yes - its a POD, so not much room inside your room, but its got all you need and its all new and works super well. Just missing an ice machine on the property. None. Maybe I should have asked at the resto/bar. I get it with no mini fridge cause of space - but an ice machine on each floor would be nice - for drinks, beer, yogurt... other than that it's 100%

title: Threadbare-Stain Towels
text:
No soap bar near sink to wash hands and face like it used to have in the past
Old threadbare towels
Face towels with yellowish stains
Although location is perfect, I would think twice before booking my next staying in the hotel

title: Super Location
text: The hotel is well located for sightseeing  as well as for access via public transport from the  airports The  rooms are simple and small ,they are  missing some charm. The staff is friendly and the service effective

title: Viaje inolvidable
text:
Hemos pasado unos días increíbles. 
Nos habían comentado que las habitaciones eran pequeñas, pero no lo tomamos en cuenta porque solo fuimos al hotel a descansar. Fueron días intensos, la ciudad ofrece tanto que no alcanza el tiempo. 
El hotel está a un paso de todo,está estratégicamente bien ubicado. Es moderno, limpio, tiene caja de seguridad, se ofrece servicio de limpieza a la habitación previo pedido, no nos molestó para nada. 
Estuvimos ubicadas en el piso 22 con una vista increíble.
La atención fué excelente, hay varias personas que hablan español, agradecimiento especial para Sahar, quien nos atendió de maravillas, todo muy rápido y hasta nos consiguió una jarra térmica para poder hacer un café en la habitación.
Lo único que podría mencionar en contra es que no encontramos como abrir algúna ventana para tener ventilación natural. Es muy hermético. Pero en general muy bien!

title: Pod Times Square
text: Great location about 30 minutes from airport (JFK) a short walk to Times Square. If you go to this hotel there is a parking garage around the corner that will give you a discount when you have your ticket stamped by the hotel

title: Bunk beds!
text: We decided to stay at the Pod for the location and also the novelty of bunk beds. Small room as expected since this is NYC.We had a view. Very modern feel. However, we did feel like the room was not very clean and could have been wiped down a bit.

title: Good emplacement but no room service
text: Room was never cleaned in 4 days, extremely tiny rooms, not worth the money spent. Far too many people going in and out, more like a train station. If you look for a cosy hotel with good service, don't go there.

title: Manhattan Experience
text: Everything about the hotel is great. Is not a luxury hotel, but is just perfect for a trip to know New York, specially Manhattan, everything is super close, or at reach in a few minutes. The staff was super kind, Sahar made us feel welcome and that was our first impression in this hotel. Very well recommended.the noise at Time Square it’s loud, but at some point you just go to sleep, and it’s fine 🙌

title: Great value and location
text:
Great value and location, double glazing and soundproofing as good as possible given midtown Manhattan

Bunk room comfortable, WiFi and TV good when needed to relax

Gad to ask for more towels but were delivered very quickly

title: Totally awesome
text: With this price I wasn't expecting too much but Pod hotel was totally awesome! Location is just perfect and room was really clean. Yes the room is small, but that wasn't a surprise. Wouldn't come here with a partner but otherwise I would book again.

title: Management needs to get its act together!
text: No notice of their room servicing policy (they didn't even replace the towels!).  No tissue box. No easy access to electric outlets at bedside.These management faults make it unlikely I would book this location again.

title: Fast and easy
text: Booked last minute for a short trip to city with my daughter. Was looking for a convenient hotel at a great price and POD Times Square  did not disappoint. Was able to check in early! Every encounter with staff was fast and friendly. Room offered a clean comfortable bed with a well stocked bathroom. We even had a great view of 42nd street. Thanks for a easy, safe and convenient visit to NYC.

title: all good
text: very clean, quiet, small room. was able to check in early and was able to leave bags after check out until late evening. great location close to many  subway lines . the only improvements i would suggest are: add a recycling bin in room and add an electrical outlet at nightstand/ desk. staff very helpful.

title: Very small room in the middle of Manhattan
text: Small but clean room in the middle of Manhattan. Sahar was very helpful! A good and economic option to visit NYC. I would like they come to clean the room after a couple of days without you asking for it. Otherwise, TV and WiFi works pretty good.

title: Very good experience.
text: I went to new york with my boyfriend for my birthday. It was a very nice experience and your hotel was very clean and in a very convenient location. It was good for our budget. I am planning to go there again this week or the next!😁

title: Good location. Price ok. New but very small rooms.
text: Good location. Next to subway and really close to Times Square. The hotel is new. Good bed. But the room is very small. For couples, one must stay in bed for the other walk through the room. For the price of hotels in Manhattan it’s a fair deal.

title: Three night stay
text: Great location near theatre, restaurants and shopping. Very pleasant and helpful staff. Rooms are small but includes all the basics. Bathroom was well designed to ensure u were able to function easily. Very clean. Would return for a short stay. Would need a bigger room for a week stay.

title: Tiny but everything I need
text: Pod is a fascinating concept that might not be for everyone but I have always had good stays. The rooms are definitely tiny but most rooms in NYC are. A few things that I love about Pod are: 1) Always clean. From the linens to the towels to the room itself, everything is new and clean. 2) The location is perfect. There is convenient parking around the corner. The hotel is the perfect distance from a subway station and walking distance to the sights of Times Square. Lots of great restaurants nearby and easy walking distance to the Theatre District. I feel safe in the hotel and also walking around outside. I don't go to NYC to sit in a hotel room, so the tiny little "pod" of a room suits me fine. I've stayed in "tiny houses" with more room, but for what I need when in NYC, Pod is perfect. The beds are comfy and the rooms are very quiet.

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: I wasn't certain what to expect. The rooms are small yes, and perhaps not suited to couples or families who need space to spread out when in the room - but the property was clean, the staff was friendly and efficient and it all was sufficient for my needs as a business traveler.  I'll be back.

title: Nice hotel
text: My husband and I stayed at the Pod Times Square during a family vacation. We enjoyed our stay. The hotel is nice and clean. The rooms were nice, but a bit small. The location was great. We would recommend this hotel.

title: Took the name “pod” too seriously. Very expensive week for this.
text: I enjoyed my stay other than there was no room for extra stuff. Far too expansive for no mini fridge or microwave no coffee, etc. Was literally a bed and a small bathroom. windows were awesome but anybody can look into your room.

title: Gut gelegen, sauber
text:
Kleines Zimmer, Toilette nur durch Glas getrennt. Keine Tee/Kaffeezubereitung. 
Stockbetten sind sehr bequem. Lüftung gut. Die Lautstärke von draußen wird gut gedämmt. Wesentliche Sehenswürdigkeiten sind fussläufig zu erreichen.

title: Great hotel!
text: This hotel was perfect for our trip. I took my son to spend 2 nights in Manhattan for his 16th birthday. The bunk bed room was perfect for us. It is very small but comfortable and great decor. We didn't need anything else! The beds were comfy, the view was amazing and the front desk staff was so friendly! We will stay here again!

title: Special thanks to Sahar went out of her way to help me.
text: Every time I come to Manhattan I always stay at the pod times square the staff is great. Sahar was very helpful on my last trip I'd like to thank her I will definitely be coming back to the pod times square my next trip.

title: good if on a budget
text: Good, clean, sparce, no coffee available. would stay there again but would bring more necessities. Good location for subway, madison square gardens, close to broadway, off-broadway, times square. We actually had a good view of the city from our room.

title: Don't Stay Here
text: The Pod Times Square is depressing and the rooms are abysmally designed. My room was not cleaned between my two nights. There was no notice that it would not be cleaned. At the citizenM hotel in Washington DC I had the option to have the room cleaned, or not cleaned in which case a 5€ donation would be made to a worthy charity fighting climate change.

title: Good location
text: The price is fine for the location, they let you leave your luggage after your check out which is nice in case your flight leaves late, so you can go out and leave your luggage, the customer service isn’t the best.

title: Comfort and safety
text: From the moment you arrive you find an open and direct place to the lobby, the very good and fast attention, the security to access the floors where the rooms are located excellent (without the room card it is impossible to access unless someone else goes up to the same level), the cozy and beautiful room, equipped with everything you need except for toothpaste and the excellent price for the area in where the hotel is located

title: Excellent Experience
text: Rooms are small but they have all you need; when you are on vacation visiting the city, you don’t really spend that much time in the hotel. Bed was comfortable, room was clean, excellent state, we had a nice time here. Wifi signal is excellent too. Great location as well.

title: New york  la città  del mio cuore
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato ler una settimana presso questa struttura, ci siamo trovati bene, luogo accogliente, personale gentile, pulito e organizzato. 
Molto positivo per lasciare le valigie in reception on attesa del transfer , al contrario di altre strutture non si paga.
Consiglio la camera con vista

title: Perfect choice at Times Square
text: This place is perfect if you're traveling on a budget but want to stay in a perfect place in Manhattan. The room is small but nice, the staff is very friendly and the building is located less than 10 mins walking distance from Times Square.

title: Consigliato
text: Hotel moderno, gestito tutto da personale giovane e molto educato. Noi abbiamo preso la matrimoniale grande (ci sono matrimoniali più piccole e persino con letti a castello) e ci hanno dato una bella camera con vista spettacolare su skyline, da un lato, e Hudson dall’altro. L’hotel è pulitissimo. La pulizia della camera è a richiesta (alla reception c’è il foglio dove inserire numero della camera e la data per cui è richiesto il servizio). Noi siamo stati 4 notti e hanno pulito la camera tutti i giorni con cambio biancheria anche quando avevamo dimenticato di chiederlo. L’ascensore dal piano terra porta direttamente alla lobby, da cui si prende poi un secondo ascensore che porta ai vari piani delle camere. All’inizio è parso strano ma poi l’abbiamo trovato divertente, anche perché silenzio e velocissimo. La nostra era una prenotazione per solo pernottamento ma al piano della lobby c’è un lounge bar che offre anche il servizio colazione.

title: Nice property, poor amenities
text: I enjoyed my room at the Pod Hotel Times Square; the space is small but very well designed, and the room was clean and quiet.  However, it bugs me that they charge a "facilities" fee of $23/night which, they say, covers wifi and the ability to have your luggage stored.  It does NOT cover the usage of their tiny, poorly equipped fitness center - and no where does it say on their website or on any travel sites that you can use the gym free for the first night but then have to pay $15/visit thereafter.  This is ridiculous.  If you are going to charge a "facilities fee" it should at least include the use of the fitness center - every hotel I have ever stayed in included use of the gym in the room rate.

title: Best location for the money
text: Room that we had was very small and facing busy 9th St. But windows are well insulated so it's not noisy. It is just a room to sleep so don't expect anything else or you'll be disappointed. Food or coffee are just steps away. Maybe ideal for young people with not much luggage. Not recommended for people with kids.

title: One of my worst hotel experiences in a long long time
text: After paying USD 880 for two nights in a 12 m2 room (120 square feet), in Hotel POD on 42nd Street, I must say that not having been told that you must put your name on a list daily in order for your room to be cleaned is not short of outrageous. When I went to complain to reception once I noticed in the evening, they told me that they would come the following day…This is not acceptable to me and shouldn’t be to anyone. TO BE AVOIDED !!

title: Compact, cozy, clean, convenient
text: This POD is super clean and easy to navigate with extras such as hotel on site and ask for a kettle for your nightly tea/morning coffee - bring your own supplies. Quiet and option to open windows for fresh air. Very basic yet fine for NYC.

title: Convenient, Clean and Easy
text: Front desk person Sahar set the positive tone for our visit that continued through our stay and was most helpful. The rooms are clean and comfortable and have everything we needed. I slept well on the excellent bed and pullows. We loved our walking tour of the Upper West Side and Central Park, arranged through the hotel.

title: Amazing value, amazing location!
text: No one goes to New York to just sit in a hotel room. This is the perfect spot to get some rest between exploring the town. It's super close to so many of the things that make New York amazing -- Times Square, Central Park, and the subway lines.

title: Nice
text:
We loved the hotel, it’s central with everything around walking distance. & Sahar was very patient & helpful with us. 
The rooms are little small though but if you are a solo traveller that’s enough!

title: Cozy nest for solo traveler
text: Great location with helpfull staff. Room small but enough for one. Restaurant at property wasn't my thing but there were enough places to eat by walking distance. Neighborhood little noisy but don't know how noisy from above 7th floor

title: My stay at Pod Times Square
text: The main reason why my bf and I went to New York was for an event at the Madison square garden! We ended up finding a place to stay at the Pod Times Square and it was walkable! Literally everything was walkable! We even walked to Times Square! So we didn’t even have to pay $100 just for a taxi! This hotel is right where it needs to be! Thanks to the Pod we were able to have the greatest New York experience!

title: First time using this type of hotel
text: Strange experience and I most likely will not repeat.  If you’re younger you’d probably enjoy and think it was a bit of a hoot!   Tv on each bunk bed kept turning on and off. Very unsettling. They could have provided a black out curtain as slays in the window let in the street light.

title: Great but don’t deactivate the cards on check out day
text: My experience was great, the rooms were super clean. I got the bunk bed room and it was just perfect for me, myself and I. Sahar was the individual who checked me in. They were lovely and fast serving. The only complaint I have is that the day I checked out I went out for brunch and my room cards deactivated and was locked out of the elevator and room. I had to go back downstairs and get them activated again. That was very upsetting and troubling… but I got it fixed and check out was easy.

title: Terrible
text: The reservations representative is not nice nor flexible. The rooms are terrible for the price that I paid. I have stayed in many hotel in my life but this one is the worst by far. Will never go back there.

title: Excellent experience
text: First time in NYC and the staff was friendly and very helpful when I had questions or needed something. My room was compact but very comfortable. I slept amazingly! Great location near the heart of NYC  I was able to walk to many of my destinations.I will definitely return again!

title: The most convenient choice!
text: The location is perfect! Subway right next to it and perfect distance walk for times square, rockefeller, empire state, central park and summit one vanderbilt. The room might be big, but is the right amount of space for light baggage travelers!

title: Boa localização
text: O hotel tem uma localização maravilhosa. Na times square. Atendimento foi bom, na verdade só precisei da recepção quando cheguei e quando fui embora. Não conheci o café da manhã nem o restaurante. O quarto é muito pequeno, mal cabem você e as malas. Não tem armário, só tem um cabideiro. Em compensação é muito limpo, roupa de cama e toalhas de qualidade. Foi satisfatório. Custo benefício bom.

title: Nice stay in NY City
text: The Hotel room was very cleaned up and had everything we needed. The Location of this Hotel is directly in the city so we have done much by feet. Thanks for the nice stay! All in all we would choose this hotel again for our next trip.

title: POD Times Square
text: If you're looking to stay somewhere close to Time Square, this is it. With that said, rooms are SMALL, even for a couple. The rooms do not have a fridge or microwave which was really inconvenient. Staff was so nice and got us in for an early check in. The AC stopped working at one point and maintenance was up to our room quickly and fixed it. Overall, the stay was nice. We just wished for a mini fridge. It was unpleasant to not have any cold drinks or a place for leftovers. If you're a light sleeper, this may not be for you. Endless sirens and honking given the central location. Bring ear plugs. Also, the hotel bar becomes a club scene every night but couldn't be heard on our floor which was the 11th.

title: Good value, great experience
text: Super central location. One of the cheaper places in midtown. Room was clean and compact. Staff friendly and helpful. Can hear some noise from the street but that is to be expected due to location. Would choose again.

title: compact
text: Very good compact room.  You don't come to NYC to stay in your room and there was all one could need.  In the heart of the theater distract, close to public transportation, very helpful staff.   Clean.  No coffee maker or fridge, and you go out and get in the many stores, up and low scale, like a New Yorker.

title: Comic com weekend
text:
Perfect location for walking distance to Javitz Center. 
Early Check in was a Nice surprise. 
The concierge went above and beyond on several Occasions . 
The rooms were small( as expected) but perfect for our needs.

title: OTTIMA POSIZIONE,  RECEPTION  NO COMMENT
text: Ottima la posizione, stanza molto piccola ma stando in giro tutto il giorno può andare...alla reception gran via vai di impiegati:  molto scorretti, attenzione ai prelievi sulla carta di credito (a parte i 50 dollari di cauzione). A noi hanno addebitato 137 dollari per le "facilities" (wi-fi, pulizie, e non saprei cosa altro...) peccato che in 6 giorni non abbiano mai fatto le pulizie: nessuno al check in ci aveva detto che andavano prenotate il giorno prima, quando le abbiamo regolarmente richieste non le hanno fatte!! Con quello che si paga veramente vergognoso,  in un hotel a 3/4 stelle.

title: Great place for a fancy "hostel" style stay
text: A friend and I had a great four night stay in one of the pod's bunkbed rooms. While we didn't get a ton of room compared to a regular hotel room, we still had plenty to store our luggage and move around. Compared to some hostels I've been in, the space was actually quite generous. The room was also very clean, the beds quite comfy, and private bathroom a bit small but modern and feature complete. For our trip, we were out in the city the vast majority of the time so we really just needed a nice place to sleep each night and get ready each morning. For that purpose the pod had everything we needed.

title: great expeience
text: clean and modern rooms, customer friendly check in and check out processes, friendly and helpful staff, very great location. I was extremely positively surprised by this very well thought through concept.

title: Bel hôtel
text:
Hôtel sympathique et moderne avec un emplacement idéal. 
Les points forts: location, prix et joli hôtel 
Points négatifs: chambre petite, pas de toilette à la réception pour votre Check out, et les lits ne sont pas de la qualité habituels à NYC. 
Belle experience à renouveler

title: Loud, dark, dingy
text: Was put on 5th floor, bunk bed room. Beds only had sheets, no blankets. Sink had hairs on it. Hallways dark and dingy and felt unclean. Nightclub was right below us, no sleep till wee hours due to noise.

title: The Pod
text: We booked a l room here for a business trip, the room was too hot , we could adjust the temperature, received no help from the staff. Also the auto lights in the bathroom would repeatedly turn on all night making it impossible to get a solid nights sleep. Again the staff didn’t help.

title: Ótima opção
text: Ótimo atendimento desde o primeiro momento. O quarto era pequeno mas super funcional. Senti falta de uma cafeteira apenas. A academia é bem equipada e tem uma vista linda! Para limpar o quarto havia uma lista na recepção que precisava ser preenchida todo dia. Muito bem localizado

title: Great
text: Very nice hotel near times square. Very good services. Room clear and clean. Near metro to upper and lower Manhattan. Good restaurants around. Easy to find and well location. Serafina wasn’t open every morning for breakfast, the only problem in this hotel.

title: Freezing, small, and way over priced.
text: For two people, this room is smaller than any international space I've stayed in.  We travel all over the world in major tourist cities for business and it's 4 times the price of any place we've stayed for what you get. This does not accommodate 2 people in any way.  There is no place to put anything especially our bags or clothes.  You have to put your luggage on the bed anytime you want to get something out which is dirty and gross.  The towels are not good quality and small.  There is also no place to hang them other than over the toilet.  On top of that, the heat does not work.  It was hit or miss.  It took 3 calls and 2 maintenance trips to get my room above 64 degrees in 24 hours.  It was 60 in the middle of the night with no reprieve.  Every night, it struggled to stay warm especially with the bed directly up against the full window that was unbelievable with the cold coming off of it.  There is no place to move or get away with 2 people in the room other than on the bed.  It has a desk but we had to use it for our things because there is literally no place to put anything other than the floor.  Coming for business or pleasure, I would not recommend.  We were hardly in the room and it was still so inconvenient.  Forget getting ready.  You are fighting for space the whole time with each other.  Positives:  Great location, good shower, nice staff.

title: Great little crash pad
text:
Cons; 

Room layout poorly designed with a desk and huge safe taking up much of the room.

Rooms small. 

No drawers to put clothes. 

Space under bed is not suitable for large cases, meaning having to perch case on top of the safe. 

A bit dusty in places.

Dingy dark hallway. 

No room service unless you ask.

No kettle in room

Pro's 

Central location 

Price good for our budget.  

Polite efficient staff.

Modern white shutters in rooms blocking out light when needed. 

Good size bathroom with huge shower.

Clean bathroom.

Summary ; suitable for someone who's out and about all day and just needs a central base to sleep and shower.

title: Bunk room
text: the room was great and felt more spacious then i expected. loved that each.bunk had its own tv along with their own outlet and charging station. it had a amazing view and was very easy to and from times square. checking in and out was super easy and available on your phone.

title: First time in NYC
text:
Travelled to NYC for the first time from the UK.

We chose this hotel because of the price and the location. It is located around a 5min walk from port authority subway Station.

Upon arrival reception offered a free upgrade for both rooms which was very much appreciated. The rooms were perfectly fine for two. Yes, slightly on the small side but very manageable. Who wants to spend all their time in the room whilst away?

Nice clean bathroom with a nice big shower. The rooms don't get cleaned unless requested which is fine. We were on the 17th floor and had a great view of the city, so definitely request a higher floor in advance.

They also have a luggage storage facility which was free (tip if you wish). The hotel also offers a private taxi service to JFK which is a must personally. $85 dollars fixed rate but well worth it!

Thanks for a great stay!

title: super super convenient
text: small room but very clean and convenient  I liked the restaurant on premise.  A good place to go if your in town for business for a day.  not recommended for more than 1 night. the room is just too too small and basic.

title: Nice Trip to New York City
text: The Pod Times Square is a really  nice hotel to explore New York City. The location is very good to reach a lot of sights, shops and restaurants by foot. The staff was really friendly and did a good service.

title: Gutes und sauberes Hotel. Leider extrem laute Umgebung.
text:
Nach vorherigen Aufenthalten im Pod 51 und Pod 39 nun also mal das Pod Times Square getestet. 

Zimmer: Bunk Pod mit einem Etagenbed. Zimmer gewohnt klein (2 Koffer sind eigentlich schon zuviel...) und sauber. Große Dusche. Wenn man weiß auf was man sich einlässt, ist es ok.

Das Fenster lässt sich einen Spalt öffnen. Macht man aber schnell wieder zu, da es einfach bedingt durch den Straßenlärm 24 Stunden extrem laut ist. Durchgängig Hupen, Geschrei, Musik, Sirenen, LKW usw....

Da liegen die anderen Pod Hotels wesentlich ruhiger. 

Zimmerservice und frische Handtücher gibt es nur auf Nachfrage an der Rezeption.

Check In schnell und freundlich, allerdings wird die Kreditkarte mit einer Kaution belastet. Wofür die "Resort Fee" berechnet wird bleibt ein Rätsel. Es handelt sich einfach um eine schlecht versteckte Preiserhöhung des Zimmers.

Lage: Nicht die beste Gegend, bedingt durch den PABT Busbahnhof um die Ecke sind doch einige seltsame Gestalten unterwegs. Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Nähe, schräg gegenüber ist ein großer Food Emporium Supermarkt. Subway (Port Authority Bus Terminal) zu Fuß in 5 Minuten zu erreichen, Times Square ca. 15 Minuten entfernt. 

Das Hotel ist ok, ich werde aber beim nächsten Aufenthalt eine andere Wahl treffen. New York ist eine laute Stadt, aber da war das schon extrem.

title: Well located, clean, modern
text:
pod is a very conviently located hotel . It offers nice  rooms, clean and modern.
Small to US standards but fine for European standards
Very kind employees.. perfect for short stay. 
Close to broadway, The Edge.
Amazing view from the room

title: Good
text:
I expected small rooms but in my opinion, you should not mention that breakfast is available at 8:00.
Actually it is available from 8:30 for no more than 5 persons at a time. The waiter was very polite but completely overwhelmed by our group of 14 people

title: Very Nice….GREAT LOCATION!
text: The hotel is in a Great Location… it’s in the heart of everything. The club and restaurant onsite is amazing and food was excellent.. The rooms are a little on the small size but very clean and up to date.

title: Great service
text:
Fast and best check in at early morning, special
thanks to Sahar

Hotel is Compact and clean, nice location and good area

I can suggest this place 

Better ask for high floors nice view

Enjoy your holiday

title: Never again
text: The surroundings are shady, it was noisy and smelled of marihuana in the hotel and the room was not properly cleaned. I had booked 10 nights but checked out after one. I ended up paying $370 for one night.

title: Exactly what if says
text:
I stayed at Pod Times Square for 8 nights over September / October - partly for work, partly for leisure. I was pleasantly surprised by Pod and would recommend anyone travelling on their own / in a couple give if a try. 

The hotel is ideally located near the port authority bus terminal, so my airport transfer bus to Newark was only a couple of minute walk. The hotel entrance is on 42nd st near the 9th ave intersection. Subway stations are all around too. 

Times Square is a short walk away (10 minutes depending on how much you dawdle) as are many of the major Broadway shows. Javits Centre where my conference was held was only a 10 minute walk too. There are lots of food and drink options whichever direction you head. 

The room itself was small, simple and clean. Lots of usb charging ports and hooks and coat hangers. I had a bunk Pod and each of the beds had it’s own charging area and tv. The bathroom was small but well appointed. The water was hot with good pressure and the bathroom items were great. Nice fluffy towels too. There is no room service (which I was clearly told when I checked in -> you have to request this) but I didn’t mind - once you get to my age you’ve learnt to make your own bed. 

I stayed on the 10th floor and didn’t suffer from any of the noise issues that have been commented on. Once you get the hang of the lift to the lobby, then a different lift to street level it’s pretty simple. I didn’t have much to do with the staff, but anyone I spoke to was friendly and polite - the porters in light blue shirts were super lovely. The luggage storage after I checked out / before I headed to the airport was appreciated. 

The room prices were very reasonable for the area (keeping in mind everything in New York is more expensive). Pod doesn’t present to be flashy with extras and pluses galore. But that’s ok - how much time are you going to spend in your hotel room anyway when you’re in a city like New York?

title: Getaway
text:
The hotel Pod in Manhattan is fantastic, clean and great location; the staff is really friendlly. Thank you Sahar for the help and the speedy check in! Would highly recommend visiting this location.

Thank you!

title: Pod 42 < Pod 39
text: I stay in hotels for a shower and bed. I love Pods because I don't plan to be there all day. I'd rather be in the city I'm visiting than in the hotel room. Pod Hotel fills this need. I picked  Pod Times Square for the first time this visit because it was very close to show I was seeing and the reason I was in NYC. I would not stay again. It is fine, but not as good as Pod 39 or 51. The club next to the lobby is loud. The staff seemed uninterested. The view from the room isn't pleasant. The best thing it has going for it is the location. For a first timer to NYC who is planning on doing Times Square, I'd say it's worth a stay, but for anyone who's done Times Square already, try Pod 39 or Pod 51.

title: Great Location but not friendly
text: I just felt out of place here ! Friendliness of staff was to other other guests! Location is awesome in the middle of Times Square extremely small rooms and unfriendly staff made quite the experience to never stay here again!

title: What I expected
text: Very small, smartly designed.  Lack of power outlets was major frustration. A simple power strip would have solved the problem.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  The bed was comfortable, the desk was super small but adequate.

title: Good, modern hotel, however......
text:
The hotel room itself is tiny but comfy. Mattress is really nice and soft. Bed was comfy overall. 

Bedroom was clean, apart from a dirty white sock I found down the side of the bed.

You must book I room service for when you want it, which is good for some but bad for others.

Staff are professional and friendly

Literally a straight 10 minute straight line walk to times squares and plenty of restaurants and shops around the surrounding area.

Here's the but......it states that the windows are soundproof......they are not. I could hear ever horn and siren going off during the night.

If you want somewhere affordable, professional and used as a base for refreshments and sleep then this place is perfect.

title: Clean hotel with great location
text: This hotel was very clean and that is what sold me. The location was amazing. We were able to walk to Madison square garden, Times Square, Hell’s Kitchen & back to our bus stop on our way home. We did not need to spend any money on transportation. The staff was incredibly kind and helpful. They are able to hold your luggage before or after your check-in if you would like to explore the city a little more while you wait. The service was tip based so basically free and it really came in handy. The bar/restaurant attached to the hotel was beautiful. I didn’t get to go but I definitely plan to next time we are in town. I’ve heard from many locals that it is a very nice spot! Also another thing I loved was that you could check out online and check-out is at 12. Our room had a very nice view with two large windows. The bathroom was very nice and it had good lighting. Our air conditioning wasn’t working but within one minute of calling the front desk, a maintenance worker came to fix it. He fixed within 3 minutes. He was so kind!

title: Bad surprise...
text: The price asked at the arrival @ the hotel doesn't fit with price announced by BOOKING.COM at the reservation of the room, so it was a very bad beginning of the stay experience @ POD hotel Times Square

title: Great staff, reliable space
text: The staff here definitely make the experience worthwhile-it’s close enough to everything midtown, the rooms are fine but the staff are great. Makes a difference and I have returned several times - they recognize me now!

title: Small Space Big Comfort
text: I'm a frequent NYC hotel user and I really enjoyed my first experience with the Pod hotel. The room was small, but I got the Full bed which was very comfortable, but the room is definitely only good for 1 person at a time. The bathroom really roomy and easy to spread out all my beauty stuff and overall style very modern. The checkin was easy and they let me in the room before the official check in time, and the elevators are fast.

title: Idéalement situé
text:
Pour nous qui arrivions en bus,la station Port Authority est à 400m de l’hôtel.
À pied Times Square à 10 minutes et l’Empire State à 20 minutes.
Idéal donc pour un séjour découverte.En toute tranquillité je le recommande.

title: Everything except the room size was great
text:
Location is wonderful.  
Beds were comfortable.  
Great shower.
Rooms are so stinking small though. Thankfully it wasn’t winter where we would have needed more stuff.  I can’t imagine. 
It would have been nice if there were a couple more hooks in the bathroom.
And additional outdoor space to hang out in.

title: Good value
text: I enjoyed my stay. Good service at the front desk at all times (friendly receptionist, Noura), tiny minimalist but clean rooms that work well, good bed, no noise, feels like a safe environment. I will come back again.

title: NY September 2022
text:
The location is really great, close to the time square, Broadway, Empire state building, Rockfeller, 5th avenue central park and the subway.
The person who welcomed us was very unpleasant, we had booked a room with superposed beds and we got a king size bed without explanation. We asked about the breakfast, he told us that it was not possible, without further explanation. The lady for the check out was very nice, helpful and smiling so really two different experiences.
The room was small but the bed was nice. The walls of the bathroom are made of opaque glass which is a bit disturbing and leaves less intimacy. the main problem is the lamps, we used the bathroom lamps to light the room
